story:
These full grain leather carryalls are made with the same architecture as an envelope, out of one piece of latigo leather cut, burnished, folded and riveted into a durable, secure carrier. Every element of its construction is done by hand.

The folios utilize architecture similar to that of an envelope.  Their simplicity allows them to be secured without glues or stitches, using instead two hand-hammered copper rivets. They are designed and built in Tampa, and are cut, burnished, folded, stamped, riveted, and oiled - one at a time and entirely by hand.

Each one is made from a single continuous piece of latigo leather, which is durable, sturdy, and supple.  Each folio will soften over time and gain its own unique, rich patina.

The Carryalls come in 2 sizes:

                   Size                               Retail

Small         6 X 9 x 1                  $125

Large       10 x 13 x 1              $175

story:
Truth Beauty Freedom Love, in Eden's Garden

Sarah McCartney, founder and indie perfume at 4160Tuesdays and James Skinner, founder and designer at Dalliance & Noble are making a matching scarf and perfume, with limited edition paper prints of the scarf illustration too.

The perfume is a soft, rich, lavish blend of iris, hay, honey, apricot, tobacco, vanilla, lily, almond, sandalwood and bergamot.

  • At 4160Tuesdays we've crowdfunded our fragrances before. You help us to invest in the materials we need to make a bigger batch than usual, and in exchange you have the first bottles of our fragrance. For being courageous with a perfume, and committing before you smell it, the quickest backers can have this at half retail price. 
  • You can't just mix up a scent and sell it; here in the EU it has to go through tests and  certification for safety and stability. You're helping us to fund these essential hurdles and launch something new, rare and lovely.
  • We've always wanted a scarf to match a perfume, and since we met James we knew we'd found the designer for us. Set-up costs for printing a scarf - and a top quality paper print too - are high; crowdfunding means we can get our limited edition off the ground.

We've already done the creative work...

Sarah and James have put in the creative time and now need investment to start production.

They met in Sarah's 4160Tuesday's studio in Acton West London, to smell different natural and synthetic materials. The result was a collection of aromas which Sarah took as inspiration for the fragrance. 

She named it Truth Beauty Freedom Love, the rallying cry of the 19th Century Bohemian movement or artists, writers and free thinkers.

James illustrated the plants that the materials came from, and the wildlife they support. In the corners of the scarf he's placed the aroma molecules which case a perfumer's spell on the blend to transform it from just a mixture of materials into an elegant, wearable fragrance. He designed the scarf in two colourways, and named it Eden's Garden - a haven for fruit, flowers and wildlife. 

  • Your funds go to kick off the production: to buy sufficient raw materials to make a bigger batch of fragrance, to print beautiful  perfume bottles, designed by James specially for us, and to start the scarf and paper printing processes.
  • To support us you can choose a scarf - indigo or rose (or both), the perfume, or a paper print with indigo or white backgrounds. We're having a limited edition of 100ml fragrance bottles printed with a design James has created for us specially.
  • We're also having four special labels printed for our boxes, James's line drawings on white; you can colour them in if you like, to customise your individual boxes.
  • We raising a small pot of funds just to get us started,  requesting your help to make the physical products. We've funded with creative work by doing it ourselves. We shall find a way to make this happen, even if we don't meet the target.

All things small and beautiful

This world needs more beauty, and if we can make it look and smell better even in a small way, helping other small specialist companies along the way (including our printers and growers), buying natural perfumery materials that provide a home for wildlife, and giving you an affordable luxury alternative to huge brands, then that makes us happy too.

  • This is 4160Tuesdays' eighth crowdfunding project, and each one has reached its target, one of them got there in less than 48 hours.
  • Two of our crowdfunded fragrances have been finalists in the Fragrance Foundation's Independent perfume category, and in January 2018 we were named CaFleurBon house of the year 2017.
  • All this, and we're still really tiny, handmaking all our fragrances in our small studio, which you're welcome to visit.

What if you don't like the fragrance?

We're making 2ml samples for the less adventurous perfume fans to try first.

There's a chance that this means you'll miss the big bottles if you wait too long though. But if you don't like it - and perfume is a very personal thing, we understand that - we'll encourage you to offer it as a swap or for sale on our Facebook group, 4160Tuesdays News. They're usually snapped up. But we really think you'll like it

Please your fragrant friends know about us.

We'd appreciate it if you'd share with with everyone you know who loves a good fragrance, a silk scarf or a limited edition artwork.

Indiegogo have sharing tools here for you to click and send our project out into the universe (once you've secured your own perks). Thank you.

story:
Queer & Alive

The origin of this project is extremely niche and more than a little convoluted. For those of you stumbling across this with no prior knowledge, allow me to try and explain!

Mia-ugly wrote an excellent fanfic for Good Omens called Slow Show. A group of feral Good Omens fans latched on to Slow Show and formed a kind of pocket fandom. In the original fic, one of the characters publishes an open letter to their queer fans which included the line that if you are queer and alive in this world, then he was proud of you. "Queer and Alive" was immediately adopted as a kind of rallying cry. It has been included in further stories and the idea for a pin was born.

All profits from this fanwork will be split between three charities:

  • Urban Native Youth Two-Spirit Collective
  • Ali Forney Center
  • UK Lesbian and Gay Immigration Group

 

How this is going to work

As much as I would like to sell pins as and when people want them, I'm afraid that requires the kind of capital that I don't have to hand. With a high enough number of preorders, I'll be able to place the order for the pins and ship them out. 

Here's where your money will go:

  • Production of 25mm metal and hard enamel pin badges with backing cards.
  • Shipping costs and materials.
  • Three charitable donations to the above organisations.

 

Warlock Party House/Slow Show Support Group Shout Out

Whaddup, my friends. You're all as strange as anything and I love you. Spread this campaign for me, please? Help a Lur out!

Minor Housekeeping

Header art is lovingly stolen from TheChekhov (with permission) and mangled by me. The pin art is mine and is approximately how the pin will appear; it was the winning design from the latest survey. Darling mia-ugly has given her blessing to this venture, as bizarre as we both find it. I hope to have the pins go to production in late January, early February with a shipping date in March. I'm shipping from the UK which means that tracking on shipping will cost extra, please take note of that.

I'm Lurlur/Luritto and you can direct all your yelling at me.

story:
SHOES WITH A SMALL FOOTPRINT 

The idea behind our shoes is to keep the environmental footprint as small as possible. However, we don't compromise on comfort, style nor durability.

 

PICK YOUR STYLE

Our first model comes in two different colors - black and white or all black. If the campaign is off to a good start we will let you choose a third color as a stretch goal. D'BRIS fits for all genders and is available in sizes 36-46 EU (5.5-12 US).

BLACK AND WHITE

ALL BLACK 

 

OUR SHOES ARE TRASH 

Whether the materials are made from oil, organic plants, or the skin from an animal, everything has a negative impact on the environment. The less raw material the better. That is why we use repurposed or recycled materials.   

The majority of the outer soles are made from car tires, which is complemented with a mix of natural rubber and recycled rubber scraps. The upper canvas is made from high-quality polyester yarn made from 100% recycled post-consumer plastic. Between 5-10% of this is captured directly from the oceans and beaches by local fishermen and NGOs. On the inside, we have added cotton to increase the comfort of the shoe. The cotton is 50% recycled and the other 50% is certified organic cotton. Same thing with the laces. The insoles are made from PU, EVA, and cork, all recycled scraps from the factory. D’BRIS shoes help preserve natural resources and keep the oceans cleaner.    

 

RETHINK CONSUMPTION

 

We make shoes, but our purpose goes beyond. We want to open people’s eyes to how our habits are harming the planet we so much depend on. We want to inspire others to take action and enforce a necessary change that is long overdue. #rethinkconsumption

"We live in an era where people just buy and sell and products are getting cheaper. When you live like this you lose your consciousness. D’BRIS helps transform bad habits into a good one. ” - Pro surfer - Miguel Blanco

 

HANDMADE IN SPAIN. NOT CHINA.  

We have partnered up with a manufacturer in Spain that has made shoes for more than half a century. The factory is at the forefront when it comes to sustainability using solar power and recycling leftover materials. Most materials are also sourced close by in Spain. For us, it was vital that all our partners/suppliers in our supply chain shared the same principles as ourselves when it comes to working conditions, fair wages, and time off to enjoy life outside of work. 

 

PERKS

 

SIZING

The shoes will be available in EU sizes 36-46.

Sending products back and forth has an impact on the environment so we appreciate it if you order the right size from the start plus we want the shoes to fit you right. 

Measure your feet to determine your size: 

1. Place a paper on the floor with one side touching a wall.
2. Place one of your feet on top of the paper with the heel touching the wall. 
3. Use a pen to mark your longest toe in the paper.
4. Measure from the edge of the paper (where your heel was) to the marking.
5. Look in the following table which size to order. 

 

Don't buy our shoes if you already have shoes that serve their purpose. You can still support us by sharing our project, or donating some money, and let us pick up some trash in return. If you buy our shoes we don't want them to collect dust in a wardrobe. We want them to be used, and for a long time until they are totally worn out. Then and only then we can make a difference. #rethinkconsumption

TEAM

Magnus and Joe, Co-founders

Magnus is a Swedish environmentalist and has 5+ years of working in start-ups. He is highly skilled in launching products and bringing them to the market. He holds an MSc in Industrial Engineering and Management with a focus on entrepreneurship and marketing. 

Joe is a Californian ocean lover who has 4+ years of working with startups.  He is highly skilled in sales, building teams, and making connections. He holds a double BA in Marketing and Political Science.

BCOME,  Sustainability & Textile Advisors

 

WHY SHOES

D’BRIS comes from the word debris. Debris means scattered pieces of trash or remains. That is what D’BRIS shoes are made from. Our shoes are trash.  It all began at a skatepark while complaining over a broken shoe and the lack of sustainable options. Shoes get worn out quickly and as surfers, we have experienced first-hand pollution in the oceans.

 It took more than a year to get here and a half-year goose chase through France, Italy, Portugal, and Spain to find transparent suppliers to make this project come to life. This was no easy task. Getting laughed at by the major fashion suppliers for textile companies at a tradeshow is really what fueled our vision and curiosity. We asked 100’s of industry leaders why there aren't more sustainable options on the market?  No one had a clear answer.

To date, we have managed to make a competitively priced handcrafted shoe made from ocean plastic and car tires. We aim to inspire other companies and industries to take similar courses in actions when it comes to sustainability in order to ensure a brighter future for our planet.

Risks and challenges

We have been through a crazy but exciting journey with a lot of learnings getting to the point where we are at today. We have met a lot of people and made sure to surround ourselves with experts who have produced shoes for a long time. For this reason, we are confident that the production will run smoothly. Having worked with similar logistic projects before, we know there will always be some problems, but we have partnered up with some great partners also here and we are ready to tackle any problem coming our way to make sure every backer gets their D’BRIS shoes delivered on time and with expected quality.

story:
Graphic T's have become a staple in the fashion industry. The T-shirt, in general, is one of the most important articles of clothing in any person’s wardrobe. It can be perfectly paired with a great pair of jeans or worn with just the right jacket to make an outfit pop. T-shirts with unique, original designs provide the added benefit of helping the wearer truly express his or her personality literally on their chest.

 

 

This is a story of an art designer and his newest medium. For many years, Fakebum was synonymous with skateboard designs. Since 2011, our designs have been sought after by skateboard enthusiast around the world. While we love this medium and the skateboarding community, we realize that Fakebum is so much more than a one medium type of company. That is why we are introducing Fakebum Graphic T’s.

 

Fakebum prides itself on custom made, Original artwork that is both unique and made from the highest quality material. Our Graphic T’s meet these standards and more. Each design is an artist original design, These designs have never seen the light of day before they are printed on your new Graphic T.

 

The design was cultivated through hours and hours of extensive market research. We tested numerous colors and design ideas. We took into account the way individuals feel about certain colors and designs. We painstakingly analyzed all of the collected data and tested thousands of ideas before arriving at our Epic Design.

 

The result of this dedication is an absolutely original, EPIC artistic masterpiece that perfectly expresses your unique style.

The original design is meant to be a lasting piece of artistic creativity that will remain in your mind, your heart, and your wardrobe forever.

 

The design is not the only piece of this creative puzzle. Our team has spent hours researching the best quality materials to bring you a t-shirt that will never wear out.

We spoke with numerous production companies and manufacturers to find the most comfortable and highest quality material available on the market. This is 100% Combed Cotton & Screen printed using water based discharge inks. Compared to the other materials on the market, which wear easily and often fade into oblivion, this material is the only material that is quality enough to sport the Fakebum logo and our original designs.

 

 

While we have designed most of the shirts in-house, we have also chosen to work with extremely talented artists to help create these custom Fakebum shirts for the person who wants to stand out in the crowd.

 

 

 

The purpose of this campaign is looking to help us produce 100 limited edition black & white Fakebum t-shirts that are only available to backers of this campaign. The money raised will help us pay for advertising, production and allowing Fakebum Graphic T’s to be a household name.

 

SIZE:

 

Our unique, EPIC Fakebum designs will be etched into your brains forever, sneaking into your dreams and allowing you to be the envy of your friends!

 

For close to a decade we have been the name in graphic design for unique quality and great artwork. Now we are working hard to extend our brand and be the name in fashion for quality and unique, memorable, bold style. We are asking for your help to help make this new market for Fakebum a reality. This is truly a passion project, allowing us to showcase our unique, original artwork on a quality branded t-shirt that can create the Fakebum legacy.

 

Please back our campaign and receive you own limited addition Fakebum t-shirt.

Make sure to tell your friends and help spread the word.

You will be a part of fashion history, helping us create the highest quality wearable art!

Remember, only the first 100 backers will have the opportunity to receive our limited edition Black & White Graphic T! Do not miss your opportunity to be among the chosen few!

 

A Big Thank You

Pointhouse Studios - For the great short film used in this pitch. Rob did a fantastic job in getting the feel and the right look for this video. (www.pointhousestudios.com)

Taylor Harford – For the great photography. Taylor is and up and coming commercial photographer and he was able to set the atmosphere for the shirts exactly how we imagined it to be. (www.taylorharford.com)

Bramantya Ardhy - For the amazing artwork. It is a pleasure working with Bramantya, great artist and he always understands exactly what we have in mind for our projects.(www.instagram.com/molegraphic/) 

 

Thank you so much for your support from all of us at FakeBum ;)

The money raised will help us pay for advertising, production and allowing Fakebum Graphic T’s to be a household name. SIZE: Our unique, EPIC Fakebum designs will be etched into your brains forever, sneaking into your dreams and allowing you to be the envy of your friends! For close to a decade we have been the name in graphic design for unique quality and great artwork. Now we are working hard to extend our brand and be the name in fashion for quality and unique, memorable, bold style. We are asking for your help to help make this new market for Fakebum a reality. This is truly a passion project, allowing us to showcase our unique, original artwork on a quality branded t-shirt that can create the Fakebum legacy. Please back our campaign and receive you own limited addition Fakebum t-shirt.Make sure to tell your friends and help spread the word.You will be a part of fashion history, helping us create the highest quality wearable art!Remember, only the first 100 backers will have the opportunity to receive our limited edition Black & White Graphic T! Do not miss your opportunity to be among the chosen few! A Big Thank YouPointhouse Studios - For the great short film used in this pitch. Rob did a fantastic job in getting the feel and the right look for this video. (www.pointhousestudios.com)Taylor Harford – For the great photography. Taylor is and up and coming commercial photographer and he was able to set the atmosphere for the shirts exactly how we imagined it to be. (www.taylorharford.com)Bramantya Ardhy - For the amazing artwork. It is a pleasure working with Bramantya, great artist and he always understands exactly what we have in mind for our projects.(www.instagram.com/molegraphic/)  Thank you so much for your support from all of us at FakeBum ;)

story:
~ Updates

04/23/2013 - We are so excited and grateful for all the support we have received so far! We are working extremely hard to promote our campaign and we need your help. Every dollar counts, and please share our campaign with your preferred network. We have finalized the designs for our Baby Book, check them out here http://ourstorypaperco.com/blog 

 

 

~ Our philosophy. Our goal. Our Mission. 

Bringing people's hearts together is our brand philosophy.

Our Story Paper Co. is a design and publication startup based in Toronto, Canada with a focus on fresh, stylish and eco-friendly paper products. We want to share our passion for life with you through our curated products. 

All of our paper products are printed locally in Toronto, Canada and are inspected and assembled in our studio by hand. We use FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) and Rainforest Alliance-certified paper stocks with recycled content, environmentally responsible printers, and select high quality materials that allow for products that are both well-made and enhance our designs. Everything that we create is well thought to ensure a collection of quality products that we would not only use but are incredibly proud of. You can say that each and every single of our product is made with plenty of love along the way. 

Our goal is to provide an eco-friendly alternative, as opposed to the not-so-recyclable materials that are easily accessible and mass produced, mainly overseas. This reduces the distance that a product has traveled before it reaches you, thereby reducing the overall environmental impact. It also ensures that the money you spend supports local, small businesses. We want to provide you a place for eco-friendly products that are in the same price range as the others.

Our Story Paper Co. will create eco-friendly quality products that would not compromise on style and design.

This is our mandate. This is why we need you to help us begin strengthening out roots in this eco-friendly campaign.

 

~ Our team.

D e l i a    Xiong | Creative Director & Chief Designer   

With the loving nudge and support from her family and friends, she created Our Story Paper Co. Bringing people's hearts together with her designed goodness is and always will be her passion. Nothing makes her more joyious and proud than seeing someone happy with her works. Focused to create an innovative line of creatively designed, eco-friendly and quanlity products. She began with the modern baby book , something that she holds very close to her heart because she believes that the precious memories, stories and milestones of a young life should be documented in a well designed book to showcase the unique journey. Having travelled around the world, eco-friendly is something that she firmly believes in because she has seen first hand the detrimental effects of our carbon footprints on our environment.      

M e l i s s a    Doyle | Community Manager a.k.a PR Girl   

Melissa is a multimedia professional with skills in Marketing, PR and Journalism. She studied at the University of Guelph-Humber, where she received her Honours Degree in Media Studies and Diploma in Journalism. She has always had a passion for social media, specifically the use of Twitter and Facebook. Her numerous media experience includes working with Today's Bride, Weddingbells, Futureale Magazine, Parents Canada, Richmond Hill Public Library, One80 Youth Newspaper, Lithium Magazine, Faze Magazine, Toronto International Film Festival and the Royal Ontario Museum.                

 

~ Our project. 

We are currently working on a baby scrap with a modern and stylish design to act as a perfect backdrop for your treasured memories.  

We dubbed it The Modern Baby Book.
 
Every parent only has so many precious moment's with their child. While technology is the way of the future, it is not a constant. We've all had crashing hard drives and batteries die. Even the e-book is only as good as the energy in it's respective device. You can't share it , and it is only good for one person. True paper and books are shareable and last a lifetime.
Our Modern Baby Book is what you have been waiting for. Why bother with a big hot mess of a book, when you can neatly tuck this one into your diaper bag, between grocery shopping ( for formulas ) or at yoga.
Also, it is completely personalization- friendly . Just like snowflakes, no two babies are the same. This book treats your every need, with photo-inserts between giggles and burps, and lined notepaper in colourful shades for those first few steps and words.
 

The journal pages are sized at 7.75 " x 7.5" in a 9" x 8" fabric bound chipboard binder, with a square window in the front for customization with a name insert. It has 56 pages of designed journalist pages with over 100 journal prompts. It also comes with a 12-month calendar to remember your baby's first year. The chipboard binder contains recycled material and is covered with North American sourced fabrics. The pages are printed on heavy acid free archival quality cover stock paper. Our paper is FSC (Forest Stewardship Council), Rainforest Alliance, SFI (Sustainable Forestry Initiative) certified and contains 10% post consumer recycled content. With a dedication towards economic growth within North America, our baby books are produced right here in Canada using US sourced fabrics.

 

~ It's all in the Details.

Check our gallery for more pictures of our baby book and name insert details. 

We regularly updates our blog, so be sure to check us out there as well! http://ourstorypaperco.com/blog

 

~ Why $2500? The Break Down

* To produce our first print run, there is a minimum production quantity requirement from our printing and manufaturing partners. Here is our breakdown. 

$1300 - binders to make the books for our first print run
$800 - printing (for our first run)
$300 - fabric for binder covering (our first run)
$100  - incidentals 

*$2500 only covers the basic costs of our first production run.  Any additional funds that we raise with your help, would go towards research and development of new products, so we continue to bring you beautiful innovative modern eco-friendly products. We have so many ideas, help us achieve them and be part of our eco-friendly mission. 

 

~ Awesome Perks just for you!

Please do check out our gallery as well for more information & updates!

 

 

~Let's talk :) We are quite social. 

 Here are some other ways that you can help:

  • Share our tweets twitter.com/ourstorypaperco

  • Like us on Facebook and share with your friends https://www.facebook.com/pages/Our-Story-Paper-...

  • Visit us at http://ourstorypaperco.com and connect with us via our blog http://ourstorypaperco.com/blog :)

  • Share this campaign on your preferred social network.

     

We thank you in advance for all of your help and encouragement. Even if all you do is leave a comment it would mean the world to us! 

Don't forget, you make this world awesome :)

~ Awesome Perks just for you!
Please do check out our gallery as well for more information & updates!
 
 


~Let's talk :) We are quite social. 
 Here are some other ways that you can help:


Share our tweets twitter.com/ourstorypaperco


Like us on Facebook and share with your friends https://www.facebook.com/pages/Our-Story-Paper-...

Visit us at http://ourstorypaperco.com and connect with us via our blog http://ourstorypaperco.com/blog :)


Share this campaign on your preferred social network.
 

   
We thank you in advance for all of your help and encouragement. Even if all you do is leave a comment it would mean the world to us! 
Don't forget, you make this world awesome :)

story:
A Little About Me

Before I start asking for your money, allow me to introduce myself. My name is Alex Miller and I dove into the world of graphic design a few years ago. I've come pretty far in a short amount of time if I don't say so myself.

A good workspace, needs improvement 

I have built up a decent workspace by selling my old Nexus 7 and some other things to build a designers PC. These days, I'm kicking myself for thinking I could just grab another tablet as soon as work picked up. 

I've been commissioned to help redesign the UI of a popular Android app. To do this properly I need to, among many other things, test out the experience for myself. On a variety of devices. 

By contributing to this campaign you will help my workflow immensely and allow me to broaden my spectrum of clientele as well as help me deliver a more organic user experience for them.

Basically, I need a tablet...

I don't actually need $800.00. I really only need around $400.00 for an Asus Nexus 7 and some Android specific design tools, but a 10 inch tablet will be necessary in the future so if I can hit that goal that would be awesome, if not, that's cool too.

story:
Safety Stix  is the culmination of an investor and a scientist witnessing what we see daily in the news: daterape. Sitting over lunch one day, they decided that they had the smarts and the time to invest into making a way to alarm innocent people of drugged beverages. Dr. Richard Knop, the lead Research and Development scientist said "If we can save just one girl, wouldn't that be worth it?" They got to work soon thereafter. After 7 years of investing time and money, they finally had the correct molecular reaction. Months later, their patent was in the works and ultimately approved as an effective way to test for the presence of daterape drugs in beverages.

 

 If you can't afford a donation, but are passionate about stopping this problem, share this project!  Get the word out!  Between our servicemembers overseas and our loved ones here at home, there is bound to be someone that has been affected directly or indirectly by daterape drugs.  Let's reduce those numbers together!

story:
OUR Dream

The StrapHolster is new fashion technology which simply wraps around your bag strap(s), stays together with the sewn in magnets, and with the sewn in silicone grip, your bag will not slip! 

 

I, Neil Patrick Kassinger, am the inventor, founder and CEO of StrapHolster Company. Being a full-time student at the University of Southern Indiana, I will graduate this May. It is my dream to launch this company before I graduate and be able to help milliions of women around the world with this problem!  

In order to fulfill this dream, I need to take as many orders as possible to attract a local investor for our company! 

 

Like us on FACEBOOK.COM/StrapHolster

story:
My Story

I am an artist who has been creating in various mediums for over 20 years. I started in high school with drawing, printmaking, and photography, and continued in college majoring in fine art, with a focus on drawing and photography.

When I became a mother, I discovered my love for sewing, making unique handmade accessories for my children and family, and discovered my "niche". I made and sold items sporadically and seasonally at local craft shows and small boutiques, while working full time and raising my family. Ten years and one huge economic downfall later, I am am ready to take this basement hobby to the next level. 


My products include handmade shoes, bags, wallets, jewelry and accessories, "upcycled" and refashioned clothing, original mixed media art prints, and a variety of other unique and inspiring pieces.


WHY YOU SHOULD CARE

My Piece of Peace is my Dream Job, my version of the Great American Dream, to work from home creating beautiful, unique, useful, and inspiring things while teaching my children and family that hard work and perseverance is all you need, along with the support of your friends, family, and community.

I am committed to sustainable business practices. From fabrics to creating sustainable economic conditions in my own community. If I get the funding for my small business, I can pass work on to other moms who need to make money for their families, help support my own and put meaningful products into the marketplace.  I will also use sustainable and recycled fabrics that have low or little impact from the field to the factory. It is a chance to bring to bear all of the hard work I have put into this and finally be able to take my vision and make it a reality. What that means to other folks is that by bringing this new collection to market, it will help strengthen my little community that really needs new jobs and business to thrive!


What We Need 

(Let's face it... No matter how talented you are, you have to have money before you can start really making money...) My goal is to raise $3000 dollars to get this business off the basement floor and soaring to new heights. Here is the basic breakdown:


$500 - Professional grade sewing machine

$300 - A quality printer to be used for business materials, shipping labels, tags, etc.

$400 - Vending supplies... to take it on the road to arts and craft shows, music festivals, etc.

$300 - Professional quality garment tags and labels

$500 - Advertising, web design

$1000 - Initial order of natural fabrics and other raw materials needed for production.


BUT WAIT!!!!! There's MORE!!!! What's in it for YOU????


There is no such thing as a free lunch, and I don't expect my backers to walk away empty handed!! So here are some of the perks for each level of backing:


First of all, everyone who "likes" my facebook page gets an automatic 10% discount on any purchase. This is instant and will never expire!!

My Piece of Peace on Facebook


Financial contributions:

$1-$9.99 gets you my eternal thanks for believing in me, my mission, and my craft!

$10.00 gets you an Original Art Print, 8x10 inches in size, signed and dated by me.

$15.00 gets you a handmade zippered wristlet, in your choice of colors and styles.

$25.00 gets you a handmade tote bag, in your choice of colors and styles

$35.00 gets you a custom pair of handmade shoes, in your choice of fabrics and size.

$75.00 gets you the wristlet, tote, and shoes... They can all be customized just for you!

$100.00 gets you a custom repurposed army jacket with your choice of custom appliques and creative details.

$250.00 gets you a custom mixed-media painting which we will design together!!!


Other Ways You Can Help

Here's when I ask you to do ..... go above and beyond ..... PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE spread the word!!! Tell friends, family, coworkers, post information on your Facebook, Twitter, Myspace, anywhere!!! If you believe in grass roots movements, handmade, and most importantly American made... again tell your neighbors, have a bake sale, whatever you can think of to get the word out. All help is appreciated and needed. Thanks to all for everything!

story:
ASCENT Classic is our modern interpretation of super compressor (SC) style design automatic watch featuring dual crowns with an internal rotating bezel. The history of SC diver watches can be traced back from the late 1950s to the early 1970s. The crown at 4 o’clock is used to wind the movement and set time. The crown at 2 o’clock is used to rotate the internal bezel operates by a little star gear for timing a dive. Unlike typical dive watches, the Ascent has a modern sleek look baring an iconic design with lots of history behind it. 

We are also introducing the ASCENT Skull Limited Edition 300. One of the most common symbolic use of the skull design is as a representation of death and mortality. The ASCENT Skull incorporates a menacing skull design with a layered dial exposing its rotating escape wheel, part of the mechanical movement through its mouth. The Ascent Skull serves as a constant reminder that time is precious, one should seize every second in their life and live life to the fullest. 

Classic vs Unconventional. We are very excited about this new launch and looking forward to your support in this campaign.

What others say about ASCENT:

Shane Snider (Owner of WATCHA): "Advisor's new ASCENT model bring bold design and value to the microbrand landscape. This is definitely a watch worth adding to your collection."

Mike Richmond (Founder of WRUK.co.uk): "If you are in the market for a unique-looking automatic watch with great specs and bargain price, you won't go far wrong with an Advisor ASCENT. "

Qile Wah (Founder of WahSoShiok.com): The Advisor ASCENT Skeleton Skull bring a new, modern twist to the vintage super compressor design - I don't think I've seen a skeletonised super compressor before! It's a striking timepiece available at an extremely affordable price."

Erik Martin (Founder of WatchAddictChannel.com): The Advisor ASCENT takes traditional super compressor style hints from the past combined with modern materials and design which mesh together perfectly."

Joseph VO (Owner of Visual Orgasm Tattoo Studio): "ASCENT is a timeless classic with a unique style which defines the simplicity of time. A watch which weighs heavier in style than price." 

Chris Thorn (Watch Reviewer at TheWatchLounge): "Advisor ASCENT is a great looking piece for the discerning watch collector. If you have one last watch to back for 2018, it has to be ASCENT." 

Tony Li (Owner of HK Diver Watches Group):  "Advisor Ascent 質素十分之高，造功打磨都處於高水平，設計亦顯出設計者的心思，本人對此系列評價十分之高，大家一定不可錯過."

The Specs (Classic):

The ASCENT Collection are available in 6 different versions: 

The Details:

The ASCENT Classic sunburst dial is based on a design consisting of a central disk with radiating spires projecting in the manner of sunbeams. The Classic series have four variations of sunburst dial in black, white, blue and green.

The ASCENT Skull Limited Edition features skeleton layered open heart dial (Brushed black or rosegold) for wearer to peek into the moving escaping wheel exposing three red jewels of the automatic movement. An unusual combo here where typical open heart watch display its balance wheel of the automatic movement instead. 

The ASCENT custom-made case uses 316L Stainless steel. It is a grade of stainless steel that has extra-low carbon content and is extremely resistant to corrosion such as seawater or acidic liquids. Most major luxury watch companies applies 316L for the overall well-rounded advantages.

The ASCENT features industrial-look dual crowns with an internal rotating bezel. The crown at 4 was used to wind the movement and set the time/date. The crown at 2 was used to rotate the internal diver’s bezel. This unique look has been used to mimic the super compressor design, and really is iconic in its own right. The crown are signed with Advisor Logo.

The ASCENT comes with 200 meter depth rating. Good enough to bring it for any advantageous outing.  

The ASCENT embossed back case design features a diver facing off a monster octopus. How we handle our fears will determine where we go with the rest of our lives. Fear and anxiety can stop us in our paths to success and hold us back. The case back artwork symbolizes one to face his/her fear with strength and courage. It may be tough, we may feel uneasy, but to move forward, it is essential. Face your fear, overcome it! 

The ASCENT uses sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating. Sapphire is extremely strong and scratch resistant – making it the top choice for our timepiece.

The strap are made of quality genuine calf leather stamped with Advisor Logo on the inlay.  A strap that's built to endure and comes in vintage black & brown tone with stark white contrast stitching to completes it classic appearance. 

The applied indexes on dial, internal rotating bezel and hands are applied with BGW9 / C3 Luminous. 

The ASCENT series uses two different type of automatic movement. For the classic version, NH35a (by Seiko) has been used. The NH35a movement is hand-windable and features a hacking function. A hacking function means the second hand stops when the crown is pulled out.  

For the Skull LE version, 82S0 (by Miyota) is used. The 82S0 is from the 8215/821A family but offers a skeletonized dial design which fits well into the skull design. 

Both the Japanese movement are known to be a reliable and fairly accurate automatic movement which is why it has become one of the most popular automatic movements for many micro watch brands.

Swiss ETA version of ASCENT Classic (limited to 10 pieces worldwide)

Pricing:

Timeline:

Risks and challenges

We have the experience through launching our AstroHelm collection last year. Our manufacturers stand ready to start production as soon as we meet our Kickstarter and Indiegogo funding goal when the campaign ends. We will continue to keep backers updated during and after the campaign until the delivery of every watch to the backers.

Reach us on: 
https://www.advisorwatches.com/ 
https://www.facebook.com/advisorwatches 
Email: advisorwatches@gmail.com
story_txt: ASCENT Classic is our modern interpretation of super compressor (SC) style design automatic watch featuring dual crowns with an internal rotating bezel. The history of SC diver watches can be traced back from the late 1950s to the early 1970s. The crown at 4 o’clock is used to wind the movement and set time. The crown at 2 o’clock is used to rotate the internal bezel operates by a little star gear for timing a dive. Unlike typical dive watches, the Ascent has a modern sleek look baring an iconic design with lots of history behind it. We are also introducing the ASCENT Skull Limited Edition 300. One of the most common symbolic use of the skull design is as a representation of death and mortality. The ASCENT Skull incorporates a menacing skull design with a layered dial exposing its rotating escape wheel, part of the mechanical movement through its mouth. The Ascent Skull serves as a constant reminder that time is precious, one should seize every second in their life and live life to the fullest. Classic vs Unconventional. We are very excited about this new launch and looking forward to your support in this campaign.What others say about ASCENT:Shane Snider (Owner of WATCHA): "Advisor's new ASCENT model bring bold design and value to the microbrand landscape. This is definitely a watch worth adding to your collection."Mike Richmond (Founder of WRUK.co.uk): "If you are in the market for a unique-looking automatic watch with great specs and bargain price, you won't go far wrong with an Advisor ASCENT. "Qile Wah (Founder of WahSoShiok.com): The Advisor ASCENT Skeleton Skull bring a new, modern twist to the vintage super compressor design - I don't think I've seen a skeletonised super compressor before! It's a striking timepiece available at an extremely affordable price."Erik Martin (Founder of WatchAddictChannel.com): The Advisor ASCENT takes traditional super compressor style hints from the past combined with modern materials and design which mesh together perfectly."Joseph VO (Owner of Visual Orgasm Tattoo Studio): "ASCENT is a timeless classic with a unique style which defines the simplicity of time. A watch which weighs heavier in style than price." Chris Thorn (Watch Reviewer at TheWatchLounge): "Advisor ASCENT is a great looking piece for the discerning watch collector. If you have one last watch to back for 2018, it has to be ASCENT." Tony Li (Owner of HK Diver Watches Group):  "Advisor Ascent 質素十分之高，造功打磨都處於高水平，設計亦顯出設計者的心思，本人對此系列評價十分之高，大家一定不可錯過."The Specs (Classic):The ASCENT Collection are available in 6 different versions: The Details:The ASCENT Classic sunburst dial is based on a design consisting of a central disk with radiating spires projecting in the manner of sunbeams. story:
Short Summary

BLACK DIAMONDS ARE UNIQUE, EXCITING, AND SPECIAL!  We have created a new collection of Black Diamond Jewelry at amazing values.

 

Choose a beautiful Indian Opalite Cuff to float gracefully or gently hug your wrist.

 

 

Live For Gems uses the minimalist approach to say the maximum.

 

We use International designers to create unique styles that can take everyone from day to play!  In the past it has been celebrities that flaunt Black Diamonds.  Now we want Black Diamonds to be affordable for everyone.

 

Put a Black Diamond on your ear, wrist, or neck.  Gift one and the thought will last forever like the Black Diamonds.  They belong everywhere!

We created a collection with exquisite style at reasonable prices. We want to make a profound jewelry collection for today's modern man and woman.

 

Today's Treasure will become a family heirloom tomorrow!

Black Diamonds, also called Carbonado, are the toughest form of natural diamond. They are found primarily in the Central African Republic and in Brazil. They are opaque diamonds with a black color that come in only one color-intensity - Black. They owe their color to the inclusion of graphite and random clustering throughout the diamond. The Black Diamonds are treated with High Pressure and High Temperature (HPHT) to enhance their color.

Each Black Diamond piece of jewelry will come with a Certificate of Authenticity. The brilliance and luster of these Earth mined diamonds will last forever. In addition to helping me design Black Diamond Jewelry for everyone, you will have a new family heirloom to pass down for generations. 

To pledge to our project, Click the pink “Back It” button on the right hand column.  Next, select the perk you'd like to receive and your pledge amount will automatically populate. Then fill in all information.

Indian Opalite Silver Cuff Bracelet                          $15.00

Black Diamond 10mm Faceted Pendant               $25.00

Black Diamond Dangling Earrings                           $65.00

Black Diamond Earrings -1 Carat                             $80.00

Black Diamond Pendant - 1 Carat                            $80.00

Black Diamond Earrings - 2 Carat                          $135.00

Black Diamond Pendant - 3 Carat                          $150.00

Black Diamond 5mm Bracelet                                 $150.00

Black Diamond Earrings - 4 Carat                          $200.00

Black Diamond Pendant - 5 Carat                          $300.00

Black Diamond 6mm Bracelet                                 $300.00

Black Diamond 10mm Bracelet                               $400.00

Black Diamond 5mm 36" Necklace                        $500.00

Necklace + Bracelet Combo 6mm                          $800.00

Necklace + Bracelet Combo 10mm                      $1000.00

Black Diamond 5 Ct. Designer Pendant              $1000.00

Items are in Production and will be delivered in August!

 

Live For Gems wants to give back to the people who are involved in making this project come to the market. Black Diamonds often come from countries with economic hardships. Live For Gems will donate 5 books for every backer pledge to children in need. “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world,” said Nelson Mandela. We want to empower and inspire young people to learn to read and change the cycle of poverty. Your pledge will have an impact on the lives of children in need.

story:
Thermnetic is the next generation of cutting-edge battery heated base layer to deliver you the ultimate warmth. The technologically advanced nanocarbon heat elements are infused into the 100% 4-way stretch cotton fabric to help you stay comfortable in uncomfortable climates. It is also designed with some of the best moisture-wicking, antimicrobial materials in the industry to give you an enduring fresh feeling. With Thermenetic, you can ride further, work harder, and do more in the most challenging weather conditions.

 

Thermnetic has 2 diffusive heat zones to help you stay warm (battery not included): one on your chest and another on your upper back. This technology allows heating across your chest and back, you get all-around heating. Just press the button on the power pack to adjust the heat settings. Great for outdoor activities, trips, and even for casual everyday use.

 

 

Most traditional heated clothings position the built-in panels in the neck and back areas, which might result in discomfort. However, Thermnetic has high-performance carbon fiber interwoven in the fabric making it imperceptible to see and touch, providing extreme comfort and flexibility.

Only 3 steps to warm up your body:

  • Plug in the power pack and place it in your pocket
  • Push to start – Press and hold the power button for 3 seconds until it turns red.
  •  Push again to adjust – Press the button again to adjust the heating levels. 

Take the power pack out of your pocket and adjust the heating level, instead of reaching for the button typically buried underneath layers of clothing.

It is so compact and lightweight you’ll forget it’s even there. Easily cycle between three different heat settings with a click of the LED button.

Under rigorous testing Thermnetic was found to provide instant warmth of 30°c (85°f) in just 3 minutes in extremely cold conditions. Your results may vary depending on the capacity of the power pack used.

Thermnetic allows for three heating levels to get you to the perfect temperature in just 3 minutes. At high you’ll get around 115-120 °F(46-49℃) of heat, at the medium you’ll get 110-115 °F(43-46℃) of heat, and at low, you’ll get 105-110 °F(41-43℃) of heat.

With the Thermnetic shirt, you can easily deal with night and day temperature differences.

You can rely on our heated gear to perform up to your demands for about 7 hours of heat per charge. It can be recharged by your trusty rusty ubiquitous lightning or Type-C cable. It features 9 intelligent protections for safe transportation by air and an easy-to-read screen showing remaining power in percentage. You can also use it to charge other digital devices such as mobile phones, tablets, etc.

Silver interrupts the bacteria cell’s ability to proliferate. Thermnetic utilizes silver fabrics to suppress the reproduction of bacteria, which cause odor.

Thermnetic is made from fabric that is breathable, flexible, lightweight, and quick-drying.

You won’t even notice you’re wearing it, except for the incredible warmth it provides.

It conforms to movement and ensures you’re as mobile as possible. You’ll never feel restricted while hiking, motorcycle riding, skiing, or engaging in winter activities.

You may think Thermnetic is hard to wash since it contains carbon fiber.

In reality, this base layer is machine washable the same as any other clothing. Machine-drying is also allowed at temperatures under 160F. 

 

  • Material: Outer shell 100% Cotton, Inner 100% Polyester
  • Heating zones: chest & back
  • Power source: 1 x 10000mAh Li-ion polymer battery
  • Heating time: up to 8 hours
  • Temperature adjustment ranges: 3 levels, from 110~120°F (43~49°C)
  • Color: heather blue and heather red

story:
Our Story

My Name is Isaac A, I am the Owner and Founder of UniversalMindFuck Clothing Company. I began the thinking Process for the Brand in 2007 and began creating Actual products in the spring of 2011 in Buffalo,Ny. 
I began the company with a simple vision in mind, to get the consumer to once again think about the product they buy and wear. i started out releasing one t-shirt that quickly turned into another, done in 6 colorways. I was Fortunate enough  to be able to release  spring and summer Collections consisting of 2-4 tees in different colorways. Now my plan is to release a Full contemporary line consisting of 10 different T-shirt designs as well as 6-8 different sweaters (Hoodies,Pull-Overs,Crew-necks, Etc) as well as Hats and Accessories. My problem herein lies in that All my Finances are wrapped up in product or Bills.


The Impact

The intended Impact of my Campaign is to have others begin to use their minds again. Many, Many clothing brands simply have you buy their products with no real thought nor intended relationship. With this brand we want you to know what we mean with everything, and receive constant feedback from the consumer be it good,bad, or indifferent.  If the Campaign doesn't happen, The line will be released one way or another through the grace of God. 



What We Need & What You Get

NOT ONE CENT OF ANYTHING DONATED WILL GO INTO MY POCKET. 

It will go Directly into production of one of many products I intend to sell for the upcoming Fall Season. Currently I have no other means of funding and anything is appreciated to help Bring to the light a dream and Vision of a Visionary Man. For this reason i need Roughly 6,000 To pay for Production costs, Shipping, and Manufacturing of the various Things I Plan to release. If anything is received and the Goal isn't reached something will still be accomplished regardless. i was able to turn $130 worth of T-shirts into 3 Releases of Tees worth Thousands. If you Decide to Donate the benefits will be plenty. Donations of $49 and less receive a 25% discount the overall Purchases made on our Website, and Donations of $50+ will receive a free article of Merchandise that you get to Choose, being that your Contribution Made it all possible.

story:
Update Nov. 6th:

Unfortunatly, indiegogo has removed me from the browsing page. I'm hidden now from everybody, unless you search me. But we can go around this by spreading the word! Please help me by tweeting, liking or Google plus-ing me :)


Lillis Paper Designs

The Story

I love designing and creating invitations or Christmas cards that are easily adapted to your own events and languages and can be printed at home. 

It started as me loving to play around with Photoshop. I started to learn more and more, and by the end of High School, I created our poster for Prom. I was so excited to see my creation printed out in big, hanging from all the walls. Family and friends started to ask for invitations and I started to make them… I instantly fell in love with it. I tried to learn more and more about the necessary tools and now I'm finally trying to make this a real project, creating Lillis Paper Designs. Easy at home printable invitations or greeting cards. You just adjust the text to your event and send it to print: Voilà!

Your Help

But as life is, design is not an easy area to grab foot. And this is where indiegogo comes in. I hoped though this to raise enough to at least start with the basic: pay fees, get my website, etc., which I can't afford to pay since I'm paying college.

How does this work?

It's super easy!

I design the invitations and make them PDF's. Mostly you can simply edit the content to fit your event. For example, you can change the names, text, location, or on a greeting card you can change the text to your language.

I make them available on my etsy shop (and with your help, hopefully in the future on my own website), where you can buy them and get them instantly available. There are always both A4 and US Letter sizes, so everybody is included. For greeting cards, I also make a pdf that allows to be printed on moo.com.

Instructions:

1) Open the PDF with Acrobat Reader 
(Please make sure you use Acrobat Reader, if you don't have it, it is free to download and install)

2) To guide you through which fields can be edited, click on "highlight fields" on top. 
The editable fields will turn blue.

3) Edit the names and text, so it will fit your event.

4) Print out as many invitations as you need. 

5) Now it's time to cut the invitations, following the guides.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are on etsy, go visit my shop on etsy.com/shop/LillisPaperDesigns and favorite the designs you like.

story:
Our story is very simple. We are two guys that want to make a clothing brand! Why we are different and what we will offer you? Well, watch the video or keep reading (or both) and very soon you will understand. We hope you like what you will see and help our ordinary story become an epic adventure.
 Thanks in advance for your precious time!

                                                

                 

           








         

        

     

 Here is a sneak peek of our spring stylish design of the web store. We strive to make it easy to use and we want you to feel cozy like you are at home.

Big picture of our "Wall of fame" HERE!

                                             

 

                                             

 We need your support to launch this new clothing brand. We are raising funding for the t-shirts and hoodies we are going to buy, packaging (like cool paper, wooden boxes, etc.), the development and maintenance of the web store. With your help, we can make this story become a real thing and to affect many people with our designs and ideas in the future. 
 Thank you so much for the support!

* Two "Rock your style" stickers!

* The first, the second and the third t-shirt from our limited edition Indiegogo t-shirts!
* You reserved a place on the "Wall of fame" on our future site!

* Three "Rock your style" stickers!
* 5 tomato points (10% discount on our future web store)!

The way you receive your First Collectors Harvest perk:

First Collectors Harvest
* The first t-shirt from our limited edition Indiegogo t-shirts, packed up in beautiful wooden box with your name on it.
* You reserved a place on the "Wall of fame" on our future site!
* Handwritten card ”Thank you for helping me to grow up, (your name here)” packed up in letter with "Stylish tomato" wax seal!
* "Rock your style" sticker!
* 1 Indiegogo tomato point (6% constant discount in our future web store)!

The way you receive your Second Collectors Harvest perk:

Second Collectors Harvest

The way you receive your Third Collectors Harvest perk:

Third Collectors Harvest
* The first, the second and the third t-shirt from our limited edition Indiegogo t-shirts, packed up in beautiful wooden box with your name on it.
* You reserved a place on the "Wall of fame" on our future site!
* Handwritten card ”Thank you for helping me to grow up, (your name here)” packed up in letter with "Stylish tomato" wax seal!
* You reserved a place on the wall of fame on our future site!
* Three "Rock your style" stickers!
* 1 Indiegogo tomato point (6% constant discount in our future web store)!

Some creatures with our clothes. Check out the full gallery HERE.

                                                

The sizes of our tees and hoodies (Chest measured 2.5cm below armhole):

                                             

Who we are?

Dimcho is studying fine and digital arts his whole life. He is our designer and he is making all the beautiful things that you are seeing right now.

Tihomir is our computer ninja. He has more than 6 of years professional experience with web technologies and other cool stuff. He is responsible for making Dimcho’s designs to real, live, clickable things in your web browser.

FAQ:

1. If I want to buy something what do I do?

You click on the perk at the side and you choose to pay for that perk or give a donation. You can then pay with PAYPAL or a credit card, ensuring you give us the correct shipping address.Once approved you will get an automatic email from Indiegogo confirming your purchase. We will update you on our progress throughout the campaign and at the end of the campaign we will send you a email to tell us what is your size.

2. What kind of clothes you will offer at the beginning?

We will launch with male and female crew neck tees in 2 or 3 colors available and hoodie or sweatshirt in one color.

3.What digital printer are you using?
We will print on Kornit Storm II. This is the optimum solution for high-level production DTG businesses and traditional screen printers that are looking towards hybrid apparel decoration enterprises. Its dual-pallet industrial digital inkjet printer for light and dark garments is designed to better meet your need for high production and control while ensuring smooth and continuous production. Printing at an impressive rate of up to 156 t-shirts an hour, our direct-to-garment printer allows for high-volume production for custom print runs. Its advanced, fully automated system is designed to be operated by one person, yet provides full control of the design and resolution for each layer with its improved capabilities for positioning different media types of up to 5 cm. The machine is awesome and it will make our designs live!

4. What technology you will use for the webstore?
We will use the top web technologies right now. Our hosting is at nodejitsu! We are writing the store on meteorJS which uses nodeJS plus MongoDB! And of course HTML5.

5. Some deadlines about the project?
The campaign will finish in January 10 2014. It will take a little time to receive the funds and a little more time to make your perks and send it to you. We think at the latest the end of March is a realistic deadline and we will push ourselves to make it happen in that timeframe.

6. If we don’t reach our goal?
We will make the most of the funds we raised.

7. Other ways we can help?
Of course! You can always share our campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter or somewhere else! Help us spread the word. We will appreciate that a lot and it’s good karma after all : )

Risks and challenges
The challenges will be getting the word out, and convincing people to participate and spread the word. There are so many great projects that we only can hope you like ours too.

story:
BLUETOOTH WEARABLE WATCH band DUET


Duet is comprised of two parts, Digital Watch Module and Bluetooth Core Module.

Smart watch type wristband offers longer usage time without changing battery on Digital Watch and direct notification on emails, messages and incoming calls, fitness and sleep pattern analysis system via Bluetooth Core Module.

With luxurious body and smart design of Duet, show off your fashion style. Enjoy multifarious application including camera remote control, TTS (Text-to-speech), media controller and smart notification with Duet exclusive app.

Relax and enjoy smart lifestyle with Duet's exclusive convenience features.







  • Bluetooth core module features



  • D.I.Y. Accessories
