story:
Flawless materials, luxury French design and last nanotechnologies for lenses come together in the distinguished and versatile Lance eyeglasses. It's more than a simple pair of glasses, it's your day-to-day essential eyeglasses pair and it does things other eyewear can't.

We create the best pair of glasses in the world, composed from hand made traditional luxury glasses frames with the most advanced (features lenses). It adapts to your lifestyle, light and environment.

Fade® Lenses - Eyeglasses and sunglasses, instantly in the same pair

Our transition technology called Fade® Lenses, enables you to have more pairs of glasses in one perfect pair, from plain to digital and sunglasses. Fade Lenses adjust instantly from clear to dark and every shade in between, so life looks way more vivid, vibrant and true.

 

Sharp® Lenses - You can choose between the view lenses and sunglasses lenses. 

Do you want to keep it simple? We thought of you and without making any compromises! Keeping all the functions of our lenses, we created Sharp® Lenses, giving you the possibility to choose between our plain lenses and sunglasses lenses.

In the last year, our team has developed multiple prototypes, perfecting our designs. Different series vary in complexity and style - we are sure you will easily find your favorite. Whenever we sit down to create new frames, we always draw our inspiration from the world around us. We wanted to put French tradition in our product and move it forward by creating a last generation product.

Lance Glasses combines the French design and elegance with the German technology and the quality of Italian materials. Also our glasses are prescription ready. (NO extra charge for this option).

The story of our design begins in Morez (Jura Valley) considered a Silicon Valley of glasses. We have succeeded in combining modern Parisian design inspired by current trends, with French culture and tradition. The story begins in 1796 in Les Arcets, a hamlet in Morez. The ingenious craftsman who had the idea of ​​stretching and twisting a nail to make spectacles was called Pierre-Hyacinthe Caseaux, a nail smith by trade. Continuing this eyewear tradition in the Jura Mountains is a first-class high, a museum of spectacles with exhibitions and interactive workshops, and, in particular, specialised businesses. It is truly established here, to the extent that Morez (Jura Valley) represents 55% of the French eyewear industry.

Every detail is important to us. To ensure a premium quality standard of our glasses, we have worked directly with some of the world's leading eyeglasses suppliers, which, for decades, have produced luxury glasses for high-end brands selling a pair for $350.

Each Lance glasses frame is manually produced in over 80 stages of Italian Acetate, which is lightweight, durable and long lasting. The way our glasses are designed and manufactured will provide the comfort you need to be able to wear your glasses all day without even feeling them.

We know that even the most elegant eyewear frames require some top lenses. We know that this plays an important role in how your glasses will look and feel. That's why Lance Glasses chose to work with the largest German lens maker in developing its technology to deliver a top product.

Carefully selected high-end materials - each Acetate frame is hand-polished – with the polisher’s personal quality seal. Every frame is cut with mechanical precision. For acetate frames, the fronts are tumbled and polished while the temples are stamped, hand smoothed, shaped, and prepared for assembly. Each frame receives one last round of smoothing and shaping by hand, and then is inspected for quality.

We have a fair deal for you. If you feel that the eyeglasses did not meet your expectations, contact us and we will send you a 100% refund. Hurry up and reserve your eyewear. Each model is limited edition so don't miss your favourite model.

We remove all the intermediaries and offer luxury glasses, three times cheaper than the store pricing. Our engineer and co-founder, Karim Bousbaine, has optimized and simplified processes and the management for the largest multinationals all over the world. He has used the experience gained in the last 15 years in the Lance Glasses fabrication process and so we have made this price possible, enabling us to offer you Luxury Limited Edition eyeglasses for less than 100€. 

Did you know that only one company has control over 75% of the global glasses market? Lance Glasses does everything in-house. From design to manufacturing, we control the whole process. You will pay the real price for your glasses.

We know you’re asking yourself: How can you make your pick from all of the different types of eyeglasses frames? Fortunately, we are all different and we know how important your look is, so at this moment our team is working on an application that will allow you to use our camera / laptop and augmented reality to try our glasses before completing the survey form after the campaign’s completion. This will allow you to make the right decision. It’s your frame’s distinct features that make them yours. Finding the right frame style for your face shape might feel tricky, but thankfully our app helps you pick the right frame and it is so easy.

Because you will not only have a pair of glasses, you will have a 20-functions gadget that will meet all of your needs. We recreated luxury glasses by making them accessible to everyone and improving them by adding nanotechnology treated lenses, keeping the classic human aspect of the French design.

Not just simple lenses

Our Sharp® Lenses and Fade® Lenses have nanotechnology coatings. Every lens is cut out with perfection and accuracy. This minimizes distortion in the field of vision.

All of our lenses are maximum UV-protection and provide a 100% filter from harmful UVA, UVB and UVC rays including the blue light from digital screens. The invisible coatings make your glasses your best daily ally adapting to any situation.

The package includes: the glasses you have chosen along with your desired lenses (prescription lenses at no extra cost), microfiber case for cleaning and storage, ecological foldable case, warranty and authenticity certificate, packaging box.

Over the past year, we have developed our brand, perfecting and testing multiple prototypes until reaching perfection. Based in Paris, France , our team comes from different horizons, that makes our company vision richer. Luc is our eyewear industrial designer who worked for many brands over the past 12 years, designing the best collection ever. Karim is our engineer reconverted from the aeronautic and automotive industry that develops the best optics and materials. Liviu is our product developer with a tremendous skill in design, marketing and product development and Gonzague, our production manager, negotiates the best prices and coordinates the production to make sure the quality meets our expectations and beyond. Our philosophy is deliciously simple. We produce a luxury product meeting the standards of the best brands of the market at an honest price.

Photographers : El Duk, Gregoire Chaillet, Leslie Artamanow

Models:  Theo Soenen, Léa Gouaux, Carla Roisnel, Aline Kittiphanh, Urumikanzaky, BK Laure, Manon Raoult, Florian Lathuliere

We offer delivery worldwide for all orders ( except conflict zones*) You will enter your delivery address. Delivery usually takes from 2 to 5 business days, although it's often shorter. Orders are delivered by express courier. You'll receive a tracking number shortly after placing your order, so you can see exactly when it’s scheduled to arrive.

*Conflict zones : Unfortunately, some areas in the world cannot be delivered for political reasons, war zones, simply because express courier don’t operate : Lybia, Syria, Irak. If you have any questions simply contact our team!
story_txt: Flawless materials, luxury French design and last nanotechnologies for lenses come together in the distinguished and versatile Lance eyeglasses. It's more than a simple pair of glasses, it's your day-to-day essential eyeglasses pair and it does things other eyewear can't.We create the best pair of glasses in the world, composed from hand made traditional luxury glasses frames with the most advanced (features lenses). It adapts to your lifestyle, light and environment.Fade® Lenses - Eyeglasses and sunglasses, instantly in the same pairOur transition technology called Fade® Lenses, enables you to have more pairs of glasses in one perfect pair, from plain to digital and sunglasses. Fade Lenses adjust instantly from clear to dark and every shade in between, so life looks way more vivid, vibrant and true. Sharp® Lenses - You can choose between the view lenses and sunglasses lenses. Do you want to keep it simple? We thought of you and without making any compromises! Keeping all the functions of our lenses, we created Sharp® Lenses, giving you the possibility to choose between our plain lenses and sunglasses lenses.In the last year, our team has developed multiple prototypes, perfecting our designs. Different series vary in complexity and style - we are sure you will easily find your favorite. Whenever we sit down to create new frames, we always draw our inspiration from the world around us. We wanted to put French tradition in our product and move it forward by creating a last generation product.Lance Glasses combines the French design and elegance with the German technology and the quality of Italian materials. Also our glasses are prescription ready. (NO extra charge for this option).The story of our design begins in Morez (Jura Valley) considered a Silicon Valley of glasses. We have succeeded in combining modern Parisian design inspired by current trends, with French culture and tradition. The story begins in 1796 in Les Arcets, a hamlet in Morez. The ingenious craftsman who had the idea of ​​stretching and twisting a nail to make spectacles was called Pierre-Hyacinthe Caseaux, a nail smith by trade. Continuing this eyewear tradition in the Jura Mountains is a first-class high, a museum of spectacles with exhibitions and interactive workshops, and, in particular, specialised businesses. It is truly established here, to the extent that Morez (Jura Valley) represents 55% of the French eyewear industry.Every detail is important to us. To ensure a premium quality standard of our glasses, we have worked directly with some of the world's leading eyeglasses suppliers, which, for decades, have produced luxury glasses for high-end brands selling a pair for $350.Each Lance glasses frame is manually produced in over 80 stages of Italian Acetate, which is lightweight, durable and long lasting. The way our glasses are designed and manufactured will provide the comfort you need to be able to wear your glasses all day without even feeling them.We know that even the most elegant eyewear frames require some top lenses. We know that this plays an important role in how your glasses will look and feel. That's why Lance Glasses chose to work with the largest German lens maker in developing its technology to deliver a top product.Carefully selected high-end materials - each Acetate frame is hand-polished – with the polisher’s personal quality seal. Every frame is cut with mechanical precision. For acetate frames, the fronts are tumbled and polished while the temples are stamped, hand smoothed, shaped, and prepared for assembly. Each frame receives one last round of smoothing and shaping by hand, and then is inspected for quality.We have a fair deal for you. If you feel that the eyeglasses did not meet your expectations, contact us and we will send you a 100% refund. Hurry up and reserve your eyewear. Each model is limited edition so don't miss your favourite model.We remove all the intermediaries and offer luxury glasses, three times cheaper than the store pricing. Our engineer and co-founder, Karim Bousbaine, has optimized and simplified processes and the management for the largest multinationals all over the world. He has used the experience gained in the last 15 years in the Lance Glasses fabrication process and so we have made this price possible, enabling us to offer you Luxury Limited Edition eyeglasses for less than 100€. Did you know that only one company has control over 75% of the global glasses market? Lance Glasses does everything in-house. From design to manufacturing, we control the whole process. You will pay the real price for your glasses.We know you’re asking yourself: How can you make your pick from all of the different types of eyeglasses frames? Fortunately, we are all different and we know how important your look is, so at this moment our team is working on an application that will allow you to use our camera / laptop and augmented reality to try our glasses before completing the survey form after the campaign’s completion. This will allow you to make the right decision. It’s your frame’s distinct features that make them yours. Finding the right frame style for your face shape might feel tricky, but thankfully our app helps you pick the right frame and it is so easy.Because you will not only have a pair of glasses, you will have a 20-functions gadget that will meet all of your needs. We recreated luxury glasses by making them accessible to everyone and improving them by adding nanotechnology treated lenses, keeping the classic human aspect of the French design.Not just simple lensesOur Sharp® Lenses and Fade® Lenses have nanotechnology coatings. Every lens is cut out with perfection and accuracy. This minimizes distortion in the field of vision.All of our lenses are maximum UV-protection and provide a 100% filter from harmful UVA, UVB and UVC rays including the blue light from digital screens. The invisible coatings make your glasses your best daily ally adapting to any situation.The package includes: the glasses you have chosen along with your desired lenses (prescription lenses at no extra cost), microfiber case for cleaning and storage, ecological foldable case, warranty and authenticity certificate, packaging box.Over the past year, we have developed our brand, perfecting and testing multiple prototypes until reaching perfection. Based in Paris, France , our team comes from different horizons, that makes our company vision richer. Luc is our eyewear industrial designer who worked for many brands over the past 12 years, designing the best collection ever. Karim is our engineer reconverted from the aeronautic and automotive industry that develops the best optics and materials. Liviu is our product developer with a tremendous skill in design, marketing and product development and Gonzague, our production manager, negotiates the best prices and coordinates the production to make sure the quality meets our expectations and beyond. Our philosophy is deliciously simple. We produce a luxury product meeting the standards of the best brands of the market at an honest price.Photographers : El Duk, Gregoire Chaillet, Leslie ArtamanowModels:  Theo Soenen, Léa Gouaux, Carla Roisnel, Aline Kittiphanh, Urumikanzaky, BK Laure, Manon Raoult, Florian LathuliereWe offer delivery worldwide for all orders ( except conflict zones*) You will enter your delivery address. Delivery usually takes from 2 to 5 business days, although it's often shorter. Orders are delivered by express courier. You'll receive a tracking number shortly after placing your order, so you can see exactly when it’s scheduled to arrive.*Conflict zones : Unfortunately, some areas in the world cannot be delivered for political reasons, war zones, simply because express courier don’t operate : Lybia, Syria, Irak. If you have any questions simply contact our team!

story:
What is the Causewagon?

The Causewagon exists to spotlight local causes by donating half of the proceeds from sales (yes, 50%!) It's pretty simple. The Causewagon is a mobile apparel shop in which customers can customize their choice of apparel with locally inspired designs.  Customers select apparel, designs and where the designs are placed on the garment. The product is then created as they look on! Customers walk away with high-quality apparel and a receipt that showing how much of the purchase directly benefits a local organization.

Do you ever look around and see people in need and not know how to respond or where to begin to even crack the surface of setting things right? I do too.

I'm Dave. I'm an Art and Design educator in a public high school in Salem, Oregon.  I also founded and run a design/art/social enterprise called NuvoGlas that creatively repurposes bottles with a mission to help others. I’m committed to the community of Salem by profession, but even moreso by calling. 

The Need- Our Community

Over the years, I've seen many needs in this community. Meeting all the needs is too big a job for one person, but I don't think that lets us off the hook.  "Not unto our selves are we born" is the motto of Willamette University where I received my Masters of Teaching degree. I think about this often as I continually strive to find ways to make my life count.  I believe I'm not unique in this longing to have a life well-lived. 

The good news is that there are many organizations focused on specific causes. This means that there is work already being done on many levels to better people's lives. However, the work is far from complete and community involvement is paramount for these organizations to thrive. I can't name all the groups, organizations and people that tirelessly devote themselves to the collective benefit of our community, but I want to shine a spotlight on those already doing good and making an impact.

The Need- The Causewagon

I can not express the magnitude of what your contributions will help accomplish. To get this idea off the ground, a small investment in equipment and supplies is necessary. A generator is needed to power a heat press that allows the designs to be pressed onto apparel. An initial purchase of the ink transfers  and t-shirts made from my designs is needed to cover the perks of this campaign.

What You Get

The most important marker of success in this campaign is excitement about this idea.  I'll know it's a success when people get their friends to jump on board the CauseWagon! 

We are going to keep the perks so perfectly simple. If you want high quality apparel with unique designs and community focus, here is what we offer:

  • Shirts with designs created in house
  • Shirts with designs created by local designers
  • Shirts for your company, club, or organization

Why this campaign matters

This isn’t just another t-shirt guy. By building relationships with people doing good, I plan on introducing you to incredible stories.  Stories have the power to build bridges and connect those who want to help with those who need it. I know that getting involved is how we build a community together, but to do so, an understanding of the needs that exist is an important first step.  As of writing this, I find that I’m ignorant of all the ways to get involved in this community.  As the Causewagon rolls down the road, I plan on building relationships and connecting with others to expand my knowledge base. I hope you hear the key ingredient in this message: I need others for this vision to succeed. This is an open invitation to jump on the Causewagon!

Is there a risk?

Always. However, I’ve done due diligence in minimizing them for this vision. This campaign will not  move the Causewagon forward unless 100% of the goal is reached.

1.  50% of proceeds is a lot to give away. How do you plan on covering costs?

Math! (See, those teachers knew I'd use it!) It pencils out when looking at the numbers.  50% seems like an absurd amount to give away, until you look at the business plan. Any apparel company will tell you that there are large profit margins on t-shirts.  I think that the underlying vision of connecting the community is worth this business model because I believe that people want quality apparel that has a story.

2. There are like 2 months where the weather is decent enough in Oregon to be outside as a mobile apparel shop. What are you going to do when it’s pouring down rain?

Actually, it’s more like 2.5 months:) Seriously, though, Oregonians love the rain and aren’t afraid to be out in it.  When the weather turn  wet, I’m working hard on inspiring high school students to create.  The focus will be on wholesaling and online sales during the times we’re not out in the van making apparel and meeting people. 

Besides buying awesome clothing what else can I do to help out?

Talk about it.

The only way that this idea will be a go is if you talk about it with others! Share posts on Facebook, tag people on Instagram, and share in person with those around you.  Word of mouth is how grass-roots movements happen! Make organizations aware of the Causewagon through mutual email introductions or sharing our contact info with directors and board members.  Here are the important details:

David Pluister, Founder

one4cause@gmail.com

503.779.8704

www.causewagon.com

 

By backing this campaign, you allow this vision to move forward. Help us help the community by doing it in style!

story:
"No taps, no manual input! It's completely automated." –  Wareable 

"Golfication X is a feature-packed wearable for Golf." – Golf Digest

"[Golfication X] doubles up with the world’s most powerful post-game analysis tools."– BizGolf

Golfication X combines a GPS Rangefinder, an automatic shot tracker, and a swing analyzer, to give you holistic insights into your golf game. Powered by Artificial intelligence, it takes your game further by making ultimate sense of your data.

Golfication captures your swing, your shots, and even your intent seamlessly, in real time. It then uses Artificial Intelligence to help you make better decisions on course, and build better practice routines and the range.

Smartest GPS Rangefinder: Helps you make better decisions on-course

 

World's 1st Intelligent Swing Analyzer: Understands that your swing is unique

Golfication X measures your Club Speed, Swing Tempo and Swing Path for your full-, three-quarter-, and a half- swings.

 

Advanced Tour Level Stats: Combines Real-time Shot Tracking & Swing Analysis Data

 

AI Golf Clash: Play virtual-rounds against Legends on Your Home Course

 

It's super easy to set up! 

 

The Future of Golf Technology has arrived

Powered by our Patent Pending Swing + Shot Tracking technology, Golfication X helps you take charge of your game! And it's completely automated: no taps, no manual input, and no smart-phones on the course.

 

 

Our Project Timeline

 

The R&D behind Golfication X

 

Shipping Info

We have started shipping the first batch of Golfication X in November 2018. We are currently taking orders that will be shipped between 16th-19th January 2019. We will update you periodically via email, Indiegogo, and our social media channels about the status of your order.

Our backers can also write to us any time at anirudh@golfication.com OR holeinone@golfication.com. We'll try our best to get back to you within 24 hours.

 

Our Team

We're a team of engineers, artists and golfers, excited about contributing to this beautiful game. We have spent several months at the driving range, and on different courses, rigged-up with wires and a dozen earlier prototypes, constantly improving, and constantly learning from our experiences.

We're delighted that over 10,000 golfers now trust us to keep their stats, using the Golfication App. With your support and interest, we now endeavour to deliver a product that will significantly improve your game, and your on-course experience!

 

Risk & Challenges

After more than two years of research and development, and testing prototypes, we have now manufactured the first batch of Golfication X. They're more beautiful than we had imagined, and as powerful as we promised! Get ready for some serious Game-Improvement in 2019.

Golfication X has been reviewed by both professional and club-level golfers. Check out the Gallery section of our campaign for full reviews.

We've overcome several challenges over the past two years - we've brought down the weight from 40g to 20g - nearly half the weight of an Apple Watch! All our swing parameters have been tested against High-Speed Cameras, and leading Industry Standards such as Trackman, to ensure you get high-quality data every single time.

As avid golfers, we've put our heart and soul into the development of Golfication X, to make sure you can always trust your AI friend to improve your game.

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

How many tags come with the product?

The Golfication X system contains 14 tags - one for each of your Golf Clubs, including a special tag for your putter. 

How can I purchase additional tags?

You can purchase additional tags on the Golfication Website at any time (after shipping), and add them to your set.

What is the battery life of the main sensor?

The main sensor is powered by a 200 mAh Lithium Ion battery that is rechargeable via a USB charger which is included in the box. The battery is designed to last for 8 hours, or two golf rounds.

Will my home course be mapped when I receive the device?

Yes, your home course will be mapped before you receive the device, as we will request for these details via email following the campaign. We expect to have mapped over 18,000 Golf Courses at the time of launch, including 7,500 in the United States. Additionally, as a Golfication X or a Golfication App - Pro (Premium Subscription) User, if you wish to play a course that is currently un-mapped, you must request for mapping through the Golfication App. It will be ready to play in a few days!

What is the weight and size of Golfication X?

The Golfication X is an ultra light-weight device, which fits perfectly on the Velcro of any standard golf glove. It weighs about 20g or 0.7 ounces, less than half the weight of an Apple Watch.

Won’t the device slip or fly out during the Golf Swing?

No. It’s a well-tested device, that has been subjected to high velocities and forces, commonly experienced in Golf Swings (up to 140 mph drive club-head speeds). It is designed to grip the glove which prevents it from falling out during the swing or impact.

Do I need to Tap somewhere or do anything before my shots?

No, it’s a Tap-free device, as we want you to enjoy golf and not just keep tapping.

Do I need my Mobile Phone of Course to ensure proper functionality of the device?

No, Golfication X is designed to work even without your mobile phone on the Golf Course. The wrist-mounted wearable can detect Golf Swings, capture your swing metrics, and GPS location of each of your shots, even without your phone. You can view your Round Analytics after your round, by syncing the device with your app. Unlike other devices, Golfication X does NOT use your Smartphone GPS.

Can I still play with mild rain?

Yes, the Golfication X system is certified IP65, which makes it resistant to rain and dust. As long as it's playable weather, Golfication X will work for you!

Do I need to have a smartphone to analyze and share my game?

Yes, you would need an Android / iOS smartphone or tablet to run the Golfication App, to check your stats and explore a bunch of exciting features!

On which platforms can I find the Golfication App?

The Golfication App is available for both Apple iPhones, and Android Devices.
* Download on the App Store
* Get it on Google Play

Is Golfication App free to download?

Yes, this app is free to download. You can use GPS Distances, Smart Club Recommendations and access several important stats like club distances & accuracy. To access premium features - like Strokes Gained, Dispersions, AI Golf Clash & Augmented Reality, you can upgrade to Pro Membership.

If I am backing this Campaign, do I need to pay for the app separately?

No, all backers selecting Perks for $25 or higher, get access to all premium features of the app for free.

Can Golfication X be used during Tournaments?

Golfication X is enabled with a Tournament Mode, which allows players to access only distances (and no other additional information that may assist) during play. We plan to approach the USGA to be officially declared as Permitted during Tournaments.

Is Golfication X used by Amateurs or Professional Golfers?

Golfication X is for golfers of all skill levels - from pro-golfers to 20+ handicappers. Each person benefits differently from Golfication X: high-handicappers & beginners use it to improve their tempo, more advanced golfers benefit from intelligent swing analysis which integrates every swing with the shot outcome, and professionals can use Golfication X as an important tool to improve their short game (track half-swing, 3/4- swing etc).

Is there a special putting sensor to detect putts?

One out of the fourteen sensors in the box is a special putting sensor. It allows you to record putts and the pin-position on every green with a simple button-press.

How much is the shipping fee?

We are offering FREE Worldwide Shipping to all our early backers. But, you will be responsible for any additional taxes, duties and VAT. 

Spread the Word

If you like the concept of Golfication X but aren’t quite ready to pledge, you can still help us make Golfication X a success by sharing our posts on social media, giving us your feedback and telling your friends and family about Golfication X and our Indiegogo campaign.

 

 

Your Queries are Important to us.

Hi, I'm Anirudh, Co-Founder of Golfication. I would love to receive direct queries from you if you have any. So, feel free to mail me on "anirudh@golfication.com" with your "Name and Query" as a subject. Cheers!

The battery is designed to last for 8 hours, or two golf rounds.Will my home course be mapped when I receive the device?Yes, your home course will be mapped before you receive the device, as we will request for these details via email following the campaign. We expect to have mapped over 18,000 Golf Courses at the time of launch, including 7,500 in the United States. Additionally, as a Golfication X or a Golfication App - Pro (Premium Subscription) User, if you wish to play a course that is currently un-mapped, you must request for mapping through the Golfication App. It will be ready to play in a few days!What is the weight and size of Golfication X?The Golfication X is an ultra light-weight device, which fits perfectly on the Velcro of any standard golf glove. It weighs about 20g or 0.7 ounces, less than half the weight of an Apple Watch.Won’t the device slip or fly out during the Golf Swing?No. It’s a well-tested device, that has been subjected to high velocities and forces, commonly experienced in Golf Swings (up to 140 mph drive club-head speeds). It is designed to grip the glove which prevents it from falling out during the swing or impact.Do I need to Tap somewhere or do anything before my shots?No, it’s a Tap-free device, as we want you to enjoy golf and not just keep tapping.Do I need my Mobile Phone of Course to ensure proper functionality of the device?No, Golfication X is designed to work even without your mobile phone on the Golf Course. The wrist-mounted wearable can detect Golf Swings, capture your swing metrics, and GPS location of each of your shots, even without your phone. You can view your Round Analytics after your round, by syncing the device with your app. Unlike other devices, Golfication X does NOT use your Smartphone GPS.Can I still play with mild rain?Yes, the Golfication X system is certified IP65, which makes it resistant to rain and dust. As long as it's playable weather, Golfication X will work for you!Do I need to have a smartphone to analyze and share my game?Yes, you would need an Android / iOS smartphone or tablet to run the Golfication App, to check your stats and explore a bunch of exciting features!On which platforms can I find the Golfication App?The Golfication App is available for both Apple iPhones, and Android Devices.* Download on the App Store* Get it on Google PlayIs Golfication App free to download?Yes, this app is free to download. You can use GPS Distances, Smart Club Recommendations and access several important stats like club distances & accuracy. To access premium features - like Strokes Gained, Dispersions, AI Golf Clash & Augmented Reality, you can upgrade to Pro Membership.If I am backing this Campaign, do I need to pay for the app separately?No, all backers selecting Perks for $25 or higher, get access to all premium features of the app for free.Can Golfication X be used during Tournaments?Golfication X is enabled with a Tournament Mode, which allows players to access only distances (and no other additional information that may assist) during play. We plan to approach the USGA to be officially declared as Permitted during Tournaments.Is Golfication X used by Amateurs or Professional Golfers?Golfication X is for golfers of all skill levels - from pro-golfers to 20+ handicappers. Each person benefits differently from Golfication X: high-handicappers & beginners use it to improve their tempo, more advanced golfers benefit from intelligent swing analysis which integrates every swing with the shot outcome, and professionals can use Golfication X as an important tool to improve their short game (track half-swing, 3/4- swing etc).Is there a special putting sensor to detect putts?One out of the fourteen sensors in the box is a special putting sensor. It allows you to record putts and the pin-position on every green with a simple button-press.How much is the shipping fee?We are offering FREE Worldwide Shipping to all our early backers. But, you will be responsible for any additional taxes, duties and VAT. Spread the WordIf you like the concept of Golfication X but aren’t quite ready to pledge, you can still help us make Golfication X a success by sharing our posts on social media, giving us your feedback and telling your friends and family about Golfication X and our Indiegogo campaign.  Your Queries are Important to us.Hi, I'm Anirudh, Co-Founder of Golfication. I would love to receive direct queries from you if you have any. So, feel free to mail me on "anirudh@golfication.com" with your "Name and Query" as a subject. Cheers!

story:
Hackpack: The 4-In-1 Commuter Bag

Hackpack converts into 4 different configurations making you ready for any situation! No matter how you commute to work Hackpack transforms to boardroom-ready in seconds.

Configurations:

  • Backpack
  • Briefcase
  • Sling
  • Messenger

People are Talking About Hackpack!

The Challenge

It is important to look professional in the workplace. Briefcases and laptop bags provide the necessary aesthetic for looking good in the office but are impractical once you leave. They lack storage, can be uncomfortable to travel with, and are clumsy when speed and efficiency are needed. Backpacks and slings are comfortable options for carrying everything needed for a day however, they lack formality for workplace settings and can make you feel out of place. 

The Solution

Hackpack is the best of both worlds. The messenger and briefcase looks are right at home in the office. When you are on the go and need your hands-free, the backpack and sling configurations allow you to keep your items comfortably close and secure. 

This amazingly lightweight bag doesn't add more weight to carry. The exterior is a durable black and gray nylon material that is easy to keep clean and stands up to wear and tear.  

Check out this close-up! You'll see it's woven with black and white threads, giving Hackpack an overall grey appearance. 

The Four-in-One

Hackpack converts into 4 different configurations making you ready for any situation! No matter how you commute to work Hackpack transforms to boardroom-ready in seconds.

Hackpack was created by a brother-sister duo who are Silicon Valley Entrepreneurs who couldn't find the perfect work bag, so they made their own.

Briefcase Mode:

The briefcase stands up on its own without flopping over like most soft briefcases. It fits perfectly under airplane seats giving you a worry-free commute.

Hidden briefcase handles on Hackpack streamline the design when they are not in use.

They simply slide down inside the bag into a snug compartment and out of view. They are easy to grab and pull out when needed and rounded to comfortably sit in the palm of your hand.

Messenger Mode:

Every Hackpack comes with a padded over-the-shoulder strap that easily clips onto 2 metal jump rings. This comfortable and easy going configuration makes it easy to grab and go while looking professional and at ease. Simply tuck the strap back into the bag when it's not in use. 

Backpack Mode:

Hackpack easily transforms into a backpack within seconds. A hidden pocket on the back of the bag reveals 2 backpack straps. They are ergonomically curved and padded to provide maximum comfort.

 

They clip onto hidden jump rings on the bottom of the bag. These sturdy metal jump rings are hidden behind a flap of fabric to keep Hackpack's design minimal and not overly complicated. 

Airport Travel

The backpack straps can be clipped criss-cross when traveling and you want to put Hackpack on top of your suitcase around the handle. Hackpack will not fall off to the side or flip around to the front - we put it to some crazy tests! Plus Hackpack fits perfectly under the seat inf ront of you. 

Sling Mode:

You can wear Hackpack like a sling by simply using only one of the backpack straps and connecting it to the opposing jump ring. 

This allows you to wear the bag most comfortable for you by utilizing either the left or right strap. Simply, tuck in the unused strap back into the backpack pocket. The sling is the perfect option for when you want to keep your items close to you for safeguarding say on a crowded bus or metro while also keeping your hands free.

Extra Goodies 

Organization and hidden features that make Hackpack unique and the best work bag you'll ever own. 

Expander Zipper - The Hackpack has a 360-degree expansion zipper that allows you to double the amount of storage space. This core feature lets you travel and carry everything you need without overloading your bag. You'll never have to cram items into your bag again. 

Laptop storage - Hackpack can fit multiple laptops and iPads within one bag. It can fit a laptop up to 15 inches in the dedicated laptop compartment. The microsuede interior fabric is gentle enough to keep your items protected from scratches but durable for easy cleaning and can take a beating. We've tried! 

Laptop Fastener - The laptop compartment is secured with a magnetic flap that allows for easy grab-and-go but keeps items safely secured. You can take out your laptop with one only hand. No more fighting with your bag. 

Hidden Keychain Clip - A concealed keychain clip is located on the front zipper of Hackpack. Never lose your keys again keeping them right at your fingertips, without the possibility of them falling out and getting buried at the bottom of the bag. 

Cargo net - The interior compartment of Hackpack contains a cargo net that reduces bulk by compressing your items and keeping them secure. This is an ideal location for running shoes or an extra change of clothing. 

180 degree fold out - The laptop portion of Hackpack folds out flat to allow for easy packing. You can easily zip up clothing or papers for wrinkle-free storage. 

Hardware - Sturdy metal hardware in Bronze-finish keeps Hackpack reliable and durable time and time again with YKK Zippers. 

Dimensions

Exterior:
16"W x 12.25" H x 4"D
With Expansion: 
16"W x 12.25" H x 6"D 
Cargo Net:
13"W x 9"H
Front Pocket
12"W x 9"H

Quality Testing

We put Hackpack through several load tests to make sure Hackpack can stand up to anything. Here's what we did:

Jerk Test Bags with handles often need to withstand a sudden force. For example, if you go to lift a bag quickly, you want to be sure that pulling on the handles suddenly won’t rip the bag. 
Testing: We loaded Hackpack with 25 lb weights and dropped it from 1 meter high off a bar testing the backpack straps. 
Results: Pass - no signs of damage!

Fatigue Test Just as a bag’s handles are important for carrying a bag, other parts are intended to keep the contents of the bag inside during transport. Tests for bags and suitcases should also include fatigue testing designed to check the durability of the bag’s fasteners.
Testing: We have carried Hackpack non-stop for several months stuffing it with as many things as possible. 
Results: Pass - no signs of damage!

Drop Test Some tests for bags and suitcases are meant to simulate rough handling experienced during travel. Luggage, in particular, is often roughly tossed around as it’s loaded and unloaded at airports and hotels. 
Testing: We filled Hackpack is 56 lbs and dropped it from one meter high on all 6 sides. (Yes people were staring at us like we were crazy).
Results: Pass - no signs of damage

Load Testing A bag’s ability to withstand a certain weight without falling apart is essential. The load test is performed on bags with handles. 
Testing: We loaded Hackpack with 20 lbs and let is hang for 4 hours.
Results: Pass - no signs of damage! 

Hackpack stood up to all 4 of these tests and still looks great. The only thing that was worn out was us after all the heavy weight lifting. (Seriously...)

Goal

We already hit our $20,000 goal on Kickstarter so Hackpack will be shipping worldwide in Spring 2017! We can't wait to share it with the world. If you missed your chance to Pre-Order, you still can! Choose from Pre-Ordering one or two Hackpacks at a discounted price. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Supplier - Our supplier has 15 years of experience manufacturing and shipping products. They are reliable, highly dedicated, and downright amazing people to work with. They have just as much passion and enthusiasm for Hackpack as we do and we are delighted to be working with them.
  • Fulfillment - we have a talented team lined up to make sure everything goes smoothly! They are located right here in Los Angeles with a highly personable and experienced staff.
  • You are viewing prototypes, so expect the final product to be even more polished and of supreme quality.
  • Getting our product through US customs may cause a delay, however, we built this possibility into our timing so we will always strive to over-deliver rather than under!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute we understand, but if you believe in our mission and would like to help we welcome all support!

  • Make some noise about us on social!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

International Buyers

We ship Delivered duty paid (DDP) -  Which means, we bear the risks and costs, including duties, taxes and other charges of delivering the goods thereto, cleared for importation to your country so you don't have to! In other words, we have paid for all duties and taxes for your country upfront so you won't have hidden costs or delays in receiving your Hackpack.

If your country is not listed send us a message and we will add it!

story:
Abstract:


That is our concept:
We are aiming for the development of an application which enables the usage of virtual management, categorization and the arrangement of the wardrobe. The user receives, after adding his clothes into the system, individual tips for a fitting attire, recommendations for a buy and include many more functions as the outfit calendar or the social functions which makes it possible to reveal your outfits and share & discuss it with friends on social networks.
The User has the possibility to integrate his own body into the application as an avatar. Therefore a multi-stage picture capturing, can create a detailed avatar with a deviance of just 1,5 % of the body measurements. This avatar can be dressed virtually.
This App serves as a driving force in meeting the demands and being an innovative advertising platform for the textile industry. The user of the application gets their individual advices for shopping which is fits best to the individualized wardrobe, moreover it offers the user the place where he can buy his favorite labels for a discount. That leads to an Win-Win situation for the User and the advertising company.



Who we are:
Annika, Fritz & Philipp studying Media Management at the Ostfalia University of applied sciences. Some excellent, wine in a sociable atmosphere of creative people, was enough to born this idea. Afterwards the project were born, pointed out and formed more concretely, that we presented the idea to our professor and a decent circle of students. They were inspired and delighted by the project. That incredible feedback leads to the point, that we start the work and writing on the business plan. Today –almost 9month later- we are writing our Bachelor Thesis about financing Web 2.0 Start-Ups and models of return and usability of Web 2.0 based applications.

 



What do we need & what do you get:
What do we need?
The first goal is to compute a dummy, to show and convince investors by the most important functions and layouts. For that we need a programmer who can compute the elementary Java-functions. We calculated a needed budget of 10,000€ (10-15 daily rates for a professional coder). The layout can be mostly done by the founders, but for the finalization of the mock-ups a professional graphic-designer is needed. Furthermore a usability test is necessary which also can be made by the entrepreneurs, though there will be occur expenses  like travelling costs and allowances for  test persons.
If the funding goal cannot be reached, you will get your investment back.

What do you get?
First of all we can offer you a really cool app, which enrich your weekday and satisfy your needs of managing your outfit’s digital, fitting room and mobile shopping. What you receive for your funding depends on the amount of donation. There are several options you can choose; of course you have the possibility to be one of the first users who can use the beta-phase of the application. As supporter you can take part as an ambassador for the social media campaign. Moreover you will provide with rewards e.g. coupons for a shopping day in berlin or online shopping.

Impact:
The user of the application gain a quick overview of their wardrobe, through the usage of the app the awareness for fashion and the innovative behavior of buying clothes will be shaped. That is the reason why user can buy things with a wider awareness and get an assistant which helps to get the clothes which fits best to the taste of the user. That effects that the user save money, because they do not spend money for clothes that they already have or which don´t fit. Moreover the app indicates clothes which has not been wearing since a longer time and remember the user. With just a few clicks/wipes you can donate clothes of your wardrobe, to your friends or list them on platforms like eBay.
But you should not forget: Fashion is fun and this app underlines it!
Additionally this app combines the “to be social” and leads to a paradigm in enjoying fashion and shopping.

There are many ways to help us:
You think our project is pretty cool, but you have insufficient resources? No problem. Of course you can support us with our project to reinvent the customer needs.
Share the crowd funding announcement with friends and acquaintances where you think they may can help us.
You know programmer, developer, web designer (students are welcome) or you consider yourself as one of them? Than be part of our team!
You know networking people which has useful contacts? Recommend us and pass our contact data.

story:
Thanks for heading over here and checking out what Endorsing Higher Standards is all about.

 

Endorsing Higher Standards is a t-shirt brand I'm starting that is centered on LGBT issues.  It is something I am very passonate about, as a lesbian, and as a compassionate human.

I want this brand to differentiate from other LGBT-geared t-shirts by creating killer designs with powerful messages.

All I am looking for is 1500 people to donate one dollar!

 

The raised money will go to:

-Boosting inventory by creating & printing more designs

-Custom tags & labels

-Packaging

-Custom signs 

-Register for a booth at Seattle Pride 2013

 

You can view the first t-shirt I made here (although the best has yet to come):

http://www.flickr.com/photos/88276699@N07/8068306911/in/photostream

 

Thank you for all your help and keep fighting the fight LGBT community & allies!

 

(FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com/endorsinghigherstandards)

(TWITTER: @theEHSbrand)

story:
***Shipping Update***

All orders will ship in June 2014


Being Legendary. It’s what makes “The Greats” great. And, it’s what Desiar has set out to become: a new revolution of eyewear for the fashion-forward who want to become style legends.


Thank you for visiting our campaign! We appreciate your feedback and support. The Mach 3 design was inspired by a timeless frame shape, enhanced with hand-crafted wooden temples and acetate material. Every element of the design came from months of research and development. Working with wood and acetate was a challenge but after continued testing and working with a great manufacturing team, we were able to produce a quality product with you in mind. Wood is not too forgiving so adding a spring hinge allows the frame to fit perfectly to your face. For us, the coolest thing is the comfort and wearability of the Mach 3 and we're excited to share this moment with you. Comfort is key and we feel we really nailed it by adding 5 barrel spring hinges to the temple of the frame. 








Mach 3 Marble

Mach 3 Black


Mach 3 Tortoiseshell




Who? 

  • I'm Jamal Robinson - Founder & Creative Thinker: 

"I've never designed for the sake of designing. I'm always thinking about how our product will make a person feel when wearing DESIAR. It's important to try and put myself in our customer's shoes to create the very best product with them in mind.

I think we accomplish this as a team and when we do; our customers see the end result with each product we produce." 

  • I'm Chris Pena 

"When I think of our Mach 3 frame, three things come to mind: quality, style and comfort. That's why we chose to share them with you first!"


                   Chris Pena                                                 Jamal Robinson 

  • I'm Miguel Pink 


  • I'm Jacob Gutzwiller 



How?

1: Sketch & Design   2: Technical draft    3: Sample & QC       4. Production 


Why Indiegogo?

We believe Desiar sunglasses are an extension of your personality. Dress them up or dress them down, it's all about you. We chose Indiegogo because we wanted to share the experience of launching the Mach 3 with you. Getting your support and feedback is what will help us continue to make great products. We hope you join us to make this campaign a reality. 


What Will You Receive?

  • The Mach 3 sunglasses are hand-crafted wood and acetate frames that can be comfortably worn throughout the day and during any season. 
  • As a backer, you will receive exclusive emails on the progress of the Mach 3 sunglasses. 
  • You will receive an awesome High Five, Sweet Exclusive T-shirt or Your new favorite pair of sunglasses. All the above are win/win situations! 


If you like us, share us! 

Desiar Eyewear               @DesiarCo              @DesiarCo                @DesiarCo


Indiegogo L I M I T E D edition T-Shirt


FAQ:

  • How do I take care of my Desiar sunglasses? 

We recommend that you take care of your Desiar Eyewear like a piece of original art. Your frames are handcrafted, manufactured for durability and everyday wear. We suggest that to maintain your Desiar frames, you keep them in a safe place. We recommend that you do not put them in your pockets, backpack, purse, etc. If you are not wearing them, place them in the hard case shipped with the sunglasses and/or the microfiber cloth in a safe place out of the sun and water.

  • Is shipping really free within the US? 

Yes, all supporters and items shipped to any part of the US is FREE! (International supporters, please add $10.00 to your order to cover costs). 

  • Can you come back and purchase after you've supported once? 

Yes, you can come back and contribute again to select another reward. 

  • Can I put my prescription (Rx) in the Mach 3 sunglasses? 

Yes, you can! All Desiar sunglasses are designed with a 6 base curve which allows you to put your prescription in the frame. You must take the sunglasses to an eye-care professional. We do not offer this service through this campaign. 

  • Can you change or cancel my perk? 

Unfortunately, we do not have any control of our backers contributions. With that, we will do everything in our power to help assist, if help is needed. 

  • Can we ask a real person a question? 

Yes, feel free to call Jamal's cell phone or email some of the team at their respective emails below: 

Jamal cell's: (260) 804-1798 - Please no pizza orders :) 

Email: JR@desiar.com


The Impact: Shades of Change

Desiar shades not only represent our product but also the gradual influence we all can make to help change the world. We do this by partnering with a non-profit organization we feel is making the world a better place. We've teamed up with Thirst Project and committed to help build a clean drinking water well for a community in need. What does this mean? For each pair of Desiar sunglasses sold through this campaign and on our website thereafter will provide clean drinking water for someone in need for 10 years. 

  • Why help with the global water crises? 

Water is essential to the improvement of the quality of life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share, Share, Share - Thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign. If you like what you saw, please feel free to share our campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. We can't say it enough, thank you!

story:
I am Al-Karim, a fashion designer. My line is called American Kouture.

I am a product of Parson School of Design where I studied fashion design.

I have been creating for the better part of 30 plus years in many capacities from music production to fashion shows. Now, I am set to launch my first line, American Kouture. This will be my inaugural collection of ready-to-wear and couture-like pieces.

My aesthetic is "affordable luxury". American Kouture will be instrumental in bridging the gap between functional fashion and couture style.

I need your support to realize the full potential of a line the likes of American Kouture. Your donations will aid in funding from the basic necessities (zippers, buttons, fabric) to the bigger picture (marketing/promotions/production of the fashion show itself.)

Goal: at least $10,000 on the low end to upwards of $25,000 to be used to purchase fabric, notions, elements to create the jewelry and accessories, development of website for line, rental of venue and production cost of producing show and officially launching the line to the public.

The rewards offered are all related to the line in a someway, from logo'd appareal, signed prints from me, up to a one-of-a-kind American Kouture creation made just for you.

If the goal is not met during this campaign, the funds that are donated will be used specifically to finish the line and develop the website so that I will still be able to launch to the general public.

I know not everyone has the means to make a monetary contribution, but everyone can help by getting the word out and telling someone that you know about the American Kouture brand.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone in advance for any assistance you can offer this endeavor. Designing is what I was meant to do and I want to share the gift that I have with the world around me. Thank you, again, in assisting me in making my dream a reality.

Sincerely, 

Al-Karim

story:
Dave's Story

Like generations of men before me, I succumbed to the mass market images of men standing in front of a cold, messy sink, spreading chemicals over their faces enduring mediocre results. Nicks, cuts and razor burn became a tolerated part of my morning ritual.

One day I asked my dermatologist: Before the shower or after? He told me that, actually, dermatologists recommend you hydrate your skin as much as possible before, after and during shaving. They recommend you shave IN the shower. I tried it and became hooked. The warm, steamy environment opens pores, softens hair and relaxes your skin. You don’t have to be a scientist to realize you get a closer, more comfortable shave. But what to use? 

There have been no significant improvements in shaving creams since Edge Gel was introduced . . . almost 40 years ago! Have you read the ingredients? I have sensitive skin, but a tough beard. I wanted pure, healthy, natural ingredients. I wanted a mirror. I wanted travel-friendly.  Most of all, I wanted a comfortable shave.

So I assembled a team of talented people, from chemists to designers. The goal was to design a product with ingredients that WE would love to use every day. Starting from scratch, we researched organic, natural oils that are proven to lubricate and nourish your skin. We chose Olive, Palm, Coconut and Jojoba oils. Shea butter is added along with essential oils like Tea Tree, Spruce, Mandarin, Bergamot Sage and Rosemary. Kaolin clay provides a gentle lather and the "slip" for comfort and closeness. We blend the ingredients by hand using a slow, cold process. 

Once molded and cured, these special bars are conveniently packaged for use in the shower. An unbreakable plastic case protects the bar and makes application easy. It contains a fog-resistant, shatter-proof mirror which is easily maintained with the swipe of a soapy finger. A suction cup keeps it on the wall. Because it’s a solid bar, it will last for two months or more and is perfect for traveling. 

Welcome to the revolution in men’s shaving. You'll love shaving with Dave's. Once you shave in the shower with Dave's, you will never shave at a cold sink again. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Currently, each of our bars is made by hand in small batches, aged for 30 days or more in a climate-controlled environment then hand-assembled. We want to maintain the hand-made quality. We need more molds so we can increase the size of the batches we make.

We use high quality silicone molds so the bars will release easily. Silicone molds are durable and long lasting. but they're expensive and we need a lot of them. With your help, we can increase production and continue hand-crafting our bars. We will purchase as many mold as we can with the money raised. 

Our perks are our way of saying thanks. You will be rewarded for your help by receiving the best, most comfortable shave ever. We will ship out perks in the order they are received.

Dave's Shower Shave is also planet friendly. We help eliminate empty cans of shaving cream, our ingredients contain no petroleum products and our case is made of recyclable plastic and can be repurposed. Our ingredients are all natural so what goes down the drain will not adversely affect the environment. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If this isn't a good time to contribute, keep in touch for future opportunities. 

Use the Indiegogo share tools to turn your friends and family on to this cool new product and healthy new way to shave.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Lauren Perdue and I'm a fashion design major at UNT in Denton, TX. I have an opportunity to present a full collection at my first solo runway show at Austin Fashion Week, August 10-18 2012.

I've been sewing since 2006 and am working my way through design school. One more year, and I'll have my BFA in design and a one-way ticket to New York City! My grades are solid and last Fall I won the Terry Costa Catwalk Competition. This Spring I had designs featured at FGI Dallas Career Day and UNT Artwear. I've participated in several fashion shows in varying capacities but this is my first solo show, and it's a full collection, 15-20 looks. I feel like the past 6 years have been building to this opportunity, and if I can pull this off it'll blow doors wide open for my next move!

I have to do something extraordinary to get people's attention- to set me apart for when I'm job hunting next year. I have the opportunity to put myself out there and show my point of view and my hard-won skills. I have lots of planning and resources already poured into this, but to fully realize the potential of my collection and this show, I need some help. The money raised will go toward luxury fabrics, honorariums for my makeup/hair/dj, etc, travel expenses, emergency needs and sewing help. Every donation of any size will receive a handwritten thank-you note.

If this fashion show goes well and receives good press and positive feedback, it's not just good for me- it's good for everyone helping me with show production, for the models who walk for me, for the business that serves as my venue, for Austin Fashion Week as a whole, for UT and UNT (my alma maters). It affects dozens of people, and it starts with you. A donation to this cause promotes beauty and happiness in the world.This is my chance to set my future in motion toward something great, and I hope that you will participate.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are definitely other ways to help:

I would love fit models to help me make sure things fit right, so if you're a size 2-4 or a 10-12 in DFW, hit me up!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends if you think theyd be interested!

Thank you so so much. I appreciate your time. Here are some photos of things I've made:
