story:
Say NO to disposable plastic combs and plant a forest in the process. Each of our combs are paired with a tree planted in the name of one of our backers – like you – growing tall for decades to come, making the world a happier, healthier place. 

Switching to sustainably sourced wood combs is easy and you'll never lose a plastic pocket-comb again. Bamboo and Sandalwood is 100% natural and 100% biodegradable, which means your comb will break down naturally wherever you lose it. 

Our rounded mid-toothed pocket combs are great at detangling hair of all types – not just beard hair. You're going to love your new pocket comb regardless if you're bearded or beardless. Thank you for planting trees with us!
 

 

We are Ready to Go!

Our combs are currently in production and our reforestation partners are on-the-ground planting trees right now. All we need is your beard's support to make this dream a reality. 
 


Trees are more than just a good fit for a beard company. Trees clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, contribute to our health and wellbeing, and create jobs for social impact all around the globe.

We care deeply about the planet and creating a business that gives back to the great outdoors and the wild places in this world – that’s why we've partnered with One Tree Planted to plant one tree for every Naturally Normal Pocket Comb (3-pack) and two trees for every Tree-mendous Sandalwood Folding Comb awarded through our campaign and beyond.
 


The reforestation projects your pledges support do more than just plant trees – they support communities, increase biodiversity, provide clean air, filter water, help cool the planet, and generally make the world a happier greener place. 
 


Together Green Beard Grooming and One Tree Planted are on a beardly mission to reforest the planet, one beard at a time! Currently, your trees are destined for Australia, in the future, Green Beard Grooming's efforts will shift to other regions of the world and right here at home, in North America.
 


Our combs are a sustainable alternative to the cheap, plastic combs you can find anywhere, and the overpriced wood combs sold by other beard brands. They are of the highest quality, and perfectly sized for pockets, but not physically all that unique. What makes our combs truly different is that each comb is paired with a newly planted tree growing strong in a forest.



This comb was designed to be a sustainable alternative to the standard 3-pack of cheap disposable plastic combs – but instead of plastic in a landfill every 3-pack of our combs represents a freshly planted tree. 
 

The Naturally Normal Pocket Comb is a mid-toothed pocket comb with rounded teeth that are great at detangling hair of all hair types – not just beard hair – and is healthier for your scalp than scratchy plastic combs.  

Bamboo combs are naturally antistatic and good conduits for beard oils, waxes, and balms. What we really love about bamboo, though, is that it’s a naturally renewable resource. After being harvested, fresh shoots spring up from the roots without needing to be replanted. Bamboo is remarkably low impact.

Naturally Normal Pocket Comb Unboxing


 

Compost Note: Our Naturally Normal Pocket Combs are designed to breakdown. They are very durable if kept dry but return to nature quickly in humid environments. They hold up great in a pocket or on a shelf – not so well in composter or shower. 

 

This fragrant mid-toothed sandalwood comb has a weighted-feel and a super smooth finish that glides effortlessly through all hair types - not just beard hair. Each aptly named, Tree-mendous Folding Comb funds the planting of two trees and is made from sustainably harvested sandalwood – certified by the Forest Stewardship Council.

Our sandalwood folding combs are even more durable and long-lasting than our bamboo combs thanks to sandalwood’s dense character and the comb’s design. The combing head of the Tree-mendous Folding Comb tucks nicely into an unfinished protective pocket, with the added bonus of keeping your comb smelling of fresh sandalwood oil. Sandalwood oil promotes healthy hair growth and is valued for its long lasting scent.

Sustainability Concerns of Sandalwood Note: Sandalwood is the heavy scented heartwood of several species of genus Santalum. Some sandalwoods are sustainably harvested while other species are on the brink of extinction. Our manufacturers only source materials certified by the Forest Stewardship Council.

Tree-Mendous Folding Comb Unboxing

 

Composting Note: The tree-mendous folding comb has a metal hinge that can be easily removed and recycled, the comb was just too lossey-goosey without it. Check with your composting facility to make sure they accept wood products before composting. 
 


Why choose sandalwood or bamboo when you can have both in one Tree-mendous Combo Pack. You get three regret-free bamboo pocket combs that you won't feel bad about losing and one very impressive sandalwood folding comb that will last for years. We’ll also plant three trees in your name.
 

 


The world doesn't need another "revolutionary" comb designed with a bottle opener in the handle – left to his own devices that is exactly what our founder would create – but it's unnecessary. Sustainably sourced products and reforestation efforts, though? Those are absolutely necessary!

Our goal is to make sustainably sourced combs available to people who are currently using disposable plastic combs and to help grow a greener world in the process. No part of our mission mandates cutting-edge comb designs. We won’t settle for an inferior product, we simply don’t believe the pocket comb needs to be reinvented.
 


Green Beard Grooming's mustachioed creator has lost a lot of pocket combs over the years – no clue where they went. All he knows is that they generally don’t turn back up – gone forever in a ditch somewhere.

He’s lost expensive combs, cheap combs, metal combs, wooden combs, designer combs and a lot of disposable plastic combs. His working theory is that the combs get hooked on his keys and end up in parking lots. On many occasions – Ryan has crawled under his jeep to retrieve a pocket comb that bounced into the shadowy abyss. 
 


Feeling bad about all of the non-biodegradable plastic being left in parking lots – Ryan decided a few years ago to switch to wooden combs but quickly ran into issues.
 

The problem with stylish or even basic wooden combs is that they are – unnecessarily expensive  – given how cheap they are to produce unless you want to order 100 of them. Ryan was looking for inexpensive wood combs produced by a company with an environmental focus, and maybe a cool logo.
 


Note – Macho Beards was pulled out of thin air. We have nothing specifically against the dozen or so companies with that name or hundreds with names like it. The point is that real men deserve better – and that is Green Beard Grooming's purpose.

Finding no grooming companies that were giving back, Ryan decided to create one. We deserve more than unnecessarily expensive products with hyper-masculine branding!
 


Having decided to create a beard company with a larger mission – It was time to find partners and define that mission. Making wood combs that would breakdown in parking lots wasn't going to be enough – the combs needed to be high-quality and the company needed a larger purpose.

While researching eco-friendly manufacturers our founder came across the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) – who put him in touch with like-minded manufacturers that source sustainable and socially responsible materials.
 


That concludes the story behind the creation of Green Beard Grooming but our story is just beginning. It’s not just that our founder loves trees and wants to cut back on disposable plastic. The reforestation projects that we work with are bigger than some pocket comb; we are challenging beard-industry norms by focusing on environmental causes; and the trees you help us plant will outlast our products by decades – or centuries. 
 

Our founder  –  Ryan Trump  (pictured below playing with his mustache) – is new to e-commerce but has plenty of retail, beard, and tree planting experience.

Working as a retail manager in the outdoor recreation industry, Ryan managed an outdoor adventure shop with around $5M in annual revenue and $350K in annual operating expenses – so he knows how to manage a budget. He helped design that crazy plush toy pictured below, so you know he's got a wild imagination. 

You can watch his daily beard routine on the Green Beard Grooming Vlog for proof of his beardliness. 
 


Ryan spent his formative years planting and caring for trees on his family’s tree farm. So he's willing to get his hands dirty and he know his way around a shovel. However, those skills probably won't be necessary. The trees we plant this spring are destined for Australia and it would be a waste of funds to send him there to do it. Our reforestation partners at One Tree Planted are already on-the-ground planting trees to help the land down under recover from the recent bushfire crisis.
 

The point is – you can trust that you'll get your rewards on time and that your trees will be planted. Just between us, we plan on moving forward with this project regardless of how the campaign performs. However, it would be an amazing help if you could give us a hand getting off the ground!

The great thing about Indiegogo is that you can help found companies that challenge norms and produce worthwhile products like our sustainably sourced combs. 
 

Green Beard Grooming Promise

We promise that our products will always be constructed from sustainably sourced, forest friendly materials, we will never-ever sell anything without planting a tree, and we will work environmental awareness into all aspects of our devotion to beards.

Our Mission

To make the bearded world a greener place; through reforestation, reducing plastic waste, promoting environmental awareness, entertaining people, and by fundamentally challenging what's expected from the beard industry.  
 


Social Media

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates on ongoing projects. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GreenBeardGrooming/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/green_grooming/

You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCivlbfivxe3BHI...
 


By pledging your support, you can help us make inexpensive sustainably sourced combs commonplace, challenge the beard industry to be better, and make the world a greener, healthier place for everyone.  

Your pledges make all the difference to our fledgling company. We plan to push ahead, – with or without you – but it'll be a hell of a lot easier with your help.
 


Press Packet 

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13eKNqEj...

Media Credits

Sound Effects and Music by Orange Free Sounds / CC BY 4.0 - http://www.orangefreesounds.com/

 Reforestation Photos and Planting Footage by One Tree Planted - https://www.onetreeplanted.org
story_txt:
Say NO to disposable plastic combs and plant a forest in the process. Each of our combs are paired with a tree planted in the name of one of our backers – like you – growing tall for decades to come, making the world a happier, healthier place. Switching to sustainably sourced wood combs is easy and you'll never lose a plastic pocket-comb again. Bamboo and Sandalwood is 100% natural and 100% biodegradable, which means your comb will break down naturally wherever you lose it. Our rounded mid-toothed pocket combs are great at detangling hair of all types – not just beard hair. You're going to love your new pocket comb regardless if you're bearded or beardless. Thank you for planting trees with us!  We are Ready to Go!Our combs are currently in production and our reforestation partners are on-the-ground planting trees right now. All we need is your beard's support to make this dream a reality.  Trees are more than just a good fit for a beard company. Trees clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, contribute to our health and wellbeing, and create jobs for social impact all around the globe.We care deeply about the planet and creating a business that gives back to the great outdoors and the wild places in this world – that’s why we've partnered with One Tree Planted to plant one tree for every Naturally Normal Pocket Comb (3-pack) and two trees for every Tree-mendous Sandalwood Folding Comb awarded through our campaign and beyond. The reforestation projects your pledges support do more than just plant trees – they support communities, increase biodiversity, provide clean air, filter water, help cool the planet, and generally make the world a happier greener place.  Together Green Beard Grooming and One Tree Planted are on a beardly mission to reforest the planet, one beard at a time! Currently, your trees are destined for Australia, in the future, Green Beard Grooming's efforts will shift to other regions of the world and right here at home, in North America. Our combs are a sustainable alternative to the cheap, plastic combs you can find anywhere, and the overpriced wood combs sold by other beard brands. They are of the highest quality, and perfectly sized for pockets, but not physically all that unique. What makes our combs truly different is that each comb is paired with a newly planted tree growing strong in a forest.This comb was designed to be a sustainable alternative to the standard 3-pack of cheap disposable plastic combs – but instead of plastic in a landfill every 3-pack of our combs represents a freshly planted tree.  The Naturally Normal Pocket Comb is a mid-toothed pocket comb with rounded teeth that are great at detangling hair of all hair types – not just beard hair – and is healthier for your scalp than scratchy plastic combs.  Bamboo combs are naturally antistatic and good conduits for beard oils, waxes, and balms. What we really love about bamboo, though, is that it’s a naturally renewable resource. After being harvested, fresh shoots spring up from the roots without needing to be replanted. Bamboo is remarkably low impact.Naturally Normal Pocket Comb Unboxing
 Compost Note: Our Naturally Normal Pocket Combs are designed to breakdown. They are very durable if kept dry but return to nature quickly in humid environments. They hold up great in a pocket or on a shelf – not so well in composter or shower.  This fragrant mid-toothed sandalwood comb has a weighted-feel and a super smooth finish that glides effortlessly through all hair types - not just beard hair. Each aptly named, Tree-mendous Folding Comb funds the planting of two trees and is made from sustainably harvested sandalwood – certified by the Forest Stewardship Council.Our sandalwood folding combs are even more durable and long-lasting than our bamboo combs thanks to sandalwood’s dense character and the comb’s design. The combing head of the Tree-mendous Folding Comb tucks nicely into an unfinished protective pocket, with the added bonus of keeping your comb smelling of fresh sandalwood oil. Sandalwood oil promotes healthy hair growth and is valued for its long lasting scent.Sustainability Concerns of Sandalwood Note: Sandalwood is the heavy scented heartwood of several species of genus Santalum. Some sandalwoods are sustainably harvested while other species are on the brink of extinction. Our manufacturers only source materials certified by the Forest Stewardship Council.Tree-Mendous Folding Comb Unboxing Composting Note: The tree-mendous folding comb has a metal hinge that can be easily removed and recycled, the comb was just too lossey-goosey without it. Check with your composting facility to make sure they accept wood products before composting.  Why choose sandalwood or bamboo when you can have both in one Tree-mendous Combo Pack. You get three regret-free bamboo pocket combs that you won't feel bad about losing and one very impressive sandalwood folding comb that will last for years. We’ll also plant three trees in your name.  The world doesn't need another "revolutionary" comb designed with a bottle opener in the handle – left to his own devices that is exactly what our founder would create – but it's unnecessary. Sustainably sourced products and reforestation efforts, though? Those are absolutely necessary!Our goal is to make sustainably sourced combs available to people who are currently using disposable plastic combs and to help grow a greener world in the process. No part of our mission mandates cutting-edge comb designs. We won’t settle for an inferior product, we simply don’t believe the pocket comb needs to be reinvented. Green Beard Grooming's mustachioed creator has lost a lot of pocket combs over the years – no clue where they went. All he knows is that they generally don’t turn back up – gone forever in a ditch somewhere.He’s lost expensive combs, cheap combs, metal combs, wooden combs, designer combs and a lot of disposable plastic combs. His working theory is that the combs get hooked on his keys and end up in parking lots. On many occasions – Ryan has crawled under his jeep to retrieve a pocket comb that bounced into the shadowy abyss.  Feeling bad about all of the non-biodegradable plastic being left in parking lots – Ryan decided a few years ago to switch to wooden combs but quickly ran into issues. The problem with stylish or even basic wooden combs is that they are – unnecessarily expensive  – given how cheap they are to produce unless you want to order 100 of them. Ryan was looking for inexpensive wood combs produced by a company with an environmental focus, and maybe a cool logo. Note – Macho Beards was pulled out of thin air. We have nothing specifically against the dozen or so companies with that name or hundreds with names like it. The point is that real men deserve better – and that is Green Beard Grooming's purpose.Finding no grooming companies that were giving back, Ryan decided to create one. We deserve more than unnecessarily expensive products with hyper-masculine branding! Having decided to create a beard company with a larger mission – It was time to find partners and define that mission. Making wood combs that would breakdown in parking lots wasn't going to be enough – the combs needed to be high-quality and the company needed a larger purpose.While researching eco-friendly manufacturers our founder came across the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) – who put him in touch with like-minded manufacturers that source sustainable and socially responsible materials. That concludes the story behind the creation of Green Beard Grooming but our story is just beginning. It’s not just that our founder loves trees and wants to cut back on disposable plastic. The reforestation projects that we work with are bigger than some pocket comb; we are challenging beard-industry norms by focusing on environmental causes; and the trees you help us plant will outlast our products by decades – or centuries.  Our founder  –  Ryan Trump  (pictured below playing with his mustache) – is new to e-commerce but has plenty of retail, beard, and tree planting experience.Working as a retail manager in the outdoor recreation industry, Ryan managed an outdoor adventure shop with around $5M in annual revenue and $350K in annual operating expenses – so he knows how to manage a budget. He helped design that crazy plush toy pictured below, so you know he's got a wild imagination. You can watch his daily beard routine on the Green Beard Grooming Vlog for proof of his beardliness.  Ryan spent his formative years planting and caring for trees on his family’s tree farm. So he's willing to get his hands dirty and he know his way around a shovel. However, those skills probably won't be necessary. The trees we plant this spring are destined for Australia and it would be a waste of funds to send him there to do it. Our reforestation partners at One Tree Planted are already on-the-ground planting trees to help the land down under recover from the recent bushfire crisis. The point is – you can trust that you'll get your rewards on time and that your trees will be planted. Just between us, we plan on moving forward with this project regardless of how the campaign performs. However, it would be an amazing help if you could give us a hand getting off the ground!The great thing about Indiegogo is that you can help found companies that challenge norms and produce worthwhile products like our sustainably sourced combs.  Green Beard Grooming PromiseWe promise that our products will always be constructed from sustainably sourced, forest friendly materials, we will never-ever sell anything without planting a tree, and we will work environmental awareness into all aspects of our devotion to beards.Our MissionTo make the bearded world a greener place; through reforestation, reducing plastic waste, promoting environmental awareness, entertaining people, and by fundamentally challenging what's expected from the beard industry.   
Social MediaFollow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates on ongoing projects. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GreenBeardGrooming/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/green_grooming/You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCivlbfivxe3BHI... By pledging your support, you can help us make inexpensive sustainably sourced combs commonplace, challenge the beard industry to be better, and make the world a greener, healthier place for everyone.  Your pledges make all the difference to our fledgling company. We plan to push ahead, – with or without you – but it'll be a hell of a lot easier with your help. Press Packet https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13eKNqEj...Media CreditsSound Effects and Music by Orange Free Sounds / CC BY 4.0 - http://www.orangefreesounds.com/ Reforestation Photos and Planting Footage by One Tree Planted - https://www.onetreeplanted.org

story:
Specifications & Summary

Materials

  •  Leather Type: Full-Grain
  •  Sourced From: Florence, Italy
  •  Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
  •  Inner Lining: Custom engineered black RFID-Proof Fabric

Main Features

  •  Cash Drawer: 20 bills
  •  4 Main Card Slots:  4 Cards (1 Per slot)
  •  2 Pull Tab Pockets: 6 Cards (3 Per pocket)
  •  2 Secret Card Slots: 2 Cards (1 Per slot)
  •  SD Card Slots: 2 SD memory cards (DSLR size)
  •  Micro SD Slot: 1 Micro SD memory card (Android size)
  •  Nano SIM Card Slot: 1 Nano SIM card (In most phones)
  •  SIM Pin Slot: 1 SIM pin (iPhone SIM pin size)

Colour Combinations

  •  Saddle Tan - Saddle Tan Interior & Exterior
  •  Black - Onyx Black Interior & Exterior

RFID Contactless Protection

  •  How it works: RFID signals are emitted to read your card details every time you scan your contactless card at the supermarket, metro, bar, etc.
  •  You're protected: The entire contents of the wallet are protected from RFID signals - which means they can't be scanned while inside your wallet.

Dimensions

  •  Open Length: 175mm
  •  Closed Length: 85mm
  •  Open Width: 5mm
  •  Closed Width: 12mm
  •  Height: 105mm
  •  Max Bill Length: 160mm
  •  Max Bill Height: 100mm
  •  SD Memory Card Size: 32mm x 24mm
  •  Nano SIM Size: 12mm x 10mm
  •  SIM Pin Size: 10mm x 27mm

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q: Are these the only colours offered?
  • A: The colours you see above, proved most popular on the original crowdfunding campaign.
 
  • Q: What are the dimensions? How big is this feature?
  • A: Please see the specifications above for a detailed breakdown of the features and dimensions.
 
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
  • A: We offer free shipping to all countries in the world.
 
  • Q: I have another question that isn't answered here, how can I contact you?
  • A: You may contact us via the following channels and we will do our best to reply to you within the hour:
  • The Indiegogo messaging system
  • Through Indiegogo comments - if you’re a backer 
  • By email at: CS (at) FilippoMorato (dot) com
 

Risks and challenges

The Suave 2.0 wallets you see on the campaign are the final production samples and have been made by the very same technique that yours will be.

They have been many months in the making and now that we've finalised the entire production process - from the design and right the way to the shipping - we're ready to show them to you.

After running two successful campaigns for the Suave Wallet and the Bands, we've raised close to $150,000 just on Kickstarter alone from over 2,500 happy backers. We're prepared for every eventuality including going well over our goal, just like we did with our previous projects and we have an additional two backups for every step of the process, from manufacturers to packers and shippers - so we'll definitely deliver on time.

Coronavirus: With regards to the current situation with respect to the Coronavirus, we've managed to persuade our manufacturer to pre-reserve materials on our behalf from the suppliers with special regard to the leather from the Florentine Tanneries so we can be sure that production and sourcing are both in check.

It's our highest priority to keep an open channel and conversation with you by conveying our thoughts from every step of the way through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you're always in the loop.

story:
WHO ARE WE?

Hello! We are the BEHRENS ORIGINAL - a watch company that is based in Hong Kong. We specialized in watchmaking and watch modification, in which we take pride in what we do. Our founder, B.Q.Jack, has more than 15 years in watchmaking - which we genuinely called him a watch factory master.

HOW DID WE COME ALIVE?

We pledged to inherit Peter Behrens’ (14 April 1868 - 27 February 1940) design philosophy on watchmaking. He was a German architect and designer; and also one of the important figures to the modernist movement.

“...to continue innovating is always been our life goal. All watches are fixed in form and have the design of all looking alike. If we need to break that pattern, we will have to break it from the root -- the movement.”

We have been modifying our own movement since 2012 and testing it for years before revealing it to the world. In honouring his name and his inspiring achievement, we named after him and thus, BEHRENS ORIGINAL.

WHAT IS OUR AIM?

Originality! Affordability! Developability!

MOON PHASE FUNCTION(ONLY AVAILABLE IN MOON PHASE MODEL)

 

To challenge “moon phase watch” is our first milestone.”

We have noticed that watches with a moonphase function are generally more adored by many watchers and collectors. After years of exploring the possibilities behind the popularity of this type of watch, we have concluded that the practicality and romantic sensation are the reasons.

Our watch, THE MOONPHASE, is a watch finely crafted with a moon phase indicator located at 6 o'clock position. We perceived that most of the moonphase watches on the market have a small moon display, which we decided to go opposite of it. Our watch has a big, complete moon display rather than a small, incomplete one. Our moon phase display system is based on a 31-tooth driving wheel showing the beauty of each phases of the moon. It requires manual correction every month to ensure each rotation happens every 31 days.

Unlike the common moonphase systems on the market, our system is far more elaborate. One of the main things is that our moonphase is presented conversely. The moon phase and the stars are coated with Super Luminova which provides bright luminous effect under dark environment. The moon phase dial is remarkably crafted with oil pressure and high-density silk-screen printing, for achieving both slenderness and stereoscopic imagery.

Take a look and understand more about the complication and the concept of moonphase watches here at govbergwatch!

https://www.govbergwatches.com/blog/moonphase/?amp

MOVEMENT

We have soul; so do watches. Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 10 years of experiences in Swiss and Japan movement watchmaking and watch modification. This time we are proud to present our new modified mechanical movement BR2515 (BR2515 is a modificated movement from a famous Japan movement). It functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 24 jewels, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of height 4.3mm and 26mm overall diameter, it is super slim. If you are worrying about the power reserve of the watch, rest assure! The BR2515 provides up to 40 hours of power-reserve. It is perfect for your daily usage.

ACCURACY

We deeply focused on watch modification and movement tuning. As such, absolute accuracy is always on our important checklist. We ensure the quality of every parts by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.

The testing procedure lasts 7 days

Day 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial up and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24) , the movement is tested again in the five positions.

Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.

Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.

Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(t0) and is tested in five positions again.

All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches are highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.

As we have modified the movement, we need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situations. We then tested the sample watches on wrist for more than 9 months before we started our kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches are highly guaranteed.

FINE CRAFTED ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP

We are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted italian calf leather strap to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on both the lugs and the buckle sides allows you to change your strap without any special tool.

MULTI-POLISHING CASE

Case design is one of the significant symbols of our watches. Our dedication for watch making is clear: The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. We applied many different production processes to make a remarkable watch case. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertical brushed on the lugs and circular brush on the back. Although these production methods are long and costly, we aim to give you the best looking, durable, and elegant watch cases. Besides, the four lugs of the case are separately produced; the angle of the watch will be sharp and absolute. Such costly production method could only be found in luxury watches production.

To enhance the slim movement and the innovative moon phase disc, we minimized the height of the case to 7.9mm only. While including the sapphire crystal and the lugs, the height is now only 11.4mm(for MOON PHASE model) which is really comfortable to wear.

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL

For producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the Moh's scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for daily wear.

For MOON PHASE model, dome shape sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 4.5mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 2.4mm dome shape crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome shape sapphire. Since it is costly and time-consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome shape sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.

DIAMOND CUTTING REFLECTIVE INDEX

(ONLY AVAILABLE IN MOON PHASE MODEL)

We innovated a new method of index making - the Diamond Cutting Index. The index is cut by a diamond cutter 20 times in two directions; thus the surface of the index is a complex oblique. To give the dial a luxurious touch, light is our major resource. With light reflects on the index’s glossy surface from different angles, a rainbow(chrome) color is created. We believe such natural phenomenon will attract many of you.

2-YEAR WARRANTY

We are confident about the quality of our watches - BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches. Each watch is backed by a 2-year warranty. We have our own factory and watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance everyday before shipping. So rest assure, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience!

THE MODEL

 * The logo "BEHRENS 2012" is used on the prototypes for videos and maybe some of the photos, our final products will be "BEHRENS ORIGINAL"

MORE SNAP SHOTS TO SHOW THE BEAUTY OF BEHRENS ORIGINAL WATCHES

 

Risks and challenges

BEHRENS ORIGINAL aims to be a movement develop company. We will keep developing new movement/time display method on our products. The R&A is costly and time consuming. We are also developing 3 models and will be applying on-wrist testing. The testing is strict and time consuming. If you think we are on the right path, please support and subscribe us. Thank you so much :)

We ensure the quality of every parts by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.The testing procedure lasts 7 daysDay 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial up and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24) , the movement is tested again in the five positions.Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(t0) and is tested in five positions again.All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches are highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.As we have modified the movement, we need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situations. We then tested the sample watches on wrist for more than 9 months before we started our kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches are highly guaranteed.FINE CRAFTED ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAPWe are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted italian calf leather strap to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on both the lugs and the buckle sides allows you to change your strap without any special tool.MULTI-POLISHING CASECase design is one of the significant symbols of our watches. Our dedication for watch making is clear: The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. We applied many different production processes to make a remarkable watch case. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertical brushed on the lugs and circular brush on the back. Although these production methods are long and costly, we aim to give you the best looking, durable, and elegant watch cases. Besides, the four lugs of the case are separately produced; the angle of the watch will be sharp and absolute. Such costly production method could only be found in luxury watches production.To enhance the slim movement and the innovative moon phase disc, we minimized the height of the case to 7.9mm only. While including the sapphire crystal and the lugs, the height is now only 11.4mm(for MOON PHASE model) which is really comfortable to wear.SAPPHIRE CRYSTALFor producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the Moh's scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for daily wear.For MOON PHASE model, dome shape sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 4.5mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 2.4mm dome shape crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome shape sapphire. Since it is costly and time-consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome shape sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.DIAMOND CUTTING REFLECTIVE INDEX(ONLY AVAILABLE IN MOON PHASE MODEL)We innovated a new method of index making - the Diamond Cutting Index. The index is cut by a diamond cutter 20 times in two directions; thus the surface of the index is a complex oblique. To give the dial a luxurious touch, light is our major resource. With light reflects on the index’s glossy surface from different angles, a rainbow(chrome) color is created. We believe such natural phenomenon will attract many of you.2-YEAR WARRANTYWe are confident about the quality of our watches - BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches. Each watch is backed by a 2-year warranty. We have our own factory and watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance everyday before shipping. So rest assure, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience!THE MODEL * The logo "BEHRENS 2012" is used on the prototypes for videos and maybe some of the photos, our final products will be "BEHRENS ORIGINAL"MORE SNAP SHOTS TO SHOW THE BEAUTY OF BEHRENS ORIGINAL WATCHES Risks and challengesBEHRENS ORIGINAL aims to be a movement develop company. We will keep developing new movement/time display method on our products. The R&A is costly and time consuming. We are also developing 3 models and will be applying on-wrist testing. The testing is strict and time consuming. If you think we are on the right path, please support and subscribe us. Thank you so much :)

story:
Plenty of designs and countless samples later, we came up with the Perpetual Calendar series, a watch series that’s guaranteed to turn heads wherever you go.
 





Each Valuchi watch has been meticulously designed to ensure its simple perfection. We have multiple different color schemes, and we’re confident you'll find your favorite.
 


Every watch is finished with an exceptional color scheme, and they accompany the most active lifestyles with incomparable class.


We wanted to make a watch, one which is good-looking, well-built and doesn't break the bank.


That's exactly what we did!

In August of 2018 I sat in a staircase at the Piazza di Milano (the square). Looking at the Duomo, suddenly an idea crossed my mind:
Wouldn't it be a great to turn my great passion for watches into actual watches?

...that's where the journey began.
 


Duomo di Milano, Milan


We combined the old traditional styles of our home city Amsterdam and Milan to make a watch collection which is new and fresh but classical and traditional at the same time.
 

Westerkerk, Amsterdam


On the back of your watch you will find a unique engraving that encapsulates the inspirational design of our journey.
 


       

One the left you will find the Westerkerk, Amsterdam and on the right you will find the Duomo di Milano, Milan. These iconic landmarks are truly mesmerizing. They will leave you speechless at their unarguable beauty.
 

Valuchi has partnered with the finest watch manufacturers. Craftsmanship is key, and each watchmaker put considerable time, effort, and attention to detail toward creating our timepieces. 
 


Every watch is assembled using advanced technologies, artisanal know-how, authenticity, and exemplary finishing. 

We developed multiple watch prototypes to perfect our end product— resulting in the very best watch Valuchi can offer. 
 

We use only the finest premium, luxury Italian leather for a sumptuous, tactile experience. We coordinate the rich leather strap to either match or contrast perfectly with your watch - creating the élan (energy and style) of a thousand-dollar-timepiece.
 

Italian leather is well known in the fashion industry as the very best. One of the reasons Italian leather is so highly regarded is because of its quality. Our limited travel cases will also come in this beautiful leather.



Get your leather strap add-on at the check-out page for only 25€ extra! 

                                 
 



The problem we were facing was finding a watch with a luxurious feeling for an affordable price. 

                     
We have been cutting out all the hidden fees you normally pay. Think of branding cost, distributors, retail stores and wholesalers. We tried to make a watch brand without having the audacity to charge $2000+ for a watch.



With the rounded shape of its bezel, the ingenious porthole construction of its case, and its beautiful dial, the Perpetual Calendar has the elegance you only dreamt off. In multiple colors we made a splendid collection of models in steel, rose gold and black. 


Beyond the round bezel with eight screws, the dial features a moon phase with a lightning bolt seconds hand which makes it a real eye-catcher.
 


 



This audacious choice of the green color in combination with rose gold evokes a sense of adventure and far horizons. The rounded bezel with eight screws combines polished and satin finishes.
 


 




Our bracelets are designed to be customizable with removable links, so that they can comfortably fit on wrists of all sizes.
 




Balanced, elegant and refined, the Perpetual Calendar comes with a full range of calendar functions in addition to its brilliant moonphase complication.
 




The packaging that comes with a watch might actually make a bigger difference than one might think. Opening a package isn’t only about what’s inside; it’s about the entire experience.
 



We designed Valuchi's packaging with a beautiful Leondardo da Vinci quote in mind. "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication".

​Because this is the start of your Valuchi watch collection, we want to give you the best watch experience as possible. With that goal in mind we proudly introduce the Limited Italian Leather Travel Case.
 


The case is sturdily built, made of handcrafted, genuine Italian leather with precise stitching that elevates its aesthetic.



The retail price of these limited travel cases are $110, but because our appreciation to you when backing 2 or more watches, we give it for FREE!

 

 

 

The detailed manual work carried out on the components of a watch is where hand-finishing reaches a rare pinnacle.
 


Like a butterfly spreading its wings, Valuchi’s choice of a butterfly clasp is made of two metal hinges that open symmetrically outward to the right and left.

The butterfly clasp is attached to the watch with a spring bar and enhances the overall appearance of a watch while making it easier to open and close than a regular watch clasp.

The Miyota movements perform at the same accuracy as entry level Swiss movements and considered to be real powerhouses. These movements have proven their consistent accuracy over the decades and are easy to service. (battery life of 3 years)

 




We are so confident about the quality of our watches, that every watch we produce comes with a 2 year warranty. Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover: 

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
     

My name is Kelvin Dijkhuizen, project leader and founder of Valuchi Watches. I am a millennial entrepreneur who is always seeking for new adventures and ideas. I wanted to create a watch product, one which is good-looking, well-built and doesn't break the bank. In the core of this search I tried to find a way to create impeccable value at a down-to-earth price point. Value that makes his or her life just a little better. 

I've been obsessed with watches for as long as I can remember – likely my entire life – and because of my continuing passion for horology, I created Valuchi. I combined my great passion for watches with the love for my home city Amsterdam, as well as the city of Milan, where this whole idea of creating a watch brand began.

Luckily I got accompanied in this journey by a small diverse team with creative millennials who just like me, go asleep and wake up with Valuchi in mind. This all to make a watch brand which will give an extra value to all lives wearing a Valuchi watch on their wrist.


 

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our excellent timepieces, but also sharing our story with a friend. The important thing to remember with Indiegogo is, if we don't reach our fixed funding goal, these watches will not become reality.
 



We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways. We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal. If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just following our Instagram page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Instagram and Facebook tabs at the bottom of the page. 

Our sincere thanks to everyone who helped us to create this brand and who gave us honest feedback throughout the last two years!  


Are you a journalist or a blogger? Click here to feature this project on your media


 

 

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

DOMESTIC SHIPPING - To 7 Countries:

United States, Philippines, Hong Kong, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia and Russia. We have a warehouse in Hong Kong that allow us to offer low-cost domestic shipping to the 7 countries listed above. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 7 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - All over the World:

Backers from all countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you’re not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.
 

Risks and challenges

The challenges to Valuchi watches will now be getting the word out, and convincing people on Indiegogo to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word. Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for years and have established a solid relationship, which has given us a lot of confidence in them.

Special Thanks:

Leather Han

story:
We have received independent test results from FDA registered and ISO 17025 accredited Nelson Labs USA. Our filter media has been tested in compliance with ASTM F2101-19 and EN 14683:2019, Annex B. The filter media received a Filtration Efficiency greater than 99.80%.  Our filter material has also been tested against a particle size of 0.1μm and received an average filtration efficiency of 99.50%.

AusAir was created by two brothers Elias Honor and Isaac Honor, and their lifelong friend Jack Graham. When travelling overseas, they experienced unhealthy air pollution first hand. To protect themselves, they looked for a stylish, breathable and functional mask but couldn't find any.  After years of looking into the problems with current masks, testing new designs and prototyping, AusAir was born. The result is a mask which offers unparalleled breathability, filtration and style.

Includes two valve options: 

1. Block out valve for two way protection (valve deactivated). 

2. Exhalation valve for added breathability and humidity control.

The main sources of air pollution include vehicle exhaust emissions, tire dust, wood fires and power generation. 

This is what you breathe every day...

Flu & illness...

Our filter media has been tested by Nelson Labs USA, in compliance with ASTM F2101-19 and EN 14683:2019, Annex B. The filter media received a Filtration Efficiency greater than 99.70%. The results are available on our website here: https://shopausair.com/pages/certifications

When disaster strikes... 

Climate scientists at Berkeley Earth have studied and have quantified the cigarette equivalence of air pollution in terms of its effect on your health. 

Train commuters

Train commuters experience the largest average exposure per mile out of commuting via car, bus or light rail. Pull train commuters experienced ultra fine particle concentrations approximately 10x greater than urban background concentrations. 

Cyclists

According to the World Health Organisation, cycling through traffic dense urban regions has been shown to have the highest average exposure to air pollutants per mile of all common forms of commuting.

City Dwellers

People living in cities are at serious risk with 9/10 city dwellers globally and 56% from wealthier countries breathing in polluted air increasing their risk of lung cancer, stroke and heart disease.

It’s a mask with a difference. With reusable, washable skins designed to complement any outfit, and changeable filters infused with Australian botanicals, this is no ordinary mask.

Not only does AusAir filter over 99% of small airborne pollution (PM0.1), prevent the spread of infection and protect your face, but it comes jam-packed with amazing features. 

The world’s thinnest one-way valves

Featuring twin marine grade 316 stainless steel valves, for an unrivalled breathing experience. Engineered to maximise exhalation and prevent hot air build up.

Highly Durable 

We’ve sourced strong yet flexible PU material that offers unmatched comfort and ease of use.

Designed and tested to last and maintain shape for over 100 washes.

Magic fit ear-loops

Ear loops tailored to fit your experience. No hard-to-adjust buckles or straps.

Memory nose foam 

Plush memory nose foam which molds to the shape of your facial contours effortlessly.

Ergonomic design

A seamless fit which offers full protection, not allowing air to escape in through the sides.

Click & switch design

The simple click and switch design allows you to swap and replace filters with ease. Auto-align the filter and skin every time so you know you are wearing the mask correctly. 

Utilising the latest in material science technology, we’ve developed a pollution filter that will exceed Australian respiratory protection standards.

1. Soft melt-blown inner layer.

2.  Two melt-blown microfibre layers filtering over 99% of PM0.1 pollution, smoke and pollen and other airborne particles.

3. Electrostatic cotton layer with nano-filtering technology removing ultra-fine PM2.5 particles.

4. Active carbon for hydrocarbon gas filtration and anti-odour.

5. Durable PP outer protective layer to prevent dirt and other large particles building up on the filter layers.

6. Outer washable skin.

Particulate Matter Protection

The biggest pollution concern in terms of your health comes down to tiny hazardous particles suspended in the air called ‘particulate matter’. Some of the most potent of these particles is called PM2.5 meaning that these particles are 2.5 microns.

To put this into perspective, a micron is a millionth of a metre, with a human hair being around 70 microns.  

Our filter range embeds botanicals sourced from Australian farms which offer subtle flora scents and other botanical benefits. Each filter harnesses the naturally evolved properties of the embedded botanical. 

Based on a body of scientific literature, choose the O2Plus filter which suits your needs. And for those of you who just want to breathe in pure air, we have a blank filter for you too.  

Our botanical filters are the same as the standard filters, blocking over 99% of PM0.1, but with added botanical benefits.

Our ultra breathable skins are made from machine washable polyurethane foam, soft on the skin with high durability. Coming in a range of simple block colours designed to complement any outfit. From the urban commuter through to the corporate professional, dress it up with a blazer or rock it with your favourite pair of jeans.

For maximum efficiency and hygiene, filters last up to 100 hours or between 2-4 weeks depending on use. The filters are interchangeable with your washable mask skin, so you can choose the filter you want when you want. 

With multiple sizes and colours, we offer protection for the whole family. Sizes include Kids/XS, S/M and Large. You can select your size during the backer survey which is sent to your email 11 days after your pledge. The size guide is available on our website here. 

Choose your size, colour and filter type after supporting our project. On the 11th day after you have made your contribution, you will automatically receive an email with a survey link to provide this information. Please note, we do not offer refunds on contributions made once this 11 day period has passed. Indiegogo takes a non-refundable platform fee after this stage. We also use your contribution to pay for production, alongside campaign running costs.

Engineered to maximise exhalation and prevent hot air build up.Highly Durable We’ve sourced strong yet flexible PU material that offers unmatched comfort and ease of use.Designed and tested to last and maintain shape for over 100 washes.Magic fit ear-loopsEar loops tailored to fit your experience. No hard-to-adjust buckles or straps.Memory nose foam Plush memory nose foam which molds to the shape of your facial contours effortlessly.Ergonomic designA seamless fit which offers full protection, not allowing air to escape in through the sides.Click & switch designThe simple click and switch design allows you to swap and replace filters with ease. Auto-align the filter and skin every time so you know you are wearing the mask correctly. Utilising the latest in material science technology, we’ve developed a pollution filter that will exceed Australian respiratory protection standards.1. Soft melt-blown inner layer.2.  Two melt-blown microfibre layers filtering over 99% of PM0.1 pollution, smoke and pollen and other airborne particles.3. Electrostatic cotton layer with nano-filtering technology removing ultra-fine PM2.5 particles.4. Active carbon for hydrocarbon gas filtration and anti-odour.5. Durable PP outer protective layer to prevent dirt and other large particles building up on the filter layers.6. Outer washable skin.Particulate Matter ProtectionThe biggest pollution concern in terms of your health comes down to tiny hazardous particles suspended in the air called ‘particulate matter’. Some of the most potent of these particles is called PM2.5 meaning that these particles are 2.5 microns.To put this into perspective, a micron is a millionth of a metre, with a human hair being around 70 microns.  Our filter range embeds botanicals sourced from Australian farms which offer subtle flora scents and other botanical benefits. Each filter harnesses the naturally evolved properties of the embedded botanical. Based on a body of scientific literature, choose the O2Plus filter which suits your needs. And for those of you who just want to breathe in pure air, we have a blank filter for you too.  Our botanical filters are the same as the standard filters, blocking over 99% of PM0.1, but with added botanical benefits.Our ultra breathable skins are made from machine washable polyurethane foam, soft on the skin with high durability. Coming in a range of simple block colours designed to complement any outfit. From the urban commuter through to the corporate professional, dress it up with a blazer or rock it with your favourite pair of jeans.For maximum efficiency and hygiene, filters last up to 100 hours or between 2-4 weeks depending on use. The filters are interchangeable with your washable mask skin, so you can choose the filter you want when you want. With multiple sizes and colours, we offer protection for the whole family. Sizes include Kids/XS, S/M and Large. You can select your size during the backer survey which is sent to your email 11 days after your pledge. The size guide is available on our website here. Choose your size, colour and filter type after supporting our project. On the 11th day after you have made your contribution, you will automatically receive an email with a survey link to provide this information. Please note, we do not offer refunds on contributions made once this 11 day period has passed. Indiegogo takes a non-refundable platform fee after this stage. We also use your contribution to pay for production, alongside campaign running costs.

story:
ANYONE.  ANYTIME.  ANYPLACE.

The Xpand Quick Release System is a simple, comfortable, performance lacing system that takes almost any pair of shoes to the next level!

EVERYTHING YOU NEED IS INCLUDED! 

Each pack will contain everything required to complete 1 pair of shoes. Casual, athletic, sport, boots, high tops, it really doesn't matter, we have you covered! Keep on scrolling our page for tons of information on the new lacing system.

SLIP ON AND GO IN RELAXED MODE! 

If you're not doing any vigorous activities and you want the most comfortable fit in the world, simply slip your shoes on and go! No need to lock! The key is to set the tension you desire for a ultra relaxed fit during the installation process. It's very simple and all of our backers will get a complimentary full installation instructional video.

QUICKLY LOCK OR UNLOCK. 

Get comfortable or get serious in 3 seconds flat. Lock in place, or pop the lock and release. It's that simple.

LOCK FOR ACTIVE MODE. 

Quickly tighten and lock your desired tension/fit in place. As easy as it is to lock in place, it's nearly impossible for our system to come unlocked or loosen during activities. Our minimal design is extremely simple and effective with almost any pair of shoes! Notice how nice and flat our laces sit against the shoes due to the design of our lock?

UNLOCK FOR RELAXED MODE. 

It's always nice to release pressure. Simply pull the tab and pop the lock, it's that simple. The secret is within the design. The grooves lined within the canals that your laces rest in actually pull the laces downward and become tighter as pressure is applied. The laces become thinner as you pull the tab outward allowing them to free from the grooves.

REVERSE/HIDDEN MODE FOR ANY PANTS.

Simply twist the lock so it's facing in the opposite direction, pull the tab upwards and lock in place. This method can be used in any situation but it works great with pants because the clips rest upwards and tuck nicely under your pant legs hidden from view!

SOME SERIOUS STRETCH COMFORT.

Our inner lace is made with strands of high grade German rubber to give a little extra flex in each step or stride.  Unlike standard laces that have virtually no flex, our laces act as a small shock absorber.  This provides relief along the top of your feet and translates all the way to the bottom of your feet.

5 SECOND INSTALLATION CLIP.

Installing the Xpand Quick Release System is literally a "SNAP".  It takes all of about 5 minutes to do a full installation on a pair of shoes.  The clip below is a quick demo of how simple it actually is!

NOT JUST SHOES.

While developing this product we realized how many products such as backpacks, shorts, pants, jackets, camping equipment, camera bags etc. that require those pinch and slide toggles that always loosen up. The Xpand Quick Release System is a game changer! Not only do you get extreme holding power, you get a clean look in comparison to other toggles that force the cord to hang straight out.

SIMPLICITY AT ITS BEST.

I wanted the new Xpand Quick Release System to be extremely simple to install and even easier to use.  Our 1 piece design is extremely effective and sets us apart from others.  Made from a fiber filled resin, it's nearly indestructible and holds up to some serious abuse!

GUARANTEED NOT TO SLIP.  

Trial and error along with 8 solid months of in-use hardcore testing on a wide spectrum of shoes and boots! I certainly didn't rush this product to market. I wanted to make sure it would withstand heavy usage and take a beating! It really doesn't matter if your running a triathlon or walking the park, Xpand is up for the task. Our Lock design held over 30 Pounds (16.5kg) of pressure before any slippage occurred. This was 4x the holding power of any other clip designs we tested! 

It's true. The new Xpand Quick Release System is for any and everyone! It doesn't matter if you're a couch potato or a world class triathlete. This system will become your shoes best friend. One thing you will notice immediately is the level of comfort established with the semi-forgiving elastic laces. Do the things you love "comfortably" with the Xpand System. Don't forget about your kiddos, they will love them too!

                             

MIX AND MATCH FROM OVER 40 COLORS.

With over 40 potential colors (keep scrolling down to see them) to choose from, we're sure you can find something that matches your shoes! You will get to pick your colors after the campaign ends. All the colors are listed below. If you're interested in our flat lacing system, make sure to check out the "combo pack"!

                           

COLOR, COLOR AND MORE COLOR.

We know how import color is.  Color can make or break things aesthetically.  We matched pantone colors to the best of our ability to match today's hottest and most popular shoes.  We're sure you can find some colors that will work great with your shoes! 

                                

THE XPAND FLAT LACING SYSTEM.

I launched the Original Flat Xpand Lacing System into the Crowdfunding world in October of 2015 on Kickstarter and then on Indiegogo.  Our Campaign was a huge success with nearly 40,000 backers and over $1,200,000 total funds raised.  We delivered successfully and many people are still enjoying the same set of laces today that were purchased over 2 years ago!  While the new Quick Release System is not here to replace the original flat system, we wanted to make sure and offer a round system with a few different characteristics and performance enhancements.  

The Xpand Original Flat Lacing System transforms almost any shoe or boot into a comfortable, hassle free slip-on.  Set the desired tension for a perfect fit day after day!

HALF & HALF COMBO PACK

Since our Flat Lacing System continues to be very popular, we figured you may want to try some of each!  Pick any colors after the campaign ends!

DESIGN TEAM PARTNERS.

I continued to work with the same design team that I have worked with since I started to develop and launch products.  The Pillar Product Design Team is second to none and they always give my product ideas/concepts the attention and details needed to become a reality.  It's always a pleasure working them.  As simple as this product looks, there were many factors that came into play during the development process.

 While testing the pull-tabs, we found that simple was always better.  With so many variations that accomplished the same thing, we found the one that did the job best.  Through the pull tab testing phase, we tested over 20 designs!

The strength testing box was essential in developing our lock.  While ease of use was on our mind, the lock had to out-perform the other locking devices on the market.  What we didn't realize was how much more pressure our design was going to hold!  If you're looking for performance, we found it!  

As simple as the product looks, the tooling/mould to actually create the product was a little more complex than the standard.  The way the teeth are designed and some of the radius' required caused a few issues but in the end, we conquered!  Can't wait to get this in your hands!

MANUFACTURING PARTNERS.

I have worked with both our plastic parts manufacturer and our shoelace manufacturer for over 4 years now.  They have never let me down and continue to produce quality parts in a timely manner.  To date we have ran MILLIONS of parts with both of them.  They are prepared to service this campaigns demand!  We will be pulling the trigger on manufacturing immediately after we hit the $8,500 mark (hoping this happens) and will continue to manufacture parts while the campaign is actually running.  This will allow us to hit our delivery date of mid summer!  All the laces and hardware you see in this campaign are production parts.  There are no hurdles to jump with production, the hard work is done and we are ready to go!

Each cavity has a number to help keep track of parts.  While each cavity is basically identical, the reality is each part can vary slightly.  By having a number on each cavity/part, we were able to test each part individually to make sure the performance was perfect!

These tools/moulds will be serviced about every 300,000 cycles.  This means we will manufacture approximately 1.2 million locks before the tool will show any signs of wear and require some service.  If this campaign goes well, we will immediately have additional tools/moulds manufactured as backups and to speed up the production process.

As you can see above, the locks come connected in groups of 4.  They are then placed in a tumbler that separates the locks from the waste.  The waste is actually recycled and used to make other parts that do not require as much strength as our locks.  We do not re-use the waste because once the plastic is re-heated/melted, it loses some strength.  Don't worry, one of the manufacturers other customers will make sure it's used.

 The pull tabs are made of similar material as our locks but they do not contain any fibers.  The fibers are what gives the locks their rigidness.  The pull tabs need to be able to fold over and snap in place at the ends of your lace so they definitely can't be rigid due to the one piece design.

While our laces look like a standard round style shoelace on the outside, it's all about what's on the inside that makes a difference. 20 individual strands of German made natural rubber provides longevity and holds zero memory. This means they don't get stretched out without fully retracting like that cheap pair of underwear. These will most likely outlast the shoes they're in!

Our shoelace manufacturer has partnered with almost every large shoe company at one time or another.  They have shoelace manufacturing machines running 24 hours a day nearly every single day.  Their quality control and efficient manufacturing process is second to none.  Their ability to consistently match our pantone color choices is amazing as well.  Kickstarter projects are only as good as the people making the end product.  Thankfully, we have amazing partners from start to finish!  

Each package will include a special instruction sheet insert which is not shown here.  We wanted the packaging to be minimal, effective and have a nice clean look.  We are working on having the packaging made from recycled materials.

F.A.Q.

1. Does the Xpand Lacing System work with "All" Shoes? There are so many shoes it's impossible to test on all of them. If you have eyelets or hoops that the laces are installed through odds are they will work great. They work excellent with high tops and boots as well!

2. Can I run with the Xpand Quick Release System? Absolutely. This system is designed with runners and hard core athletes in mind. You can set the tension as tight as you would like. You will also be surprised how much comfort the system provides with the little extra "give" the elastic laces provide.

3. Are the laces adjustable after I trim them? Absolutely, just make sure that you don't trim them too short initially. We suggest test fitting prior to trimming the laces. Install the lock and get the shoe set for the relaxed fit first.  Remember, you can always trim more if needed. 

4. Do they work on kids shoes? They work excellently with kids shoes! My kids love not having to worry about tying their shoes.  One thing many parents don't think about is all the dirty things kids laces come in contact with especially when they are left untied throughout the day.  Think about all the public school restroom visits!

5. Can you ship international? Yes. We will ship ANYWHERE in the world!

6. Can I pledge for multiple of the same reward? Yes I believe Kickstarter now allows this.  Simply pick your reward then double the dollar amount pledged. 

7. Can I become a distributor?  Please send us a private message and we will get back to you.

8. Do you have a patent?  Yes we do have Patents Pending. We will monitor domestic and international trade shows as well as multiple USA/International internet and brick-and-mortar retailers and resellers. We will protect our Patents / Trademarks / brands / images / retailers / resellers to the fullest extent of the law.

Music in the video by:

IN YOUR ARMS by Nicolai Heidlas Music https://soundcloud.com/nicolai-heidlas Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported— CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b... Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/tkYNuH1UrSY

Lights by Sappheiros https://soundcloud.com/sappheirosmusic Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported — CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b... Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/-lbbHQbZNKg

story: This campaign is over.
story_txt: This campaign is over.

story:
While we think the existing California flag is just fine, the bear is just sort of plodding along giving the viewer of the flag a sideways glance.  One might imagine his internal dialog as "derpy, derpy, derpy, derp.  I'm a bear and I'm going for a walk.  Are those blackberries?  No?  Oh well.  Derp. Derp. Derp."  This is hardly an inspiring bit of iconography that is going to get Californians fired up to resist Trump and his enablers.

On the other hand, a standing, totally pissed-off bear who is going to tear that stupid star to shreds if it DOESN'T BACK THE F UP is the sort of image that can get the people pumped up.  One look at this bear and you can't help but thinking "I can't wait until Werner Herzog makes a documentary about this kickass bear who is going to stop American facism."  And Werner Herzog is going to take one look at this bear and will immediately regret making that other bear movie because he knows this is a much better bear, but he's worried that folks are going to think he's obsessed with bears, which he totally isn't.   Werner, don't worry about it.  Everyone is going to understand.

We think that iconography matters, or at the very least it can help.  Recent political graphic design has given us the Obama "Hope" poster as well as those Chinese manufactured "I'm With Stupid" red hats that helped get the Cheeto cosplayer elected.  We think this bit of iconography will help.

You have to wear something to the protests, so it may as well be something awesome like a t-shirt with a pissed off bear on it.  OK, fine imaginary pedantic nudist that is going to argue with me; no one has to wear anything to the protests if they don't want to.  You may be right, but you are still the worst.  Will you PLEASE put a sock on.

We will use the funds raised by this Indiegogo campaign to pay for our first production run, expand out product line, and hopefully start to demonstrate to California's political leadership that this new design is a vastly better logo for today's California and should be adopted as California's OFFICIAL STATE FLAG.  

Once we've covered our costs, we're going to be donating at least 25% of the profits to a portfolio of California based non-profits and charities that we believe will be effective in helping to mitigate the damage caused by the current administration.  Initially we'll be donating to the Mexican-American Education and Legal Defense Fund, the Norcal chapter of Planned Parenthood, the Opportunity Fund, and the California Environmental Justice Alliance.  Just to be clear, none of these outfits are sponsoring, supporting, or are even remotely aware of this project.  We just want to raise some funds for them.   We're open to any bright ideas regarding where some of the donations should go. Any cash that isn't donated will be piled into expanding the product line/inventory which will allow us to sell more stuff and ultimately donate more cash.  We're hopeful that we'll ultimately be able to donate essentially 100% of the profits and don't intend to personally be making any money off of this project.

movie because he knows this is a much better bear, but he's worried that folks are going to think he's obsessed with bears, which he totally isn't.   Werner, don't worry about it.  Everyone is going to understand.We think that iconography matters, or at the very least it can help.  Recent political graphic design has given us the Obama "Hope" poster as well as those Chinese manufactured "I'm With Stupid" red hats that helped get the Cheeto cosplayer elected.  We think this bit of iconography will help.You have to wear something to the protests, so it may as well be something awesome like a t-shirt with a pissed off bear on it.  OK, fine imaginary pedantic nudist that is going to argue with me; no one has to wear anything to the protests if they don't want to.  You may be right, but you are still the worst.  Will you PLEASE put a sock on.We will use the funds raised by this Indiegogo campaign to pay for our first production run, expand out product line, and hopefully start to demonstrate to California's political leadership that this new design is a vastly better logo for today's California and should be adopted as California's OFFICIAL STATE FLAG.  Once we've covered our costs, we're going to be donating at least 25% of the profits to a portfolio of California based non-profits and charities that we believe will be effective in helping to mitigate the damage caused by the current administration.  Initially we'll be donating to the Mexican-American Education and Legal Defense Fund, the Norcal chapter of Planned Parenthood, the Opportunity Fund, and the California Environmental Justice Alliance.  Just to be clear, none of these outfits are sponsoring, supporting, or are even remotely aware of this project.  We just want to raise some funds for them.   We're open to any bright ideas regarding where some of the donations should go. Any cash that isn't donated will be piled into expanding the product line/inventory which will allow us to sell more stuff and ultimately donate more cash.  We're hopeful that we'll ultimately be able to donate essentially 100% of the profits and don't intend to personally be making any money off of this project.

story:
The Six Degree Project

The Six Degree Project is a grassroots initiative, developed by passionate students in Toronto dedicating to creating social change. The project is spearheaded collaboratively by autistic Northern student and autism advocate Carly Fleischmann, and students Emily Albert and Mia Kibel. We feel that though autism is growing more and more prevalent, it is highly misunderstood. Our aim is to foster acceptance and understanding.

The objective is to get celebrities who are constantly in the media eye to participate by wearing an Autism-blue scarf! 

We are committed to improving the lives of children and youth with autism around the world by generating awareness and providing meaningful information. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have been lucky enough to have the design and production of our scarves kindly sponsored, but we will need to pay to ship these scarves out to our celebs. And we need your support. This is an essential piece of the puzzle that will directly ensure this project is a success.

If you donate $49 or more, we will send you a free 6-Degree Project scarf!

We are poor students coming accross many costs along the way... please help us realize our goals and donate now!!

Any extra funds will be donated to Autism Speaks Canada.

 

 

The Impact

By having members of our community connect to these celebrities, it will allow community members to feel empowered and make a greater impact around the world, and it will increase awareness for those living with autism. These celebrities are admired by millions of viewers. People listen to them, and will be motivated to understand what it means to have Autism, and how they can create better environments for those around them living with Autism.

The project vision came from Carly Fleischmann, an autistic girl who has become a famous advocate for the disorder. We are learning so much from one another, and hopefully our story will serve as an example for acceptance and friendship between people of different abilities and struggles. 

You can check out Carly's story and thoughts at https://www.facebook.com/carlysvoice and https://twitter.com/CarlysVoice 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute today, have no fear! You can support us by sharing our campaign via the indiegogo 'share' button. 

Please follow us on twitter and like our facebook page. Check out https://thesixdegreeproject.com to connect to celebrities yourself and help make the project a success!

https://www.facebook.com/TheSixDegreeProject

https://twitter.com/6Degree_Project
