story:
Axess Front Wallets is designed to fit seamlessly in your front pocket so that you don’t have to sit on your bulky wallet. With its thin profile & lightweight design, Axess is small enough to fit comfortably in your front pocket, yet big enough to hold the essentials. All models are fitted with an RFID-blocking pocket & are handmade in top grade genuine leather.

New Campaign up on Indiegogo: Check out http://tinyurl.com/axessfrontwallets





"These superb leather offerings from Axess boast an excellent level of functionality and performance which will see their appeal continue to rise exponentially".

TheCoolector

"Just half the size of a regular wallet, Axess delivers all the functionality of a full-sized wallet, with RFID-blocking capabilities as well".

Hiconsumption

"Axess Fits a Surprising Amount of Money within Its RFID-Blocking Pockets" .

Trendhunter

"Slim yet sturdy, this stylish accessory organizes your basics while maintaining a thin profile that you’ll barely notice in your front pocket".

YankoDesign

"Cut down on excess and move the wallet to your front pocket with Axess Front Wallets".

GearHungry


A lightweight Front Wallet

Sitting on your wallet for long hours is not very comfortable! It also ruins your credit cards. That is why I created Axess, which is designed to fit seamlessly in your front pocket so that you don’t have to sit on your bulky wallet. 

Each design is half the size of a regular wallet, yet fits the cash and cards you usually carry around in a regular billfold.

My mission is to create a new and comfortable wallet experience for your front pocket and it can become possible with your help!

Model 05. "Superior" (open on two sides so as to easily access bills). All wallets fit in your front pocket without adding unnecessary bulk.

Model 01 "Vanquish" (blue)

Model 03 Smooth in all colors (caramel, black and blue).


Axess Front Wallets was designed to be unobtrusive and lays very flat in your front pocket.

Durable Craftsmanship

Every component of Axess Front Wallets is hand cut, hand stitched and handmade, including the Italian vegetable tanned leather itself – which adds a level of care and attention and quality to each product that a mass produced product will never achieve. The result is a durable wallet in high quality leather that remains tight for years.

Rich Italian leather from Tuscany

The vegetable tanned leather used in Axess Front Wallets models is hand tanned in Tuscany, Italy using traditional tanning methods to make some of the world’s finest vegetable tanned leather. In the Tuscan Leather District, vegetable-tanned leather is still produced following the traditional methods; turning raw hides into durable leather takes time and patience, and the skillful combination of technology and experience.

The leather is made by hand with the passion of a few master tanners located in Tuscany using techniques and traditions hailing from the Renaissance, which means that there are no harmful chemicals used in the tanning process.

Tannage using vegetable extracts gives the leather a rich and natural characteristic. The final finishing is then exclusively made with neutral waxes and oils to further highlight the full grain of the leather. Vegetable tanning is more time consuming than other types of leather tanning (such as chrome based tanning), but the result is a much richer patina developed with no use of harmful chemicals.

(Model 05, Superior in Caramel color. Models 05 and 04 are open on two sides, hence the name "V-shaped").

Model No. 05, "Superior", (Black Color). 

Model 03 "Smooth", Caramel Color.

Axess is RFID-blocking

To prevent your sensitive credit card information from being subjected to “electronic pickpocketing” or other methods of wirelessly accessing your credit card info or personal information; all Axess wallets have an RFID-blocking pocket where special material will protect your sensitive cards (similar to physically wrapping your credit cards in tin foil). The RFID-blocking material used by Axess have successfully gone through substantial testing and verification by a third-party inspection firm.

I left some pockets without the RFID-blocking material, so that you can still scan your subway card and access cards without having to remove the cards from the wallet each time. (Being an avid commuter myself, I find it very annoying to have to remove the subway card from the wallet each time I needed to scan, hence I left some pockets without the RFID-blocking material). The wallets will also come with a physical marker in the pockets that are RFID-blocking.

"Being able to have your credit cards protected whilst still having the convenience of using a transport or work pass card inside the wallet will appeal to many".  

Slimwalletjunkie

The following pockets are RFID-blocking (they will also be marked with a physical card):

All Axess models comes in a cotton bag that could also be used for storing the wallet in.


Model No. 03 "Smooth" Compact Wallet; Axess Front Wallet fits more than you expect while keeping the size minimal.

Model 01 Vanquish (caramel color) Card Wallet


Model 06, "Admire" Strap Wallet (blue color).  

Model No. 06, "Admire", (Caramel Color). The "strap wallet" holds a lot of bills, similar to a money clip.

Saffiano leather variation  

Models 2 and 4 are made in Saffiano leather, which is a type of textured genuine leather, which is common in modern day luxury accessories. Saffiano is scratch proof and robust and makes for a great wallet material.

Model No. 04, "Triumph", (Caramel Color). Saffiano is a scratch proof genuine leather material used by modern luxury accessory brands. Its robust & durable surface makes for an ideal wallet material.


It’s time to stash your old billfold in the drawer.


Model 03 "Smooth" (Black).


Additional info:

The Color choices are Caramel, Black and Blue. I will contact everyone after the campaign to confirm color choice, and for those who ordered 2 and 3 wallets, I will contact you and confirm what selection you made after the campaign is over.
For more views of all the wallets, please check this link. 

...

All models:









Here's what some previous customers had to say:

“Received my 3 wallets and have to say that they are fantastic!! The ‘pockets’ they come in add that extra piece of luxury for gifting these on to family and friends! Love these! Thanks!!”

Matthew, London England

-

"Products are great, love the finish".

Mathieu, Gatineau Canada

-

"Thanks from France, Tomas. Tips : Oversized french driver license and ID card fit perfectly".

Tung, Boulogne Billancourt, France

-

“My wallet arrived in this mornings post. Absolutely love it. Colour of the leather, the feel and usability. Absolutely awesome! “

Dave, Nottingham England

-

"I received my two wallets about ten minutes ago here in Ireland. They're great looking wallets, I have to say, and appear to be a very decent quality".

Ben, Moyglass Irleand

-

“Wallet has arrived today, looks and smells amazing…. “  

Liam, Newbury England

story:
Flowers are a part of the most important occasions in our lives.

We love nature, we are passionate about flowers and we are fashion obsessed. That's why we established Florélite, a flower online start-up that combines beautiful and fresh crafted bouquets with style.

Flowers are fresh & delicate and its hard to ship them across the world. BUT WE GOT THE SOLUTION:

Our goal is to develop a beautiful line of Floral headbands made with high quality faux flowers that can last FOREVER.

Style is a way to tell who you are. 

Its because we want to get the best possible quality faux flowers from our supplies that we need to raise funds and be able to create stunning headband.

We want to create a community of confident and positive women. Flowers & Fashion can be drivers of these emotions!

Our Rose Headband prototype below had been extremely successful and eveybody wants one!

Ladies, help us to make you look amazing with our floral headband made with faux roses & Gentlemen, buy your girlfriend an incredible gift designed by Florélite to make her feel special!

story:
BURLAP is an independent watch studio based in Hong Kong.

Before BURLAP, we have been designing original concepts and manufacturing for reputable and prestigious international brands, with specialty in recreating classic designs with new stunning, exciting elements.

Today, we believe that it is time to move on and put our experience, knowledge into our first watches BURLAP Watches.

 

 

Burlap brings you beautiful timepieces without the markup all hand assembled in Hong Kong. We have different pieces suitable for your style, comfortable on your wrists and detail that will spark a conversation anywhere you go.

Built like aircraft instrument panels and inspired by the culture and traditions of Hong Kong, the collections pay homage to the old age glorious manufacturing roots.

 

 

With a humble heart and inheriting this spirit, we pooled a team of industry veterans from our local elites to create a timepiece collection that symbolises our city’s virtue. We are here to tell the world what Hong Kong stands for. 

 

 

Every aspect of the watch pays homage to the city I was born in. From the brand, design concept, development, materials, assembly and quality assurances all represent the Hong Kong spirit.

 

 

Case backs on our watches are all inscribed with “Built in Hong Kong”, reflecting what Hong Kong stands for.

We emphasize as the creation of our brand, its design concept, development, material, and quality assurance which all reflect the Hong Kong Spirit of perseverance and our attitude to excellence.

The material sourced and used is high quality and the details are particular. 

 

 

Another major inspiration for the creation of the watches was my father, he used to tell me stories about the 1960s, he would play with his friends in the streets and on the roofs of To Kwa Wan in Kowloon City.  They would look across and see low flying planes landing and taking off. 

They vowed to be able to one day fly on the planes having achieved success in their lives.

Born in Hong Kong I wanted to build something that represented the city of old. The city was known for its watch making, low flying planes and dreams of making it BIG.

 

 

We are watchmakers in Hong Kong, we’ve been designing watches for decades. We believe in creating eye catching pieces that use the finest materials, a watch you can be proud to wear and that gets people talking.

 

BP002 Chronograph First

 

BP004 Tourbillon Propeller

 

 

Our watches share a special design, not just a top loaded feature, but structurally designed to have a cup shaped viewing from the side.

This way our watches can be perfectly seated on the wrists of our wearers. Allowing the wearers to fully enjoy the complete looks our watches give.

 

 

All our watches are designed and hand assembled by our team in Hong Kong, we have experience of creating high-end watches for high-end brands that sell these same watches for thousands of dollars. 

 

The feeling of the soft, premium quality Italian leather touching your wrist. Size, that that feels just right... as if the strap was crafted for you individually. 

 

Colour, that matches your watch perfectly - creating a look of a thousand-dollar-timepiece.

That is precisely what you are getting.

After you have made a pledge, we’ll ask for your wrist measurements. 

Then, our professional craftsmen will tailor a stylish strap for your personally, so you have the perfect wearing experience.

 

 

Our Tourbillon collection is inspired by daring pilots and the propellers that let them explore the unknown.  

 

These watches are made for millionaires, the reason they are so expensive is because the movement is so precise. The intricate details of this watch and how its perfectly balanced is what leads to high prices. We've been able to recreate this and due to the fact we are missing out middle men we've been able to cut the costs WITHOUT compromising on quality meaning you can now wear millionaire watches.

 

 

Tourbillon watches are really expensive as it takes 100s of hours to actually make one, these watches are built like formula one cars using really expensive machinery.  We've been able to cut this cost as we are the direct makers of this product, all our watches are hand made here in Hong Kong.

 

 

Within the 43mm IP Rose Gold case, the outer track holds the hour indications finished in a polished IP Rose Gold applied indexes, pairing with the small minutes track in mountain cut finished embossed indexes. The hour and minute hands are carefully designed and chosen to retain the heritage of aviation watches; pairing with a beautiful mountain cut finish to create a classy yet humble trait.

 

 

Moving closer into the centre, Our Burlap logo is precisely embossed and applied onto our dial as well as the Tourbillon logo at the 6H position, to create a luxury finish with 3D embossment.  

 

 

Slowly moving our eyes downwards to the 6H position, our tailored Tourbillon is held within a diamond cut polished finish opening slot; contained with an applied matte finished logo with it resembling an aircraft flying on the horizon with the Tourbillon acting as the propeller engine.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Inside the outermost tracks, the watch holds 12 applied indexes indicating the hour track; the ratio to the case is just right, clear, easy to read yet not stealing the limelight. Moving closer to the centre, there is an opaque date window/panel, designed to see through as time passes by.  

 

 

In the centre, the 3 chronograph subdials are specially lined up to pay homage and to recreate an iconic feature found on aircraft and automobile instrument panels. Of which they are proportionally rounded-embossed, also designed in details to resemble a classic roundel as a flying heritage.

 

 

The 7 mm diameter crown is carefully engraved with fine lines, and the upper and lower chronograph buttons are polished to a smooth surface. The refracting illuminance is different. The three-dimensional effect echoes the level of the dial, making this series unique. 

 

 

 

Choose from over 4 colours, you will be able to choose the colour at the end of the campaign. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

STORY OF BURLAP 

Burlap is started as a natural, tough yet flexible fabric, known for its multipurpose nature. They are often used in carry bags, which can be seen on the streets of Hong Kong, providing means to meeting people’s needs no matter where they are.

Representing the resilient and adaptive mentality of our fellow Hongkongers.

Inspired by the cloth’s nature and its meaning within; Aspired to the Hong Kong Spirit.


We are thus named as BURLAP.

 

Our watches are loaded from top down, showcasing our craftsmanship and our masterful assembly work.

 

 

Using our own hands, we can make sure each component is carefully put together, ensuring everything is perfect and the time adjusted to your time zone.

Because here at Burlap, we treat each and every one of you as our family. To our family, we give nothing but the best.

 

 

In all honesty, as you may know, from sourcing top grade steel to production of the watches, the manufacturing process in Hong Kong requires a large capital. That, we are a start-up brand and we have not yet the resources to do so but only hand assembling our watches in the city.

But, of course, having our watches manufactured in Hong Kong is definitely on our bucket list, and we are working towards this milestone one step at a time.

Size, that that feels just right... as if the strap was crafted for you individually.  Colour, that matches your watch perfectly - creating a look of a thousand-dollar-timepiece.That is precisely what you are getting.After you have made a pledge, we’ll ask for your wrist measurements. Then, our professional craftsmen will tailor a stylish strap for your personally, so you have the perfect wearing experience.  Our Tourbillon collection is inspired by daring pilots and the propellers that let them explore the unknown.   These watches are made for millionaires, the reason they are so expensive is because the movement is so precise. The intricate details of this watch and how its perfectly balanced is what leads to high prices. We've been able to recreate this and due to the fact we are missing out middle men we've been able to cut the costs WITHOUT compromising on quality meaning you can now wear millionaire watches.  Tourbillon watches are really expensive as it takes 100s of hours to actually make one, these watches are built like formula one cars using really expensive machinery.  We've been able to cut this cost as we are the direct makers of this product, all our watches are hand made here in Hong Kong.  Within the 43mm IP Rose Gold case, the outer track holds the hour indications finished in a polished IP Rose Gold applied indexes, pairing with the small minutes track in mountain cut finished embossed indexes. The hour and minute hands are carefully designed and chosen to retain the heritage of aviation watches; pairing with a beautiful mountain cut finish to create a classy yet humble trait.  Moving closer into the centre, Our Burlap logo is precisely embossed and applied onto our dial as well as the Tourbillon logo at the 6H position, to create a luxury finish with 3D embossment.    Slowly moving our eyes downwards to the 6H position, our tailored Tourbillon is held within a diamond cut polished finish opening slot; contained with an applied matte finished logo with it resembling an aircraft flying on the horizon with the Tourbillon acting as the propeller engine.        Inside the outermost tracks, the watch holds 12 applied indexes indicating the hour track; the ratio to the case is just right, clear, easy to read yet not stealing the limelight. Moving closer to the centre, there is an opaque date window/panel, designed to see through as time passes by.    In the centre, the 3 chronograph subdials are specially lined up to pay homage and to recreate an iconic feature found on aircraft and automobile instrument panels. Of which they are proportionally rounded-embossed, also designed in details to resemble a classic roundel as a flying heritage.  The 7 mm diameter crown is carefully engraved with fine lines, and the upper and lower chronograph buttons are polished to a smooth surface. The refracting illuminance is different. The three-dimensional effect echoes the level of the dial, making this series unique.    Choose from over 4 colours, you will be able to choose the colour at the end of the campaign.               STORY OF BURLAP Burlap is started as a natural, tough yet flexible fabric, known for its multipurpose nature. They are often used in carry bags, which can be seen on the streets of Hong Kong, providing means to meeting people’s needs no matter where they are.Representing the resilient and adaptive mentality of our fellow Hongkongers.Inspired by the cloth’s nature and its meaning within; Aspired to the Hong Kong Spirit.We are thus named as BURLAP. Our watches are loaded from top down, showcasing our craftsmanship and our masterful assembly work.  Using our own hands, we can make sure each component is carefully put together, ensuring everything is perfect and the time adjusted to your time zone.Because here at Burlap, we treat each and every one of you as our family. To our family, we give nothing but the best.  In all honesty, as you may know, from sourcing top grade steel to production of the watches, the manufacturing process in Hong Kong requires a large capital. That, we are a start-up brand and we have not yet the resources to do so but only hand assembling our watches in the city.But, of course, having our watches manufactured in Hong Kong is definitely on our bucket list, and we are working towards this milestone one step at a time.

story:
Short Summary

Hi Everyone!

My name is William Kinsey, owner of Sophisticated Curves. I have been an affiliate marketer and reseller in the women's plus size fashion industry since 2012. I got the idea for Sophisticated Curves from my wife. She wasn't a big fan of shopping for clothing because it was hard to find the clothes in her size that fit properly and look trendy. I thought it would be nice to have one location with all of the best in women's plus size clothing. That is Sophisticated Curves! You can visit our existing website at www.sophisticatedcurves.com. 


This campaign is to help fund our website redesign. Our existing design is nice, but it needs to be updated with a focus on user friendliness and flexibility.  When I began this website, It was mostly setup to use affiliate links and brands who were part of affiliate networks.  Today, we are getting more independent designers who want to market their designs through Sophisticated Curves. This requires a more retail oriented eCommerce  website.

By contributing to our campaign, you will give us a platform to provide big beautiful women everywhere a fun and exciting place to get the fashions they want and need.


What We Need & What You Get


  • We need to raise $2500 to redesign our existing website.
  • Those who contribute will also be entered in our drawing for a $100 gift card. Also, check out our list of perks!
  • If we don't reach our entire goal , all donated funds will be used to upgrade the existing website.

The Impact

There are a lot of changes currently going on in the plus size fashion industry and the fashion industry in general. Everyone is different and their individual needs are different. That is one of the big challenges in the plus size fashion industry. We need a website which makes it easier to engage our customers so we can better meet their needs and expectations. We want to inspire and build confidence. Every woman is beautiful and every woman should have easy access to the quality fashions she needs to show it.


Other Ways You Can Help


  • Spread the word about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Origin combines the best of watchmaking and technology, a traditional mechanical watch and a smart strap that connects to your phone for activity tracking, notifications, calendar reminders, music control and more. 

 

Special Edition

 

Origin Collection

Our goal was to create a timepiece that would last for generations but also had the convenience of modern features. ORIGIN was born.

 

 

 

 

Origin is in the press! This is not our first collection but this one is special because it could revolutionize the watch industry. 

 

 

 

 

The open-heart dial and see-through back cover puts Origin’s intricate self-winding mechanism on display, the complex Automatic mechanisms that keeps the watch infinitely wound as it is worn daily. The Origin does not need a battery for timekeeping! 


 

 

 

We chose minimalist lines that hint at the modern while respecting centuries of watchmaking heritage. The Origin complements your personal style and puts classic style on your wrist for any occasion. 

Stylish

Casual

Sport

 

 

 

Origin's mechanical Japanese movement is alive with 21,600 beats per hour and 24 jewels for superior timekeeping accuracy and a power reserve of 41 hours between wearings.

 

 

Lights to guide you

Origin features sweeping hands with a Luminous layer and Lum-filled, diamond cut indexes at the 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock position to make checking the time visible both day and night, indoors or out.

 

 

 

 

The Origin smart strap is slim, supple, comfortable and virtually indistinguishable from traditional leather straps for a refined look. 

 

Intelligent convenience every day

This revolutionary watch has embedded electronics concealed inside its interchangeable strap for the most convenient smart features. Never miss an important meeting or call with vibration alert on wrist. Set up different vibration intensity for different alerts. 

 

 

Easy setup via Smartphone IOS & Android apps

The Origin smart strap syncs wirelessly to the Origin app on your mobile device. It will automatically reconnect to the app anytime it is within Bluetooth range. 

 

 

Simple, intuitive app

Like a well-designed watch, we believe that user functions should be simple and intuitive. The same is true with the Origin app. It is as elegant and as easy to use as telling the time. Control smart features, track activities, set phone notifications and more.

 

 

Remotely control your phone

Set your app for the desired control (Camera, music, phone finder) then long press on the strap button to issue command.

 

Simple charging anywhere

Origin features a flip-out USB port at the end of the strap that can connect to any USB power source including laptop computers. 2 hours of charging results in up to 10 days autonomy.

 


 

As experienced watchmakers, we understand that attention to detail is paramount. Our process begins with an idea and follows a time-tested method with quality assurance standards at each step to ensure a final product that can only be described as perfect. 

 

Designing

Prototyping

Manufacturing

Testing

Quality Control

 

 

 

 

 

Extra Classic Leather Strap

Origin specially designed two classic vintage straps (black or brown) to offer as an additional style choice just for the Indiegogo campaign. They are made from genuine Italian leather and vegetable tanned for safe comfort and a vintage look.  

 

 

The earliest bird backers will receive one of 200 limited Numbered edition. Specific numbers can not be requested.

 

Extra (FREE) Nato Strap

Having acheived our first stretch goal, we are now adding a free NATO style nylon sport strap to every Origin order. Perfect for sports or to simply change the look and feel of Origin.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After years of passionate contributions to the watchmaking industry, Grayton was born in New York. With an international team that represents some of the best in the business, we launched An Automatic Watches with the goal of offering affordable luxury mechanical watches to everyone by eliminating many of the barriers and costs that exist in traditional watch channels.

Our team of designers and experts understood the importance of style and teamed them up with ambitious electronic engineers that insisted on doing something revolutionary. The result is Origin, the first Mechanical watch with replaceable smart strap for phone connectivity. It’s a project that has inspired and motivated the Origin team and a watch that we hope you will love. 

 

 

WARRANTY

 

The Origin comes with a limited 2 year warranty.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

All projects face challenges but we are taking every step possible to minimize delays and risks for our backers and future customers.

As watchmakers we have a deep understanding of the complexity of projects such as this. That is why we began work on the concept and prototype over 2 years ago. We didn’t come to market until we knew we were ready for mass production.

We have been working with our manufacturers and suppliers for years and have an excellent relationship with them as well as a clearly defined supply chain and production schedule. Our materials are ready, the test runs have been completed and we are ready to give the go ahead.

However, even with the best of preparation, delays sometimes occur. Please know that in the event of any possible issue, we will give you, our backers full transparency and keep you updated as to the problem, the solution and the steps necessary to handle it.

Thanks for all the support! 

 

FAQs

Q: I live outside the USA, can I order an Origin?

A: Yes, we ship globally.

Q: What are the shipping costs?

A: Shipping is FREE to USA and Canada. For other locations shipping is $29 USD. VAT and Import tax included. (VAT for the Wholesale Bundle Perk is not included)

Q: When will I receive my watch?

A: Estimated shipping date is early May 2017. If this changes all backers will be updated immediately. Delivery time of perks are subject to best efforts and delivery time is not guaranteed.

Q: Does Origin require batteries?

A: No, mechanical watches such as Origin are self-winding by the natural movement of an internal rotor while the watch is being worn daily. Origin has a power reserve of 40 hours being wearings. If the watch is not worn for many days, it can be manually wound by turning the crown.

Q: Does the Smart Strap require batteries?

A: The Origin Smart Strap has a built-in battery that charges by plugging into any USB port. A full charge will yield up to 10 days of power for all the strap’s connected smart features. 

Q: How do I select which smart features I want to use with Origin?

A: Download and open the Origin App. Setting the functions is simply explained and easy to do in minutes.

Q: I want an Origin watch but I don’t want to use the smart features or charge the strap, does the watch still work?

A: Yes! The Origin watch and the Smart Strap operate independently of each other. The Origin is a fine mechanical timepiece on its own and does not require the special strap features. You can purchase a standard Origin strap as replacement of the Smart strap.

Q: Will the Origin Smart Strap work on my other watches?

A: Yes, the smart strap uses a standard strap width at the lugs: 20 mm and standard spring pin bars that fits the majority of watches on the market.

Q:  Can I get a refund on my contribution?

Your contribution is used to pay commission to Indiegogo and Paypal as well as secure the materials and manufacturing of your watch. We begin the production of the watches based on the contributions made, because of that we cannot refund you. See the Indiegogo Terms of Service for more details.

Q: Do I need to pay any tax?

A: No. Some countries may require import tax, duties and related Customs fees for imports, and these costs are covered by your contribution.

Q: What are the dimensions of the Origin?

A: The dimensions are as below...

  • Case Diameter: 40 mm
  • Case Thickness: 13.2 mm
  • Face Diameter: 35 mm
  • Strap width at the lugs: 20 mm
  • Strap at buckle length: 20 mm

story:
VOGEL is an emerging contemporary womenswear brand based in New York.

Melding craft and technology, VOGEL's upcoming Spring/ Summer 2016 Collection, “Cypher”, features original textiles embellished with intricate crease patterns developed in collaboration with Origami artist Uyen Nguyen. 

We are raising funds to present our line at the Spring/ Summer 2016 Vancouver Fashion Week taking place September 28th- October 4th 2015. 


Funds raised through this campaign will cover:

Participation Fee: Vancouver Fashion Week: ($4000)                                    Materials: Fabrics, surface treatments, hardware, acrylic glass, etc.
Equipment: Laser cutter access, heat setting equipment
Manufacturing Costs
Transportation Costs


Perks for Donating

Please Note: All images depict prototypes -  Products are custom made and may vary slightly from the work shown below.


Digital Art ($8):

A set of 3 high resolution photographs and drawings from the VOGEL collection. Available for use as  desktop wallpapers.

Greeting Card Set ($13):

A set of 10 unique greeting cards featuring prints, illustrations and photographs from the VOGEL collection. Envelopes included. International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


Vogel Tote Bag ($21):

Screen-printed 14.5"x 15.5" canvas tote bag featuring the VOGEL logo.  International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


Vogel Iridescent Lucite Earrings ($21):


Handmade earrings from the VOGEL collection crafted from iridescent lucite and silver plated surgical steel.  

Please note: These photographs feature the same pair of earrings: due to the birefringent properties of the material colors vary with viewing angle. International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


Scale Paper Model ($34):


Profile View


Aerial View


The collapsed Fibonacci Skirt

Our Fibonacci skirt, folded from imported Italian paper coated in powdered mica crystals, autographed by Uyen Nguyen.  International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


Photo Booklet ($55):

Coffee table book featuring fashion photography images of the line, behind-the-scenes collection development as well as backstage and runway photos from the Spring Summer 2016 Vancouver Fashion Week.


Autographed Print ($55):


A drawing from the VOGEL Collection printed at 11x14", signed by Lea Freni. International contributors please add $10 for shipping.

Set of 3 Autographed Prints ($89):

A selection of  3 11x14" Autographed Prints. International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


LED Lamp - Design I: 10.5"Fibonacci Spiral Aerial View ($144):


Illuminated artwork designed and hand crafted by Uyen Nguyen.  Design 1 features an aerial view drawing of the Fibonacci Skirt engraved into acrylic glass set in a 5" long base.  International contributors please add $20 for shipping.


LED Lamp - Design II:  17" 3D- Illusion Fibonacci Spiral  ($233):

Illuminated artwork designed and hand crafted by Uyen.  Design II features a profile view drawing of the Fibonacci Skirt engraved into acrylic glass set in a slender, trapezoidal base.  The lamp stands 17" tall and is 15" wide.  Runs off of 8 AA batteries.  International contributors please add $25 for shipping.


Original Fashion Sketch by Lea Freni ($377):

A one-of-a-kind gauche fashion sketch featuring a look from the Spring/Summer 2016 VOGEL collection. International contributors please add $10 for shipping.


Vogel Tapestry ($377):

One-of-a-kind silk tapestry featuring original VOGEL prints.  Approximately 28 x 28", matte white acrylic glass mounting hardware included (as pictured).  Autographed.  International contributors please add $25 for shipping.

After selecting this perk, please email VOGEL with your choice of design so we can mark your selection as sold.  Preference is given on a first-come, first-serve basis.

Embellished Tapestry ($610):

Original tapestry featuring morse code inspired beading embellishment or origami inspired pleating techniques.  Approximately 28 x 28", matte white acrylic glass mounting hardware included (as pictured).  Autographed.  International contributors please add $25 for shipping.

After selecting this perk, please email VOGEL with your choice of design so we can mark your selection as sold.  Preference is given on a first-come, first-serve basis.

The Vogel Experience ($2584):

Individual design consultation with the VOGEL design team. We will work with you to create a custom VOGEL look to fit your taste, lifestyle and body type. Package includes custom fittings, color & fabric consultations and a framed original fashion sketch featuring the look. Must be able to travel to New York City for fittings. 


Stretch Goal

If we break $12,000 we will send each contributor, regardless of donation amount, the  original score written for VOGEL's Spring/Summer 2016 Fashion Show written and recorded by Russel Glynn. 

Additional funding will go toward higher quality production and photography, better prints for the perks, and additional assistance.

Help spread the word about this project! Follow us on Instagram and like us on Facebook. 


Contact: vogel.designs.vfw@gmail.com

Help spread the word about this project! Follow us on Instagram and like us on Facebook. 


Contact: vogel.designs.vfw@gmail.com

story:
STORY

Wondering about this unconventional hoodie right here?

It all started a few years ago when we stumbled upon an online article displaying a hoodie based on a Western suit of armor. “What a fantastic product,” we thought. “How come there isn’t one based on traditional Japanese armor?” We wanted one so badly that we searched all over the internet, but apparently such apparel did not exist in Japan.

"If it doesn't exist, why not bring it into existence?"

And so, 2 years ago, we titled our project "Samurai Armor Hoodie" and began developing.

For 2 years, we designed prototype after prototype, until finally, in the winter of 2015, it was completed and scheduled for release. The hoodies were released at 32,000 Yen in Japan, and before we knew it, they were completely sold out.

Now, with this campaign, we would like to bring a further improved version of these hoodies to fans around the world! We will offer free shipping worldwide, and for our first few Indiegogo contributors only, we are offering an early bird discount of $270 for one hoodie, and $750 for the full set of all three! (Quantities at the early bird discount price are limited, so claim the perk before it fills up.)

※こちらのページ（PDF）にて日本語で支援方法を説明しています。

*Click here for Japanese instructions on how to use Indiegogo (PDF).

 

We designed these hoodies so that...

  • The user can freely create and attach their own “tatemono” crests (the frontal decoration that adorns the front of the helmet of traditional Japanese samurai armor) to their hoodies.
  • They are casual enough for everyday wear.
  • They are machine washable.
  • They provide great protection against the cold.
  • They incorporate as many parts of the traditional Japanese samurai armor as possible.


Fans in Japan said...

  • I went to a party in my samurai hoodie, and it became the topic that everyone was talking about! It was great!
  • This hoodie is such a cool way to keep warm when I’m fishing or on my bike.
  • The thick fabric made this hoodie the perfect gear for airsoft survival games!


For worldwide release, we’ve made the following improvements…

  • Created 3 different colored versions.
  • Enhanced the comfort of the hoodies.
  • Gave the look a sharper finish.
  • Simplified the design so that it’s more suitable for everyday wear.
  • Added a design featuring the character “bu” (武) from “bushi”, meaning samurai warrior, on the back.


DETAILS


Size Chart


Let’s take a closer look...

  • The body of the hoodie is 100% cotton.
  • It’s machine washable, too!

・The patterns are not printed with ink but flock, making for a soft and durable design.

・Each stitch is embroidered elegantly.

・The himo (cord) is made with traditional Kaga-Yuzen silk dyeing technique (What is Kaga-Yuzen?)

・The himo (cord) is removable as well.

・There’s a loop for your finger, too, just like the real thing!


・The shoulder pieces are also removable.

 ・ “Bu” (武) for “bushi” (meaning samurai warrior in Japanese) is written on the back.


・References of real armor were traced to ensure that the armor pieces for the wrist, arms, and head are all reproduced authentically.


Mask Pieces


  • They function as neckwarmers as well.
  • They are adjustable by elastic straps.

Tatemono (Crest) Pieces

  • The “tatemono” crest pieces can be easily attached and removed. Just fit the conveniently-located buttons on the hoodie through the slits on the crest piece.
  • You can design and create your own original “tatemono” crest pieces, too! Just cut a slit on your design, and attach it!


WHO WE ARE

To everyone viewing this campaign page, hi there!

My name is bamboo, and I’m the project producer, in charge of the production of these hoodies here! If you’re wondering who I am, in Japan I’m known as the vocalist of milktub, a punk rock band mainly involved in anime and game music. I also produce apparel and goods for the brand Studio696. To date, we’ve created countless apparel and merchandise for game makers and artists within Japan.


We focused on the following concepts...

  • Creating that which does not yet exist.
  • Creating something suitable for everyday use.
  • Creating an item that is both durable and appealing enough to be worn for years to come.
  • Creating something that will both appeal to guys as cool and appeal to girls as cute.


Why we’re bringing this product to the world...

Until now we’ve created countless products for fans within Japan,  but gradually our desire to share these items with the world has grown stronger by the day. How will people around the world react to the items we’ve created? We’re overflowing with excitement to find out. In recent years,  Japanese pop culture has spread so quickly in foreign countries, and, situated in a major tourist location in Tokyo’s Asakusa and Skytree area, our curiosity in how foreigners will react to these products from Japan can’t help but grow.


We believe that these Samurai Armor Hoodies, based on the armor and helmet once donned by samurai warriors, are charming products which are representative of Japan.


With our strong desire to deliver these to foreign fans of Japanese culture and fans of fun and unusual things, we took up the challenge and started this crowdfunding campaign. Please help support this campaign, and may the mysterious samurai warriors spread throughout the world.

Click here to read the full interview.


Stay Updated!





PERKS

$270 - 1 hoodie + 1 tatemono crest (contributor discount)

$320 - 1 hoodie + 1 tatemono crest (regular price)

$350 - 1 hoodie + 2 tatemono crests (regular price)

$750 - 3 hoodies + 2 tatemono crests (contributor discount)

$900 - 3 hoodies + 2 tatemono crests (regular price)


SPECIAL PERK

1 hoodie + 1 tatemono crest .

[EMBROIDERED TEXT] Size: 5×5cm, Text: limit of 10 characters (English letters only), Color: any, Location: shoulder piece only.


STRETCH GOAL

If we achieve $80,000, we will add Gauntlet Gloves!!

If we achieve $120,000, we will also add in a matching T-Shirt!!

If we achieve $200,000, we will also add ???

If we achieve $400,000, we will also add ???

If we achieve $600,000, we will also add ???


*Stretch goal bonus items will be included with hoodie-inclusive perks only.

*Stretch goal bonus items will be included per perk, not per hoodie.


Press Kit

https://goo.gl/tSx7b3


Shipping

Reliable & High-Quality International Delivery

Your perks will be delivered to your doorstep by the Tokyo Otaku Mode Premium Shop, an online shopping website that has delivered to as many as 100,000 homes in over 100 countries and regions around the world. With high quality packaging designed to endure the international journey and friendly customer support staff that will take full responsibility for your package until it arrives in your hands, you can rest assured!


Campaign Team

Project Head: bamboo from milktub (Japanese anime song artist)

Production: Studio696.Ltd

Marketing and Promotion: Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.

Contributor Support and Perk Delivery: Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.


For Japanese

※こちらのページ（PDF）にて日本語で支援方法を説明しています。
*Click here for Japanese instructions on how to use Indiegogo (PDF).

FAQ

Q: Where are the hoodies shipping from?
A: Straight from Japan, fulfilled by Tokyo Otaku Mode.

Q: When will my hoodie(s) arrive?
A: Your hoodie(s) are scheduled to ship in June, and should arrive at your doorstep by mid to late August.

Q: Can I machine wash my hoodie(s)?
A: Yes! When washing your hoodie(s), we recommend removing the shoulder parts and the himo (cord) on the chest, and placing the hoodie(s) in a laundry bag.

Q: Which parts of the hoodie are removable?
A: The shoulder parts, the himo (cord) on the chest, and the tatemono (crest piece) on the hood.

Q: Is the himo (cord) the real thing used on samurai armor?
A: They’re Kaga-Yuzen himo. (What is Kaga-Yuzen?)

Q: How do your larger sizes fit?
A: For reference, a person of height and weight 190 cm, 110 kg (about 6’2 and 243 lbs) fit the XXL size, so if you would prefer a looser fit than that, we recommend the XXXL.

Q: How do the hoodies fit on girls?
A: For reference, a female Japanese model of height and weight 170 cm and 45 kg (about 5’7 and 99 lbs) was a perfect fit in the size M.

Q: It’s armor, right? Is it durable like armor?
A: The hoodies are made with fabric that is about twice as thick as usual, so they are more durable than your average hoodie, but in the end they are just clothes, so please don’t treat them like armor.

Q: How protective against the cold are these hoodies?
A: They’re pretty darn warm. It does vary depending on the person, but there are people who can handle Tokyo winters in just a T-shirt underneath this hoodie.

Q: Where do I select the size of my hoodie(s), and my preferred design for the included tatemono crest piece(s)?

A: After the campaign ends, you will be sent a survey where you choose the size of your hoodie(s) and your preferred design for the tatemono crest piece(s).

Q: For the full set ($750 and $900 perks), is it possible to specify my preferred colors for the hoodies and designs for the tatemono crests? (e.g. 3 black hoodies and 2 tatemono design A’s)

A: Yes! After the campaign is over, you will be sent a survey where you choose the size of your hoodie(s) and your preferred design for the tatemono crest piece(s). Simply specify your desired combination in that survey!

Q: Do I need to pay any additional import duties, VAT, customs taxes, or local handling fees?

A: Depending on your country’s customs laws, you may be required to pay a tax before obtaining your package.

Q: If the stretch goal(s) are achieved, will all contributors receive the bonus items?

A: If the stretch goal(s) are achieved, all contributors whose perks include hoodies will receive the bonus items. (Please note that bonus items will be included per perk, not per hoodie.)

story:
The Glad Sickness Trip

 
¡Hola! Me llamo Iria. Actualmente me encuentro en 4º de carrera de Diseño de Moda, mi pasión. Durante cuatro años he dedicado a los estudios todo mi esfuerzo, sacrificio y trabajo, con el fin de agradecérselo a mi familia, que han depositado gran parte de sus ahorros y sus fuerzas en ayudarme, en especial a mi querida madre. Sin embargo, para el proyecto final necesito de vuestra ayuda. 
 
     
  • La financiación de proyecto irá única y exclusivamente dirigida a las distintas partes de mi proyecto final, las cuales incluyen fotografía, vídeo, confección, complementos y accesorios. 
    •  
  • La magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores es llevar el proyecto a la realidad. 


 
 
 

Lo que necesito y lo que obtienes:

 
El financiamiento de The Glad Sickness Trip va dirigido a:
- Costureras: realizan el trabajo de coser 27 prendas, el coste de confección por prenda ronda entre 65€-400€ 
- Fotógrafo
- Director de Arte
- Director de Vídeo
- Maquillador y peluquero
- Asistente de cámara 
- Modelos

TODA PERSONA QUE APORTE SU GRANITO DE ARENA RECIBIRÁ ALGO A CAMBIO:

- Para aquellos que hagan una aportación de más de 250€: una prenda personalizada y confeccionada según el estilo propio de la persona.

- 150-249€: Un complemento personalizado, véase bolso, mochila...

- 50- 149 €: Una prenda más simple personalizada.

- 25- 49 €: Un par de calcetines de la propia colección.

- 13-24€: Shopping bag con mi logo, Marcia.

- 1-12€: Monedero  con mi logo, Marcia.



Las entregas se realizarán antes de finalizar el 2016.

           
EN CASO DE NO LOGRAR EL OBJETIVO TOTAL:
Lo conseguido gracias a vuestra ayuda será invertido en la producción de las prendas y tratando de conseguir el mejor material posible para la película y fotografía del propio proyecto.
 
 
 

Lo que saldrá después del esfuerzo: 

     
  • Este proyecto es una de las inversiones más grandes de mi vida, a parte de los 4 años de carrera ya casi superados.
    •  
  • The Glad Sickness Trip, es mi valioso gran proyecto en el cual llevo trabajando desde septiembre de 2015. El proceso de este proyecto consiste en diseñar 15 looks, de los cuales sólo se seleccionan 8 para su posterior confección. Este es en el punto en el que me hallo, en realizar los patrones y prototipos. Una vez finalizado, pasaremos a la realización de imagen, fotografía y vídeo, terminando la colección con el desfile final. 

  • Estudiar diseño de moda no es fácil. Es una lucha de esfuerzo constante, horas sin dormir, semanas y meses de estrés, pero ponerle pasión, empeño y sacrificio en aquello que amas es muy satisfactorio al ver el resultado final. Me comprometo a invertir mi valioso tiempo, trabajo, esfuerzo y pasión en este proyecto. Es todo lo que puedo ofrecer. 

  • También me gustaría demostrar que si se quiere, con esfuerzo, se puede. Que el futuro está en los jóvenes, en darnos un voto de confianza por lograr y llevar a cabo ese pequeño sueño que tenemos dentro. 

 
 
 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

 
     Toda ayuda será bien recibida, así que si no puedes hacer una aportación, por favor, ayúdame a difundirlo. Muchas gracias por haberos molestado en leerlo.


                                                                    ¡¡MUCHAS GRACIAS!!

Durante cuatro años he dedicado a los estudios todo mi esfuerzo, sacrificio y trabajo, con el fin de agradecérselo a mi familia, que han depositado gran parte de sus ahorros y sus fuerzas en ayudarme, en especial a mi querida madre. Sin embargo, para el proyecto final necesito de vuestra ayuda.   La financiación de proyecto irá única y exclusivamente dirigida a las distintas partes de mi proyecto final, las cuales incluyen fotografía, vídeo, confección, complementos y accesorios.  La magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores es llevar el proyecto a la realidad. 

   Lo que necesito y lo que obtienes: 

El financiamiento de The Glad Sickness Trip va dirigido a:
- Costureras: realizan el trabajo de coser 27 prendas, el coste de confección por prenda ronda entre 65€-400€ 
- Fotógrafo

- Director de Arte

- Director de Vídeo

- 50- 149 €: Una prenda más simple personalizada.
- 25- 49 €: Un par de calcetines de la propia colección.

Las entregas se realizarán antes de finalizar el 2016.


 

EN CASO DE NO LOGRAR EL OBJETIVO TOTAL:
Lo conseguido gracias a vuestra ayuda será invertido en la producción de las prendas y tratando de conseguir el mejor material posible para la película y fotografía del propio proyecto.
   
Lo que saldrá después del esfuerzo: 

 Este proyecto es una de las inversiones más grandes de mi vida, a parte de los 4 años de carrera ya casi superados. The Glad Sickness Trip, es mi valioso gran proyecto en el cual llevo trabajando desde septiembre de 2015. El proceso de este proyecto consiste en diseñar 15 looks, de los cuales sólo se seleccionan 8 para su posterior confección. Este es en el punto en el que me hallo, en realizar los patrones y prototipos. Una vez finalizado, pasaremos a la realización de imagen, fotografía y vídeo, terminando la colección con el desfile final. 





Estudiar diseño de moda no es fácil. Es una lucha de esfuerzo constante, horas sin dormir, semanas y meses de estrés, pero ponerle pasión, empeño y sacrificio en aquello que amas es muy satisfactorio al ver el resultado final. Me comprometo a invertir mi valioso tiempo, trabajo, esfuerzo y pasión en este proyecto. Es todo lo que puedo ofrecer. 


También me gustaría demostrar que si se quiere, con esfuerzo, se puede. Que el futuro está en los jóvenes, en darnos un voto de confianza por lograr y llevar a cabo ese pequeño sueño que tenemos dentro.    Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:
  Toda ayuda será bien recibida, así que si no puedes hacer una aportación, por favor, ayúdame a difundirlo. Muchas gracias por haberos molestado en leerlo.


                                                                    ¡¡MUCHAS GRACIAS!!

story:
The Jacket (Tech specs)

In a nutshell, the Redder Heated Jacket is a light, comfortable jacket with integrated heating system to keep you warm anywhere.

 

 

We use the highest quality raw materials and top-notch technology combined with a world class design process to produce the new generation heated jacket that you can wear with equal comfort and style.
From a more technical standpoint, Redder jacket uses high quality materials and components, including 95% polyester and 5% spandex bonded polar fleece for the Shell, 100% polyester touch weight thermal polar fleece for the body lining and 100% polyester 210T taffeta for the sleeve lining. The jacket has three heating zones with three heating levels to guarantee comfort in any kind of environment. It is certified according to different international standards and it comes with two years guarantee. 

 

Redder jacket is the only heated jacket in the market that suits all kind of situations, including outdoor sports, social events and even allows you to choose your preferred color combination. We start with different combinations of black, grey and red, and will make more colors available as the number of backers increases. After you make your contribution we will send you an email to confirm your preferred color and size.

 

 

 

IMPORTANT NOTE: We will contact you after your purchase to ask for your preferred color (and size)
 
The Redder jacket is also waterproof and breathable. It comes with YKK zippers and it gets its energy from an external battery that can also be used to charge your cellphone or any other portable device.

 

 

 

What is Redder?

Redder is a global brand of outdoor clothing, apparel and functional garments and complements with the main goal of enabling people fulfill their passions, regardless whether those passions are hiking in extreme conditions, surf in a quite beach, enjoy a calm walk at night or simply approach their daily life with an extra comfort partner.

 

 

You can also have a look at the interview with our CEO to have a better understanding about the brand.

 

 

Product details

 

 

 

 

 

Beta Testers

We want to thank everyone who is helping with the jacket testing procedure. We have 10 fully functional prototypes being tested by friends and some specialists in outdoor sports, fashion, wearable technology, etc. We are not only receiving some super nice pictures, but we are also getting excellent feedback about how to improve the jacket.
#redderlife, #nofilter, #nomodels, #realpeople, #truefun, #globalfriends, #reddercommunity, #leanstartup, #growthhacking, #enjoyingtogether, #redderpassion, #crowdfunding, #redderbackers, #itshappening
 

 
And with the feedback of our community, we have already started improving the jacket. So don´t hesitate to send us your comments, we will definitely try to continue making the product better and better throughout the whole process. In this case, the new model already incorporates five improvements:
1. EXTRA POCKET. One of the top requests from the testers was to have an extra external pocket in the left side of the chest, and here it is.
2.  LYCRA (R) CUFFS WITH THUMB LOOP. To avoid heat lose and have extra comfort, we have attended the request from the community to have this feature added.
3. CORD ZIPPER PULLS. Many people will use the jacket in extreme cold conditions, using gloves. These pulls make it unnecessary to take off your gloves when zipping or unzipping the jacket or pockets.
4. TOP QUALITY VELCRO (R). In line with the rest of the materials used in the jacket, we have now incorporated the highest quality Velcro (R) available to avoid any problems even under continuous extreme conditions.
5. TWO-WAY MAIN ZIPPER. Need to adjust or take anything from inside the jacket? Simply unzip from bottom to top as much as you need and avoid exposing the body front.
The picture below also shows what the full-black jacket looks like.

And if you are interested in how we made the prototype for beta testers to try, check the video below.
 

 

What limited and exclusive rewards will you get?

Redder jacket recommended retail price is 199$+taxes+shipping but during the crowdfunding campaign we will have promos starting at 119$. We use a next generation production process to get the lowest production cost for the backers. All backers will receive a 5X5 reward, which is a 5% discount for the next five years in any product purchased through redder.life.
And we cannot forget about the battery, which is a key part of the full experience. We don´t produce them ourselves nor use an OEM version... because we have partnered up with one of the top brands in China to complement our jacket with a 10.000 mAh battery from Mi (previously known as Xiaomi) Check out all the details in the information below and keep in mind that with this battery you can get up to 14 hours of continued use.
 

 

Also, as we reach different goals, we will unlock more color diversity, special limited editions and more surprises.
 

Size Charts & How to Measure

Find the charts below to determine your size. If you are in the borderline between two sizes, order the smaller size if you are a "slim fit type of person" or the larger size if you prefer a looser fit. If your measurements for chest and waist correspond to two different sizes, order the size indicated by your chest measurement.

IMPORTANT NOTE: We will contact you after your purchase to ask for your size (and preferred color)

 

Bust: Measure around the fullest part of the bust area, keeping the tape level under your arms and across your back.

Chest: Measure around the fullest part of the chest, keeping the tape level under your arms and across your back.

Waist: Measure around the narrowest part of the waist (typically the small of your back and where your body bends side to side).

Sleeve Length: Bend the arm slightly and measure the length from the center back of the neck, to the shoulders tip, along the outside of the arm, and to the wrist

 

Our team

We are a very passionate team, with extensive experience in cross border trading, fashion, technology, start-ups and crowdfunding projects. Our team has experience in different regions of the world as well and we are all very involved in this project, willing to make it to production phase and being able to deliver an awesome jacket to all our backers.

 

 

 
 

Exchange Policy

By taking the measures correctly and following the size chart carefully, jackets should fit you nicely. If you still would rather get a different jacket for whatever reason, it should be ok but keep in mind that extra charges may apply for the shipping.
 

Warranty

The jackets will be produced under the strictest quality standards and we will implement a very rigorous quality control. Our intention is to ensure product quality and durability. Provided the jacket is used under normal circumstances, garment is guaranteed for one year and the whole heating system for two years. But don´t worry, we are sure you will be able to enjoy your Redder jacket for much longer without any problem.
 

Frequently Asked Questions

 
  1. What kind of zippers do you use? All zippers used in the jackets will be YKK.
     
  2. What is the weight of your jackets? Final product weight is about 900g for female fitting and 1100g for male fitting.
     
  3. Is your jacket waterproof? Absolutely! Not only for your comfort, but also for the heating system to work properly and safely, the jacket is completely waterproof.
     
  4. Is the jacket breathable? We had to find a compromise between different specifications, so the jacket is breathable but within certain limits that will not affect other properties.
     
  5. Why don´t you have woman and man designs? We believe in gender equality. Our team composition is just one of many examples. In that sense, we created a "genderless" jacket with only fitting and sizing adjustments, but no difference in overall style. If you are interested in a more customized product, drop us a note in our social media channels, by email or directly in the comments section.
     
  6. Does the jacket accept machine washing? Yes.
     
  7. Is the jacket self-drying? No. Tumble dry low heat.
     
  8. May I use the jacket battery to recharge my cellphone? Yes. The external battery can be used to charge any device depending on the capacity.
     
  9. I´m very interested in your product, can I get extra discount if I buy a big quantity? At this moment we are focused in our crowdfunding campaign and do not have any wholesalling agreements in our roadmap, nor are we allowed to offer extra discounts because we are already offering the lowest possible prices for our indiegogo backers. However, we are very happy to hear that you like our product and it makes us want to work harder in the future. Feel free to contact us any time with your comments or suggestions.
     
  10. In what countries and currencies can I buy the jacket? We will send the jacket to any country that can be reached through standard methods without setting any additional restrictions. The prices are specified in USD but it will converted to your local currency by the payment gateway (for your reference, as of 29th of August 2016, the super early birds jacket equivalent price in EUR is around 101EUR. Source: https://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofx...
     
  11. Can you guide me step by step through the process to get one of your perks? Absolutely! We have prepared this video for you, but if you still have any questions, please reach out to us via Facebook, email or through the comments section here in indiegogo

 

You can also help us go more Social...

Like, tweet, pin... whatever you prefer ;-)

                          THANKS!!!
story_txt:
The Jacket (Tech specs)In a nutshell, the Redder Heated Jacket is a light, comfortable jacket with integrated heating system to keep you warm anywhere.  We use the highest quality raw materials and top-notch technology combined with a world class design process to produce the new generation heated jacket that you can wear with equal comfort and style.From a more technical standpoint, Redder jacket uses high quality materials and components, including 95% polyester and 5% spandex bonded polar fleece for the Shell, 100% polyester touch weight thermal polar fleece for the body lining and 100% polyester 210T taffeta for the sleeve lining. The jacket has three heating zones with three heating levels to guarantee comfort in any kind of environment. It is certified according to different international standards and it comes with two years guarantee. 
 

Redder jacket is the only heated jacket in the market that suits all kind of situations, including outdoor sports, social events and even allows you to choose your preferred color combination. We start with different combinations of black, grey and red, and will make more colors available as the number of backers increases. After you make your contribution we will send you an email to confirm your preferred color and size.
 


 

 


IMPORTANT NOTE: We will contact you after your purchase to ask for your preferred color (and size)
 
The Redder jacket is also waterproof and breathable. It comes with YKK zippers and it gets its energy from an external battery that can also be used to charge your cellphone or any other portable device.

story:
Upgrade your shoes with laces to stylish ZIPPED ones! Super simple and fast to use! Just zip and you are good to GO!


Are you tired of your shoelaces?  It seems as if it's a never ending cycle of tie and untie.

ZIPPED is a specially designed zippers that simplify and speedup taking off and putting on shoes. They come i many forms, sizes and colors to match your shoes.

Never tie or untie your shoes again!  Get rid of the bows and customize your footwear.


We have considered every detail in the product design process to make ZIPPED fashion-forward, comfortable and durable.  We have scoured and tested all the materials available on the market to bring you the perfect solution for your shoes, both in terms of function and fashion. 

SIMPLICITY.  Install your ZIPPED once and never tie or untie your shoes again.


COLORS. ZIPPED lets you add more color to your shoes and create your own fashion, or bring new life to your old footwear.


STANDARD COLORS

BLACK - BLACK

BLACK - BLUE

BLACK - GREEN

BLACK - YELLOW

BLACK - RED

WHITE - WHITE

WHITE - BLUE

WHITE - GREEN

WHITE - YELLOW

WHITE - RED


SIZES & FORMS

ANGULAR - STANDARD - FULL - ROUND

6 EYELETS

5 EYELETS

4 EYELETS

IF YOU HAVE MORE OR LESS EYELETS JUST TELL US WHILE ORDERING WE WILL SEND YOU VERSION THAT MATCH YOU SHOES

CUSTOM PATTERNS

BASICALLY COME UP WITH YOUR OWN COLORS, PATERNS AND TELL US WHAT YOU WANT WHILE ORDERING.

CUSTOM PATTERNS ARE MORE EXPENSIVE


BENEFITS. Are you using slip on metod on shoes? then you problably have damaged heel counter. ZIPPED prevents this, by openig shoe wide, so you can easly slip you foot into it!

ZIPPED are for everyone!

KIDS, TEENS, ADULTS, ELDELRY

FASHION PEOPLE, TIME SAVERS


HOW TO ORDER

Tell us how many eyelets you have and distance between the first and the last hole and we will send you size that match you shoes. We have found that almost all shoe manufacturers make their shoes with the same distance between eyelets wiht small exceptions.




WHY DO WE NEED THE SUPPORT OF THE INDIEGOGO CROWD?

We already have a factory lined up to start production, so we need the final push.  By funding our project, you will be pre-ordering ZIPPED and kickstarting our first production run of units.

Let’s launch ZIPPED together, let’s create a new way of loving our shoes.  All backers will be invited to provide us with real-time feedback on our company’s footsteps, to help us build something inspired by you, from color picks to new product designs.  ZIPPED needs you to become a reality.


FAQ

1.  When are we going to receive our ZIPPED?

Our goal is to begin shipping in July.

2.  Do ZIPPED work with all kinds of shoe eyelets?

Yes, ZIPPED work with all sizes of traditional eyelets.  We have found that almost all shoe manufacturers make their shoes with the same distance between eyelets.

3.  Do ZIPPED have different sizes?

Yes, just tell us how many eyelets you have and distance between the first and the last hole and we will send you size that match you shoes.


4.  Do I need to unfasten my ZIPPED to take my shoes off?

No, ZIPPED turn your shoes into slip-ons, so after instaling them the first time, you will never have to unfasten them again.

5.  What are ZIPPED made of?

ZIPPED are made of a very advanced material that reflects the latest technology in engineered elastomers.

6.  Do I have to use ZIPPED in all my sneakers’ eyelets?

It’s up to you, you can leave some eyelets free.

6.  Can I use ZIPPED for sports?

Yes!  They are absolutely ideal for casual runners and marathoners who often have to do double knots to keep their laces from coming undone during a race. 

7.  Can I get my ZIPPED wet?

Yes!  No problem.

8.  Do you have a patent for ZIPPED?

Yes, we value the many years of thought that has gone into this product and so we have protected ZIPPED (and all its variations) with worldwide patents.

9.  Do they fit in children’s shoes?

Yes!  Kids love the color combinations of ZIPPED.  We recommend them for one year-old or older.

10.  I’m an international backer.  Can you deliver to my country?

Yes!  We deliver worldwide, but we are not responsible for customs duties and procedures.
