"Regaining Wholeness Through the Subtle Dimensions" 




 





About Don Paris

He is well loved for his style of bringing challenging concepts into an easy to understand language and has been a popular speaker at the Global Sciences Congress, Congress of Spiritual Scientists, The World of Quantum Energy Medicine conference and the United States Psychotronics Association.

He has created the most detailed explanation of the principles of Radionics and the most advanced training courses in the entire field of Radionics and Scalar technology. He began exploring the subtle dimensions in the early seventies, and has now trained people in over 35 countries around the world in the workings of Radionics and the subtle dimensional realities.

Don was awarded an honorary doctorate degree in Human Sciences from the International University of Vitalogical Sciences in Stockholm Sweden in 2000 for his work with the SE-5 and scalar energies.

In his work he had dedicated himself to bridging the barrier of the physical boundaries to the subtle dimensional realities.


* MOVIE DOWNLOADS*


 DOWNLOAD 1

"I love a good conspiracy!"



Why do we need a Chi-O?

Well, ideally we wouldn't!

However, pulse digital signals in our environment have increased, by some reports, millions of fold in the last 20-30 years. If we think back to when we first were introduced to Motorola and the mobile phone in the 70's it was a rare device.

Because lets face it... Who wanted to walk around with one of those in your back pocket?

However as the technology improved and the devices became smaller and more functional, they evolved into more of a personal computer that you could take anywhere and the iPhone and Android were born!

Before we knew it, everyone needed to have a phone! 2014 figures show that there are now over 4.23 Billion telephone users, in what is also a Billion dollar industry.




What does this all mean for us?

Firstly, it means that if we are going to be able to use these phones, we need mobile towers that provide the signal for us to use our phones. These towers are permanently pulsing signals out to the ready users wanting to stay connected to the world. This is like second hand smoke, except that we can not simply step outside into the fresh air. The request for even more coverage is always present and these towers are being erected at every viable location. The range of items that we are connecting to are continuously increasing from smart meters, to smart refrigerators, ovens, washing machines and even a smart toothbrush.

There has recently been a documentary made around the increased roll out of  smart meters, discussing the range of inherent implications, called Take Back Your Power.

Some may question the authenticity of some of these claims, however, there are those who have not believed in the dangers of non-ionising EMF radiation, including Dr. Devra Davis Ph.D. PMH. She served as the President Clinton appointee to the Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board from 1994 to 1999. It was under her direction that it became impossible to refuse the building of a telephone cell tower in the area based on health concerns. She has since performed a complete turn around on the issue and is now Founder and President of Environmental Health Trust Environmental Health Trust, who consistently provides cutting-edge research and education about cellphones and other environmental health hazards and promotes constructive policies locally, nationally and internationally, bringing you the world's top science and scientists.


It is also now acknowledged by the most recognizable of authorities, the World Health Organization as a possible carcinogen in the same class as lead and car exhaust fumes!



Full WHO Document


All we are saying is... Let's just understand things a little more before we literally surround from all directions with this radiation!


Royal Navy expert on microwave radiation and WiFi in Schools


Virgin Media turns pedestrian pavement into Wi-Fi hotspot

Gregor McNeil, Managing Director of Consumer at Virgin Media, said:

It is literally public WiFi under your feet. We want to build more networks like this across the UK and encourage more forward thinking councils just like Chesham to get in touch.”

As for the cover up...

here is one of many cases


UW Scientist Henry Lai Makes Waves in the Cell Phone Industry

After Lai and Singh’s research finding an effect on DNA was published in 1995, Lai learned of a full-scale effort to discredit his work. In an internal company memo leaked to Microwave News, a publication that examines health and environmental effects of electromagnetic radiation, Motorola described its plan to “war-game” and undermine Lai’s research.

Thus was launched an epic battle over research and truth. If Lai and Singh were correct about the potential impact on brain cells from radio-frequency radiation, there could be billions of dollars on the line for the cell phone industry in potential liability, leading to significant design changes and lost market expansion.

Yet the soft-spoken scientist’s steadfast belief in that principle has placed his research at the center of a persistent global controversy and created powerful enemies that tried to get him fired and essentially succeeded in drying up the source of funding for the type of research he was doing.

full article


DOWNLOAD 2

"How do you know all this?"


How does the Chi-O work?


A brief history of Scalar Technology


Truly the grandfather of scalar would have to be Nicola Tesla. He didn't use the word scalar, but he created scalar fields with many of his devices to produce "free energy". He also invented healing devices that used scalar electro-magnetic energy and thus is known as the grandfather of Electro-Therapy.


Galen Hieronymus received a U.S. Patent for his invention in 1949, which was described in the patent application title as a device for "detection of emanations from materials and measurement of the volumes thereof."



The circle closes with the development of the newest and most advanced instrument coming from the USA where Radionics first began through Dr. Abrams.

Dr. Willard Frank, Ph.D. physicist, electro-engineer and inventor developed a computerized instrument in 1986, the ‘SE-5 Intrinsic Data Field Analyzer’, and updated the instrument in 1998 later called the SE-5 plus. The SE-5 plus is not a traditional Radionics instrument. It is well known for its analyzing and balancing of Intrinsic Data Fields (IDFs). The face of Radionics has changed dramatically as the understanding of this phenomena is embraced. The SE-5 plus is not used in the traditional sense of medicine, and the gap is ever widening. Since this instrument is so versatile, it is now used in mining, agriculture, business, with new areas of use opening every day.
As with the instruments of de la Warr, Drown and Hieronymus instruments, the SE-5 plus uses a ‘stick plate’ as a detector. This is not the usual rubber membrane, but a thin piece of circuit board material over geometric designs, and scalar antennas underneath which fine tune and amplify the scalar informational fields, IDFs.
Through the use of the computer, dials are used to dial in the ‘Tunings’ but rather one can easily type them into the small pocket computer on the instrument.


Working with the much simpler analysis method, the time to find the ‘Tunings’ is greatly reduced. The number of usable ‘Tunings’ has now reached over 17,000.

After the death of Dr. Frank in 2008, Don Paris Ph.D.(h.c.) redesigned the SE-5 plus and updated it to work with today’s computers. The SE-5 1000 added many new features such as an automatic Replicator, Infra Red Scanning Probe, Electro-luminescent Output cable, Color Light Harmonizer and much more.

An expansive history scalar technology is described in my book, "Regaining Wholeness Through the Subtle Dimensions", available to all contributors.


The subject of Scalar and IDFs (Intrinsic Data Fields) is outlined in my book Regaining Wholeness Through the Subtle Dimensions. (Which you get as a perk for even a $1 donation to our Indiegogo program of the Chi-O Phi. And Yes, IDFs is a coined phrase to describe something that has proven a thousand times over in the field of Radionics over the last 100 years.

The difficulty with the field of Scalar is that many people have picked it up as a catch word to sell everything. The other problem is that those that actually understand this type of eletro-magnetic phenomena are either in black op programs with high security restrictions or are underfunded inventors working in their garage.

Finding reliable information about this field is difficult, even with the internet, because of the confusion of the Information aspect of Scalar and the Electro-magnetic aspect. I was fortunate to have become best friends with several people that have actually researched and experimented in this field. Dr. Robert C. Beck created a small scalar device that he used to get a signal out of a "quiet room" many stories underground in a military installation. Bob was a very close friend and taught me a lot about the Electro-magnetic aspects of Scalar.

Eldon Byrd worked in a military program to develop Scalar weaponry for about 20 years. He was also a very close friend of both Bob Beck and myself. The concepts of using scalar as weapons is not a concept. They developed "terrible" devices and weapons. His greatest experience was the day that Clinton became president and they shut down the program and destroyed the research.

Dr. Willard Frank AKA William Francis Lawson, was actually the inventor of the Chi-O. As I describe in the history video, it was originally called the Scalar Plus. His work with Galen Hieronymus and his development of the SE-5 is legendary. Bill was a Ph.D. physicist. Bill was also a close friend of both Bob Beck and Eldon Byrd. I worked very closely with Bill for more than 20 years.

As far as programming the hologram chips is concerned, I teach this in my DVD course, The Next Dimension, and describes step by step how to do this.
www.se-5.com/advanced.htm

There have been double blind, placebo studies done with "programmed" holograms. I show some in my history video. So as far as woo is concerned, I agree, this is very much in the woo area because it is way outside of the box of the failing pharmaceutical run medical schools. story:
Are you a freediver? Fed up of having to replace your noseclip pads too often, wasting hours in a gooey mess of cutting, glueing, drying...? 


I am a freediver and I was like you! So... I shook up my oxygen-deprived brain cells, and came up with an idea… Why not design a new noseclip, with removable silicone pads easy to plug in?! Easy. Simple. And super practical!

 Here it is: the new Octopus noseclip! Made with top-quality materials and finish, its ergonomic shape and anti-slippery silicone pads ensure a tight grip and no leaks, for perfect equalization. Check out the video above for a preview of the product!


 I am a freediver competitor and instructor, but I have also been working as product designer for many years. This makes me not only aware of what freedivers need and want in a good noseclip, but also able to create and design a product that will meet these needs. Being from Switzerland, it is in my genes to care about precision, quality and attention to detail, and I will make sure I personally check and supervise the whole manufacturing process step by step in Switzerland, to offer you a final product of the best quality possible. 

Be the first to order your new Octopus noseclip, at a great discovery price!!! Delivery will be in September-October this year at the latest. 

All monies received from your pre-orders will be used to cover part of the production costs, estimated at 15'000$. In order to get high quality plastic parts, we use a process called "plastic injection", requiring complex moulds that will fit in a huge industrial injection machine. These cost a lot: around 10'000$ for the hard plastic parts and 3000$ for the silicone ones. Of course I could have it all made in China for half the price, but I like to support the local craftsmen and entrepreneurs! 

If you cannot support me financially, you can still help me and my project by sharing this on facebook or by email with your freediver friends and by simply talking about my noseclip around you!

Huge thanks for your support!!!

See you in the blue!

Pascal

story_txt:
OUR PROJECT: THE NITTY GRITTY: WE NEED A SHOP. PART RETAIL, PART PRODUCTION- COME WATCH GOODS BEING HANDCRAFTED WHILE YOU SHOP. YOUR FUNDING WILL HELP MAKE THIS EXPANSION POSSIBLE AND ALLOW US TO DO FIRST RUNS OF THE REWARDS BELOW. keep scrolling all the way down to see rewards!



OUR PROJECT NOW-> GET SPACE, MAKE FIRST RUN OF COOL PRODUCTS FOR OUR BACKERS. HOW WE'LL DO IT DOWN THE ROAD-> IN STAGES- FOLLOWING OUR PLAN, OUR HEARTS, AND THE NEEDS AND DESIRES DICTATED BY OUR CUSTOMERS.

 
CAN'T MAKE IT TO THE NEW SHOP? NO WORRIES... WE'LL CONTINUE TO UPLOAD RAD VIDS CONNECTING YOU TO THE EXPERIENCE OF SEEING GOODS BEING HANDCRAFTED. AWESOME, YES.

WHO WE ARE, WHAT WE ARE TRYING TO CREATE, AND OUR VALUES AND APPROACH IN DOING SO.


 
RIGHT NOW WE MAKE BAGS AND ACCESSORIES- DAMN GOOD ONES AT THAT. WE PLAN TO EXPAND OUR PRODUCT OFFERINGS TO INCLUDE MENS, WOMENS, AND CHILDREN'S OUTDOOR CLOTHING. WE WILL ADVANCE THE TECHNICALITY OF OUR OFFERINGS AS WE GROW.

THE PROJECT: 
THIS FUNDING WILL GIVE US A KICK START TO GET SET UP IN A NEW SPACE AND DO OUR FIRST FULL SCALE PRODUCTION RUN OF THE T SHIRTS, LEATHER GOODS, AND RECYCLED SAILCLOTH ITEMS YOU SEE HERE. THESE WILL BE THE FIRST PRODUCTS CREATED IN THIS NEW SPACE. WE WILL THEN CREATE NEW PROJECTS FOR NEW PRODUCT OFFERINGS LIKE DUCK PANTS, OVERALLS, COLLARED SHIRTS, FLANNELS, BOARD SHORTS, ETC FROM OUR AMERICAN MANUFACTURERS AS WE GROW. BEING PART OF OUR KICKSTARTER WILL GIVE YOU EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO OUR FUTURE PROJECTS AND PRODUCT OFFERINGS. OUR CLOTHING REPRESENTS WHO WE ARE AS OUTDOOR ENTHUSIASTS, OUR VALUES IN HONORING AND PRESERVING THE SUSTAINABILITY OF OUR ENVIRONMENT, AND OUR INITIATIVE TO CREATE A REVOLUTION ONSHORE. BUY LOCALLY, TRAVEL GLOBALLY. 
NOW ONTO THE FUN STUFF! REWARDS:  
THESE REWARDS WILL BE THE VERY FIRST PRODUCTS TO BE HANDCRAFTED IN OUR NEW SPACE. ONCE WE ARE IN THE NEW SPACE AND THESE PRODUCTS ARE HANDCRAFTED AND SHIPPED OUT TO YOU, OUR PROJECT WILL BE COMPLETE! WAHOO!
REWARD #1). $1 YOUR VOTE FOR ONSHORE. OUR THANK YOU.

story:
Who am I and what is a DOPEFULLY?

My name is Corey Fields (sometimes Corey F. Godwell, a creative pseudonym that stuck) and I am a New York City native. I am a professional Graphic Designer/Illustrator and co-creator of Nukleus Comics. I always signed into the athstetic of "if you want better, contribute and make it better". When I was 19, I was far more proactive when I joined a youth organization in Brooklyn that strived for racial equality. Since those days, after two decades and plenty of growth, I settled into the world of adulthood and life changes that accompany it. Naturally, my proactive roll diminished and I just started feeling complacent. Then, along came social networking. Started talking to and bonding with a few good people, information was exchanged and some pretty heavy information shared.

I'm one of those Facebook, Twitter and Huffington Post loudmouths that loves to share the latest information on anything from an increasingly irrelevant Supreme Court to Congress to Monsanto to Climate Change, Droning, Fracking..."anything but personal crap" is how I do it. A self described "sh*t checker" with a low tolerance for foolishness and while it can be said "I'm all over the place" I remain focused on doing something MORE. Simply put...I'm tired of just talking. Its time to go back into the 'good fight' and I am dragging a few good people in to help the cause. Dopefully is a responsible UNISEX brand.

Took a word that a wonderful friend of mine used on her day to day, which employed "Dope" (an old eighties slang definition of "great" of "hot") and "hopefully", as if to say "stay optimistic". She let me borrow it and the color coding is slightly based on a beautiful watch campaign I actually came across on Indiegogo itself. I then took to putting some meaningful designs together and consulting with a few friends I know, who are either in the creative industry or who shared the concerns displayed in the actual artwork. Take all of those ingredients, add a proactive itch, a little water, stir and...

COLOR CODE to CAUSE.

I have been tossing this around and around in my head for some time and lets face it, its not a reinvention of the wheel, but I realized that it already had a niche before it all took shape. I decided to make it special by using designs that not only speak to the buyer, but that spoke for something. The color code chart [above] is running on a method of color-by-association (i.e., Green=Environmental, Pink=Breast Cancer Awareness, Blue=Seal Life causes/Water causes, Anti-Fracking, etc...), at least for the duration of this campaign. It will later be expanded to associate with the primary color on the shirt as well. These organizations that are out there doing the groundwork. The science to keeping any well oiled machine running. This is the story of my venture and you are witnessing its evolution.

PHILANTHROPY + DESIGN.

Unfortunately, the politics of the nation (at least in America) is being fought via financing. Its a new reality. I don't particularly like it, but it is the 'Newest Deal', for now. Raised leaning Left, but recognizing the need for a Right, I decided to dodge the political bullet (more or less FOR NOW) and just contribute $5 PER SHIRT to some core fights that (I personally felt) need to be fought for and by all. Health, Cancer, Diet, Environment and the most invaluable resource of them all...our Children. Without getting into a full on debate, there is no doubt that education, child labor laws, mentoring, the battle for labeled Genetically Modified Foods (GMO's), Cancer (especially amongst women), etc...these are some critical issues of our time. You can't ignore them and this is my little way of deciding to do something, while getting others involved at the same time. This is the way we humans do it...we help each other. That simple. I'm going to see that this one voice, this brand, that it speaks loudly and that it is heard.

Quality is not an option. This is not a situation where your money will not be well spent, both by the donation, but also by design. This is a T-Shirt brand. Period. What we are doing is conducting business, but also being responsible by donating a sizable portion of the profits. All of our shirts are:
  • 100% Cotton or Hemp fabrics.
  • Fitted tees with two STANDARD CUT sizes available.
  • We print with discharge inks, which soak into the fabric for a natural feel.
  • Tagless. We print the wash instruction inside the neck of the shirt.
  • Most of our shirts are European cut and fitted. Although, we will have an optional STANDARD cut T available.
  • All hang tags and packaging will be 100% recyclable.

THE PRODUCT.


'THAT FACE'
[$5 per sale will go to either The Center for Reproductive Rights or Women's Learning Partnership]


'Motor Mouse Loves the Children'
[$5 per sale goes to Save the Children or Africare]


'A Fly Girl'
[$5 per sale to Big Brothers Big Sisters of New York /city of your choosing]


'C'
[$5 per sale to Breast Cancer Research Foundation]


'Honor Thy Momma'
[$5 per sale to Earth Works]


'Chicks & Wax'
[$5 per sale to Education Through Music, Inc]


'Mmmm, Greens'
(RunDmc style faded print)
[$5 per sale to Vermonts 'Right to Know GMO' Campaign or Farm Aid]


"You Are A Real Girl"
'The Barbie Is Dead'
[$5 per sale is donated to Child Labor Coalition]


"V" is for VEGAN
[vegan is printed in gold foil]
($5 donated to legislature to legalize Marijuana)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We decided to shoot for $9000 because the ultimate goal is to launch the brand with a total of 14 shirts, if not a few more, provided we surpass the intended goal. New designs will be added as we can cover the cost. We set our first shipping date a few weeks out. This allows for a realistic production prep time and to give all contributors time to change their selection, should we expand the line, which is the intent. In coming weeks you will see MORE original hand drawn artwork, you will see more grassroot and local causes as well shirts dedicated to Anti-Bullying, Violence Against Women, the fight to stop the Keystone Pipeline, more international causes such as a tee that will contribute to supplying mosquito nets to children in parts of Africa, another shirt dedicated to the UK Parliaments austerity attack on the sick and the elderly, Anti-Austerity, dietary causes like the passing of legislature to label GMO's, anti-Monsanto shirts and plenty more. Some will call us "self-righteous" and guess what? I'll wear that, proudly. Although, I don't necessarily agree. This is not going to be a "throw money at it" situation either, but money talks. Lets be realistic. When you actually have something to say? Even better.

The initial campaign ceiling will cover the cost of:

  • The shirts themselves, which are a 100% cotton (or Hemp, in some cases) garment. 
  • The campaign video/commercial (which should be in place by 16th of March) plus photos.
  • The cost of screens (PER COLOR for each design, not per design) which runs a one time rate of $30 each
  • The print fee, inner-neck tag print, both done in discharge inks, which actually are bleached into the fabric, creating a natural feel, as opposed to a thick plastic plastisol print.
  • A nifty recyclable hang-tag with background info of the company itself
  • Postcards (which will be available shortly as as we can pay for them) and included with each Perk
  • Shipping, which will kind of sort of be "FREE" for all contributors. Unless of course, you are outside of the United States.
  • Hooded sweatshirts made of 100%
Should we not reach the intended goal, we will scale back on the amount of designs available, instead of scaling back on quality. As stated before, quality is not an option. People are donating from their pockets. The lease we can do is make sure you receive a quality garment. Should we surpass the intended numbers, then we will carefully expand and include accessories and items such as carved natural soaps, more hoodies and even hire additional artists to add artistic variety and fresh concepts. Manufacturing of the actual garment is also in the works, although we are taking the measures to make sure we do not use sweatshop garments.

All of our perks will range from a complimentary postcard that will feature full color artwork of 3 (or more, depending on how close we come to our goal) of the designs above and can either be a collectors item or used as a gift to send a powerful message to a loved one. The higher contributions will see perks such as the The Philanthropist Special which features 4 T-shirts of your choosing, a hoodie version of any of the 14 designs, all three postcards and a sincere THANK YOU for your hard earned contribution. All contributors names will be added to the Dope List of monthly contributors (unless you opt out) in the upcoming Dopefully Blog, debuting on March 30th. The blog offers a place you can make suggestions on what other organizations to donate to, as well as offer oversight on the ones we already donate to. I encourage and welcome the information. If you decide to send a suggestion via comments using Indiegogo, please come correct and be polite. All nonsense will immediately be deleted. There is a way to do things...please be respectful.


'Chicks & Wax' - print sample
w/ discharge inks.

The Results

We operate on the "village to raise a child" theory. The mindset of "one hand washes the other". That $5 of every shirt will go toward the associated movement. LET ME MAKE THIS CLEAR: the listed organization do not endorse DOPEFULLY not do they have any input on any of the artistic content on our tees. While contributions to a T-shirt brand will hardly save the world, philanthropy and donations to organizations that are fighting the good fight is a BIG start and a major cog of a bigger machine. The world cannot get better by moaning and complaining on Facebook. That is not to belittle the impact of exchanging facts and information on the life altering social network. Its just to say, the social network is where we start the dialog. As stated earlier, actual hands on or financial donations are what pay the salaries of the people who are on the ground. These folks put in hard work and sacrifice. If I cannot be there myself...if you cannot be there yourself, then at least lets help fuel the engine. I feel that is the duty of every human being. The world cannot get better on just a prayer. Some hands must get dirty, some feet must be blistered and the soldiers must remain well fed. Its really that complicated, but that simple.

You get to walk away knowing that not only did you just acquire a nicely put together garment that actually says something about your beliefs or that can stimulate conversation, but that a portion of what you just spent, actually went somewhere besides a faceless and opaque corporate glutton. Dopefully has its own face and transparent is how we will remain. This is a pretty bare bones brand that is actually going to take the contributors from crawling-to-walking in its growth from concept to brand. YOU are actually a major component in its growth and nurturing. This is the story of this company and you are helping me write it. I will be honest...I am not Captain Patriotic nor mister righteous. Some of the designs will walk the line in coming releases, I won't lie to you. This is not Disney...this is real life. I understand one fact that no American Citizen can contradict...this is our country, love it or not. You live here. You want it to be better, make it better. While you're at it, leave your political affiliation at the door.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are not able contribute. Some may not want to contribute, but knows someone that is interested in these kinds of projects. All I can ask is that you use the social SHARE tools provided by indiegogo and linking to this campaign page. It only takes a moment of your time and a few clicks of the mouse and goes a lonnnnng way. Any and all help is greatly appreciated.

This is going to be a trip...let's go!

Thank you for checking us out,
Corey Fields
President of Broadway International/
Dopefully, LLC

You get to walk away knowing that not only did you just acquire a nicely put together garment that actually says something about your beliefs or that can stimulate conversation, but that a portion of what you just spent, actually went somewhere besides a faceless and opaque corporate glutton. Dopefully has its own face and transparent is how we will remain. This is a pretty bare bones brand that is actually going to take the contributors from crawling-to-walking in its growth from concept to brand. YOU are actually a major component in its growth and nurturing. This is the story of this company and you are helping me write it. I will be honest...I am not Captain Patriotic nor mister righteous. Some of the designs will walk the line in coming releases, I won't lie to you. This is not Disney...this is real life. I understand one fact that no American Citizen can contradict...this is our country, love it or not. You live here. You want it to be better, make it better. While you're at it, leave your political affiliation at the door.



Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are not able contribute. Some may not want to contribute, but knows someone that is interested in these kinds of projects. All I can ask is that you use the social SHARE tools provided by indiegogo and linking to this campaign page. It only takes a moment of your time and a few clicks of the mouse and goes a lonnnnng way. Any and all help is greatly appreciated. This is going to be a trip...let's go!Thank you for checking us out,Corey FieldsPresident of Broadway International/Dopefully, LLC

story:
TABLE DESIGNS

Normally, table designs don't excite people...But that's about to change!

 

Granny's On Fire!!!  ========================

My name is Evelyn Spooner, and I've been a designer my entire life. Decorating (and re-decorating) my dollhouses is one of the earliest memories I have. That soon turned into sewing all the dolls' clothes and household accessories, and finally evolved into doing the same for real-life people.

I had a pretty meager upbringing, so for many, many years, I took in sewing to make ends meet, even later if I was ever in between a "real" job. Secretly, I always longed to be able to exercise my sewing talents full-time and for pay, instead of the mundane jobs that stopped me from doing what I loved most, designing and sewing!

Late in life, I finally got the courage to formalize my talent, so I went back to school to obtain my degree in Fashion Design. I can (and do) design just about anything I get my hands on!

 

How it all started  ==========================

I began designing and creating eco-friendly lunch mats at the request of my grandchildren (and very soon, all their friends) and demand swiftly grew faster than I ever imagined.

The fun mats make kids feel special, and Moms love the functionality, convenient pockets, eco-friendliness, compactness, and comfort of knowing that their kids' lunch surface will be clean. It didn't take long to turn the popularity of the kids (and then adult) lunch mats into a successful business!

 


What all the NEW fuss is about...  =================

And now, I'm thrilled to be developing a brand new, never-before-seen table design that I call: Table Mats!

Table mats are a cross between a runner and a placemat...they are (typically) square or round mats that sit as a large center mat in the middle of a table. They can add style and elegance to a table, be used as coverage for family style meals, as a backdrop for centerpieces, and tons of other uses!

I've distributed prototypes and samples to friends, family, and our "sneak peak" customers and they can not get enough! The mats are so versatile and multi-purpose, they're using them for things I've never even thought of! They've been even more well-received than our lunch mats, which says A LOT!

The design possibilities for these table mats are endless, and I'm super EXCITED about where I can take this!!!

 


About Your contributions   ====================

Your generous contributions will allow me to bring table mats to the world THE RIGHT WAY, introducing the line with the variety of styles and flare that the mats beg for. You'll help allow me to flex my true creative designing wings rather than my creativity being limited by finances. I'll create extremely unique designs that span the casual to elegent to bizarre! Upon launch, I want you to say "WOW, I've gotta get me one of those!", and I thank you for helping me make that happen!

Here's how I will maximize your contributions to make this launch a success:


Fabric, decorations & trim inventory - ($1,500)

Specialized Industrial Sewing Equipment
* Industrial Sewing Machine $ Fix ($1,250)
* Overlock Sewing Machine ($300)
* Embroidery Machine ($600)

Miscellaneous Tools ($175)

Services
* Contract Sewing Assistants/seamstresses (based on volume) ($1,240)
* Website/Graphic Design costs ($275)

Miscellaneous and overhead ($550)

TOTAL: $5,890.00

 


Awesome Perks   ==============================

We want to make sure we take care of our backers with the best perks possible! Please know that we genuinely appreciate EVERY contribution at EVERY perk level!!!

So please check out our Perks on the right!

And here are some pics of the actual Perks being offered:

 

100% Cotton Designer Pocketed Lunch Napkin

(Created exclusively for our Indiegogo backers)

These handy litte napkins will make packing your lunch fun! 2 attractive style choices!

 

 

100% Cotton Lunch Mats

You'll be able to select from over a dozen awesome styles on Matooga.com! All Matooga Lunchmats are made of 100% cotton, are reversible, come with convenient pockets for utensils, coordinating napkin (included) and any other lunchtime essentials. All mats have a tie closure and fold easily into a compact bundle for easy insertion into most lunchbags/lunchboxes. 

 

 

 

 

 

Our New Innovation: Table Mats 

We'll be designing jaw-dropping, new and exciting designs you won't want to miss!  The prototypes below will give you an idea of the FORM of the mats, but the designs I have in mind will BLOW YOUR MIND! Stay tuned!!!

All mats have a tie closure and fold easily into a compact bundle for easy insertion into most lunchbags/lunchboxes.

We'll be designing jaw-dropping, new and exciting designs you won't want to miss!  The prototypes below will give you an idea of the FORM of the mats, but the designs I have in mind will BLOW YOUR MIND! Stay tuned!!!

story:
Short Summary

HEY SACRED HEARTS!! 

Welcome to my fund raising page!!!  I'm so excited and humbled by the fact that you're even on here to see what’s NEXT for It’s S.A.C.R.E.D. and you desire to LOVE on and sow into it!! 

It has been a LONG road preparing for the next collection. There have been tears, delays, and a whole lot of praying yet the time has come. IN HIM is so fitting for this collection because my team and I truly had to STAY in Him. 

The concepts have been designed, proofed, and completed. The materials meaning BETTER t-shirts have been found, the printers, photographers, and ALL that it takes to put out another LOVE Tee collection are ready to go for such a time as this. 

That’s where I need YOUR help!!! I have gotten all the raw materials together now it’s time to produce the LOVE Tees. I truly appreciate your help in the PRODUCTION for this collection!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise at least $2700 for production.  What will this money cover you ask? 

  • Purchase & Printing of Shirts
  • Private Labeling
  • Photo shoot for website and marketing materials
  • In Him Collection Sacred Sound Off’s
  • Miscellaneous expenses toward a successful collection.

In return for your LOVE sown, we have listed different LOVE perks (to your right) that you'll receive at different levels!!! Your LOVE comes full circle from us back to YOU!!  

Now, if for some reason we don't reach our goal of $2700, we will use what we have to do as much as we can.  If we go beyond our $2700 (JESUS IS REAL!!) all monies will still be used toward the ministry of It’s S.A.C.R.E.D. Lifestyle Brand and other materials needed for the ministry. So either way, your financial contribution will be going toward ALL things S.A.C.R.E.D.!!

The Impact

My prayer is that the IN HIM Love Tee collection will be the moving ministry and feet to what it truly means to be IN CHRIST and to walk in LOVE. Every time an eye lays on a shirt it’s another opportunity to minister if approached or be a light in this world without saying a word. 

The It’s S.A.C.R.E.D. Love Tees are more than t-shirts. They are moving ministry! They are a lifestyle! They are Love in motion! They are S.A.C.R.E.D. (Sound. Anointed. Covenant. Representation. Engaged. Devotion.)!

So your help and LOVE with this will help me reach many Sacred Sirens and Sacred Soldiers, especially those who desire to be a part of the Sacred StreetHeart team and help restore the divine purpose of marriage and families that impact the world by putting on LOVE-HIS love with a LOVE Tee.

Other Ways You Can Help

I certainly know that some people just can’t show LOVE with money, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!  Here are some other ways you can show LOVE and sow:

  • Pray!! Pray again!! Pray for the Father, Son, and the Holy Spirit!!! The bible says in 1 Thessalonians 5:17, "Pray without ceasing".  So please pray that God would allow the ministry of Sacred Enterprises Inc & It’s S.A.C.R.E.D. Lifestyle Brand to do the work that He has called it to do.
  • Spread the Word!  Tweet, Facebook, Email...whatever means you can use to  please tell ALL the Sacred Hearts you know and that they may know so we can exceed beyond what this ministry could ever ask or think!!
  • Words of Encouragement! Please connect with me on FB, Twitter, or/and when you see me and show LOVE.  Pursuing a God-sized vision can be a lonely journey. Looking beyond what you see in the natural isn't always easy. Any LOVE sown towards my way would mean more than the world to me!!

Thanks in advance for your LOVE and support of this collection, Sacred Enterprises Inc, and It's S.A.C.R.E.D. Lifestyle Brand! 

For more information about me and ALL things S.A.C.R.E.D., please check out my website at www.itssacred.com.  

#GETYOUSOMELOVE #HISLOVE 

Know that we are praying and standing with you, your covenant, & Sacred Enterprise - family.

 

Leslie Wright ~ C.R.O. - Chief Restoring Officer

Ms. Sacred

Leslie Wright ~ C.R.O. - Chief Restoring Officer
Ms. Sacred

story:
Apparel Empowered - Electric Filament lined apparel by SOVO. Run, bike, dance or chill in revolutionary gear! Made in USA.

 

 

APPAREL EMPOWERED

No need to hold your hoodie up to a lamp before going for a jog! All SOVO gear Filaments are made with battery powered Electroluminescent (EL) Wire allowing you to turn the light off, make it flash, or shine solid. Each garment’s Filament is powered by a small ‘AA’ battery pack tucked away in a little inside pocket.

LIGHT UP the night! We've continued to sell-out of our small prototype runs. Popular uses include:

  • Morning Jog
  • Evening Bike Ride
  • Dancing at the Club
  • Team Sports
  • Triathlon, Marathon, 5K's
  • Corporate Branding

 

 

 

MADE IN USA

Making a quality garment with EL wire that will last is not easy. We've been working for months to ensure you are getting apparel that looks sharp during the day, and shines at night.

SOVO cares about our community. We proudly control the entire process, cutting and sewing each piece in the southbay of Los Angeles county - bringing jobs home!

 

As a backer, you will help bring SOVO to market, and fund the development of fun new gear for running, biking and other activities. We are continually improving our products and seeking feedback from customers as to what should be next in the apparel revolution.

 

PERKS

The Edison Electric Jacket comes in two standard fabric colors

 

And, five stock Filament color options:


After you claim a PERK, we will email you to gather which Size, Fabric and Filament combination you wish.  For the Holiday 100 - the email will come within 48 hours of your PERK claim. 

 

 

 

 

WHAT IS THIS 'SOcial VOice' ?

We are working to build a meaningful apparel company. A lot of people are doing great things, which go unnoticed. By putting people "in lights", we want to highlight those who are doing more.

We are working with individuals and organizations who are doing inspiring things. Be on the lookout for SOVO partnerships with organizations such as Relay for Life, Run for Her, EDIFY, YouInspire.org, Electric Run, Compete 4 Causes and many others! Here are a few examples: http://www.youtube.com/embed/U4lj920679Q?rel=0&autoplay=1&hd=1

story:
About Us:

We are Mr & Mrs Cottrell: a fortunate couple that not only shares a love for each other but also a love for fashion and design.

Passionate about the finer things: we are equally passionate about expressing ones self through fashion. We believe that beautiful, timeless and elegant pieces can add a sense of luxury and class to everyday moments. Time is precious and so are first impressions, that is why we have designed a line of beautiful luxury unisex watches. 

Inspired by classic designs; we are old souls with young ambitions. 

Our time pieces embody unpretentious sophistication and will be a beautiful addition to your wardrobe. Inspired by vintage designs with a modern twist we feel that these timeless pieces will reflect those with kindred spirits. Those who dare to dream big, live the good life and believe in high quality will value  the affordability of these luxury watches.


Casual Elegance & Classic sophistication: Truly a versatile and classic watch that can be worn to a casual Sunday brunch with jeans and a t-shirt or to any black tie event. Elegant, sophisticated and slightly playful, it is the perfect accessory for both the old soul and the young at heart.

Attainable luxury: 

By contributing to our campaign you are able to get one of our beautiful timepieces for $200 (Regular $575). Already on order, they are expected to arrive in November, just in time for the Christmas season. 

Go to the pink tab "Contribute Now" to select your timepiece of choice.

Meraki: 

(v.) To leave something of yourself (your soul, creativity or love) in your work.

The Meraki series is the 1st collection released By C+C. Ignited by a passion to create beautiful timepieces that truly echoes their spirit where old souls meet young ambition.

The Meraki collection is our debut and we are proud to boast the following features:

Stainless Steel plated in 18 Karat Rose Gold

  • Case Material: Stainless Steel 18 Karat Rose Gold
  • Face Diameter: 42 mm
  • Case Thickness:  7mm
  • Band Material: 100% Genuine Italian Leather
  • Butterfly Clasp: Stainless Steel Plated in 18 Karat Rose Gold
  • Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Lens
  • Display: Chronograph function
  • Movement: Swiss RONDA 6004B
  • Water Resistant: 5ATM (50 meters/160 feet)
  • Battery Life: 2 Years (Approx.)
  • Each Watch Comes With An Original Serial Numbe

We spared no expense to ensure that you get the best quality available. We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years of purchase we will send you a replacement.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched sapphire (good luck scratching it); alteration of the color and/or material, such as leather and plating.
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

The future of C+C Lifestyles By Design...?

We want to continue to design a full line of varied watch styles that offer high end design, luxury and quality at affordable  prices. We welcome you to  join with us on this journey and be a part of transforming our dreams and designs into reality. We plan on growing our vision into a beautiful brand that exemplifies excellence in fashion, luxury, quality and value. This is just the beginning and we can't wait to see what the future has in store for us. 

We Need Your Support

100% of the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be used for C+C Lifestyles By Design  launch. After more than a year of designing our watches and working with an experienced manufacturer, we have finalized our prototypes and have placed the order of our 1st collection.

We are personally backing the cost to put our design into production but we want to get the world out and raise capital for our additioanl launch costs. For a limited time, we are offering our watches at less than wholesale in order to create brand awareness.  Our backers will be the 1st to receive a watch from our collection when it arrives in November. We need your support so we can see our dream flourish into reality.

We have big dreams and are reaching out for your support in hopes that our vision resonates with you. We would love for you to be one of the first to wear our beautiful watches. This is only one of our designs and we have many more that we would love to produce; the more we raise, the more we can do!

We want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking the time to get to know us and our vision and for your support big and small.

Our 1st order is set to arrive just in time for our anniversary (November) and we would be honoured to have your support. Once we have recieved our order,  our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers with a framable thank you card.

Help Us Spread The Word

Our biggest challenge with C+C watches will be getting the word out, and convincing people such as yourself to participate. There are so many great projects to invest in and our hope is that we stand out in the crowd. To get the word out and bring our vision to the world, we are asking you to help us spread the word. Please share our indiegogo campaigne, every bit helps :)

Cheers to going after your dreams and designing your own lifestyle.

Each Watch Comes With An Original Serial Numbe




We spared no expense to ensure that you get the best quality available. We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years of purchase we will send you a replacement.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.
Warranty does not cover:  

The life of the battery 
Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched sapphire (good luck scratching it); alteration of the color and/or material, such as leather and plating.
Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 









The future of C+C Lifestyles By Design...?
We want to continue to design a full line of varied watch styles that offer high end design, luxury and quality at affordable  prices. We welcome you to  join with us on this journey and be a part of transforming our dreams and designs into reality. We plan on growing our vision into a beautiful brand that exemplifies excellence in fashion, luxury, quality and value. This is just the beginning and we can't wait to see what the future has in store for us. 



We Need Your Support
100% of the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be used for C+C Lifestyles By Design  launch. After more than a year of designing our watches and working with an experienced manufacturer, we have finalized our prototypes and have placed the order of our 1st collection.
We are personally backing the cost to put our design into production but we want to get the world out and raise capital for our additioanl launch costs. For a limited time, we are offering our watches at less than wholesale in order to create brand awareness.  Our backers will be the 1st to receive a watch from our collection when it arrives in November. We need your support so we can see our dream flourish into reality.
We have big dreams and are reaching out for your support in hopes that our vision resonates with you. We would love for you to be one of the first to wear our beautiful watches. This is only one of our designs and we have many more that we would love to produce; the more we raise, the more we can do!
We want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking the time to get to know us and our vision and for your support big and small.

Our 1st order is set to arrive just in time for our anniversary (November) and we would be honoured to have your support. Once we have recieved our order,  our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers with a framable thank you card.



Help Us Spread The Word
Our biggest challenge with C+C watches will be getting the word out, and convincing people such as yourself to participate. There are so many great projects to invest in and our hope is that we stand out in the crowd. To get the word out and bring our vision to the world, we are asking you to help us spread the word. Please share our indiegogo campaigne, every bit helps :)
Cheers to going after your dreams and designing your own lifestyle.

story:
About NGD

NGD Clothing is a street and urban clothing brand that aims to give people a sense of style and confidence with the clothing they wear. NGD designs artistic clothing that men and women can wear. The stylish clothing also shares a vision and spreads a positive message. Inspired and motivated by hip hop and street art, NGD pushes forward to become known in the fashion world. We want people to realize who we are, but also see that we are not just a clothing line that creates basic and un-inspirational clothing. We want consumers to realize that as a clothing line we have something to offer to people; no matter who you are, where you're from our how you grew up, any dream can become a reality. NGD wants to serve as a testimony that it is OK to use what inspires you as a person as a foundation to push you forward towards a brighter future.

What Makes NGD Different?
Each of our shirts has a message about who NGD is and what we stand for. We are not just a clothing line that is just looking to sell product. Instead, we want people to see our struggle and realize that we are portraying a positive message through our clothing and our artistic design. What is that message, might you ask? To keep dreaming and believing. As youth, we often have great dreams and aspirations that grow beautifully like wild flowers, but as we grow up, we loose a grip on those dreams and weed-like thoughts of failure and mediocrity grow in our minds. Eventually, the wild and beautiful dreams we had as children die off and we start to embrace the life we never wanted to live.
We show messages on our shirts to express that dreams are forever with us. Our clothing is meant to be heard as well as seen. Above all, NGD wants the youth to remember that no matter what, keep working and keep dreaming and never let that dream go. NGD aims to motivate and inspire others through each piece of clothing that is made.  NGD serves as an example that through hard work, dedication, and perseverance anything can be done. 

Run The City - (Tank Top)

Look I'm Fresh - (Tank Top)

Kicks Stay Fresh - (T-Shirt)

Help NGD Give Back as well as Move Forward

For every $300 that is donated towards our goal, we will give 3 shirts to The Phoenix Centre for the Youth. With this, the youth who are not able to afford the newest clothing wear, can keep up with the latest fashion. It will give the youth a confidence boost and also allow them to wear fashionable clothing that relays a positive message.

What We Need & What You Get

What NGD needs is funding to help get things moving.

NGD needs $5000 to help get materials for printing, cost of printing, and help marketing. We need materials such as blank t-shirts, tank tops, hoodies, and crewnecks to print on and be able to mass produce for all our great supporters and fans. We want to make sure we have a good selection for everyone to chose from. These funds also go towards printing for our t-shirts, tanks and tops, as well as marketing and advertising for the clothing line. We want to share NGD with people all over the nation and the world. By receiving better marketing and advertising we will be able to reach various audiences which will help us further establish our business and create an even better online presence for our company. Your contributions will be greatly appreciated and we will make the most use out of every dollar we receive.


$1 contributors - Will get a big thank you! (Every Dollar helps so we will be ecstatic and excited for every dollar we received to help push us towards our goal) 

$15 contributors - Will receive a custom NGD sticker printed and shipped (Free Shipping in the US)

$30 contributors - Will receive a custom NGD Clothing wrist band  (Free Shipping in the U.S)

$60 contributors - Will receive their choice of one of NGD Clothing's fresh T-shirts or tank top (Free Shipping in the US)

$100 contributors - Will receive their choice of one NGD Clothing hoodie or crewneck (Free Shipping in the US)

$300 contributors - will receive their choice of 1 NGD T-shirt or Tank Top and their choice of 1 hoodie or crewneck (Free Shipping in the US)

$500 contributors - will receive their choice of 2 NGD T-shirts or Tank Tops and their choice of 2 hoodies or crewnecks (Free Shipping in the US)

$1000 Contributors - Will receive 1 of each t-shirt, tank top, and crewneck which has been produced by NGD Clothing to date (free shipping in the US)

  • After our campaign is over, we will follow up with each contributor individually to ensure we have the proper size, and design for their contribution level.
  • Contact us if interested in bulk shirt orders for friends, family, or companies

Bossin and Look I'm Fresh - (Tank Tops)

Other Ways You Can Help

We know times are hard and you can’t always contribute financially to every campaign that you connect with. We would still appreciate your support in helping us spread the word about our campaign. 45 days can go by in the blink of an eye and we need all the help we can get. If possible, we will make an effort to recognize everyone who has helped us promote our campaign. Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to link our campaign to your social media pages. Also, If you have a minute or two, to spare, like NGD Clothing's Facebook page and tell people about us!

story:
Inspired by the classic barrel duffels of the 20th Century, we set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday carry. The Bomber Barrel redefines style by presenting itself in a modern and simple barrel structure: pure, austere and clean. 

The Bomber Barrel is an ultra grade nylon duffel bag designed for you - the athlete, the adventurer, the professional, and the minimalist. It was created to accommodate the lifestyles of the ambitious, the motivated and the driven. With its minimal design, lightweight and black-colored nylon ripstop; its versatility is endless. Its black color creates depth and radiates its bearer’s extravagant elegance.




The Bomber Barrel was conceived out of necessity. We wanted to create a timeless duffel bag design that could be used by anyone, all the time, and be an essential item to take with you to the office, gym, on hikes, and in all of your adventures.

We want Bomber Barrel not to only be used for its functionality, but to match your personal style and be perfect for any occasion.  

 

  • Classic Barrel Design redesigned for the Modern Man
  • Ultra high quality N4004-AC2 Nylon 6 ripstop 
  • Weather Resistant with waterproof zippers
  • Ultra lightweight (390 grams)
  • Adjustable premium quality black nylon and leather padded quick release shoulder strap
  • Wraparound rivet reinforced carry handles with padded velcro grip
  • Dimensions: 18"x10"x10", a perfect carry on or weekend getaway 
  • 23.15L or 1413 cubic inches interior space
  • Emergency paracord zipper pulls
  • Military-grade clips
  • Matted black on black logo 
  • Inner pocket and outer pocket to store your phone, keys, wallet and other small essentials 

 Be Sophisticated. Be Elegant. Be Refined.

The Bomber Barrel combines style, classiness, and professionalism making it perfect for any business attire.

Its barrel structure and sleek interwoven ripstop pattern delivers a touch of sophistication and elegance. While offering an outside zipped pocket to quickly access your essentials, such as business cards, passport, and travel tickets. The Bomber Barrel has a spacious interior to carry your laptop, iPads, smartphones, polished dress shoes, and travel necessities.

 

 

 Be an Explorer. Be Inspired. Be Adventurous.

Although most duffel bags hold what you need for your active lifestyle, they are just too big and heavy. Bomber Barrel, weighing only at 14oz, holds exactly what you need and eliminates all excess. One spacious compartment holds your clothes and shoes, and an interior side pocket keeping your phone, wallet and other small valuables close-by. Be active, be confident, and train HARD with Bomber Barrel.

 

Be Bold. Be Daring. Be Fearless. 

With its premium nylon ripstop, Bomber Barrel is not only stylish, but also weather resistant and lightweight. It's handheld, adjustable and removable leather padded shoulder strap makes it extremely practical to use. Bomber Barrel is the perfect companion for your most daring adventures. 

We are working directly with our manufacturers, allowing us to eliminate unnecessary costs while maintaining an affordable price. In addition, we are allocating our funds towards the highest quality materials possible for the Bomber Barrel. 

At Bomber & Company, we don't believe in retail markups. Our bags are only offered at wholesale pricing. Likewise, for our early supporters, we are offering a super early bird discounted price at $69 including the Mini Bomber Traveler's Kit, and the Bomber Cord Survival Bracelet. After the Indiegogo funding period is over, Bomber Barrel will be offered at $109. 

This is how the Bomber Barrel duffel bag looks filled at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%. 

Designing the ultimate go-to everyday carry was no easy task. Considerations and concepts of a minimalistic duffel bag seemed endless.

Our team spent countless grueling hours, coming up with a duffel bag that is able to accommodate your everyday lifestyle. We had to consider a design that was not only for the gym, but also perfect for the office, city life, outdoors and anywhere in-between. We looked into every single detail to the point where our team was literally working 16 hours per day. From AM to PM, we were redeveloping and improving the conception of the Bomber Barrel.

Additionally, most duffel bags are too big to be an everyday carry; there is too much excess space, weight and clutter. We wanted to design and create a small to medium sized duffel to perfectly fit the essentials you need. We do not need 20 different compartments or 7 different straps and buckles. The Bomber Barrel is a clean and sleek design with an inner pocket, a spacious barrel interior, and an outer pocket. Any additional essentials may be fit into the Mini Bomber Traveler's Kit. This resulted in a 18"x10"x10" barrel structured duffel bag. A duffel that is durable, minimal, and most importantly, functional. 

 Follow us on Facebook and Instagram: BomberBarrel

Lead Designer - Vincent Pilot Ng, founder of Halo Belt, and a strong part of the Elliot Havok design team. He focuses on innovating minimalist goods in our everyday life. Vince has also helped to bring products to market such as Dash Wallets and Quarter Century Belt. With many successfully-funded campaigns under his belt, Vince has considerable experience in design, development, manufacturing, and public relations. As a driven individual, Vince's visions are limitless. He brings his ambitions, ideas and beliefs to life. 

Director of Operations - Andrew Tran Nguyen is a student at California State University, East Bay, and has years of experience in the Customer Service industry. He is passionate about fashion and design. Over the many years of working in Customer Service, Andrew has developed the ability to positively impact and influence others with his positive energy. Combining his sensational positivity with dedication, will and interests in fashion and design, Andrew has a keen eye on design aesthetic essentials.

Creative Strategist and Creative Director - Edgar A. Ceron is passionate about developing ideas, business growth, and entrepreneurship. From working on past projects for Boombotix Inc and Halo Belt, he brings great experience in all aspects of business growth to bring you the best damn bag you will ever need. Combining his extraordinary vision and creativity, with a passion for fashion and entrepreneurship, Edgar brings unmatched value to the Bomber Barrel brand. On the side, you'll find Edgar eagerly searching for travel deals to plan his next trip.

FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK

We have a promise to keep. Our promise is to provide you the best damn everyday carry you can own, period. And we need the best damn support from you to make this dream come true. 

Your funding will go towards: high quality materials, packaging, production, and logistics for the Bomber Barrel.  Not only will your support help production possible, but it will also take your life to a whole new level. 

Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. We truly appreciate it!

- Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer), Andrew Tran Nguyen (Director of Operations), and Edgar Antonio Ceron (Creative Director)                                                  

Risks and challenges

If Bomber Barrel is successfully funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Indiegogo will be used for production and manufacturing on the Bomber Barrel. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to make you the best damn everyday carry, ever.

story:
Premium cloud-free Smartwatch

Titanium, Carbon-Polymer & a Sapphire Crystal Touchscreen make the VIITA Carbon only 64g light, durable, robust, anti-allergic, and skin-friendly.

You can choose if a backup of your data should also be stored in the cloud or if it should remain on your Smartphone only. The choice is yours!

  • Dehydration Tracking
  • Sleep Tracking
  • Up to 10 days of battery life
  • Steps & Calories Tracking
  • Built-in GPS
  • Notifications
  • Stress & Regeneration Tracking
  • Personalized Training Recommendations
     

Why is it Premium:

  • Titanium - it's 42% lighter and much harder than stainless steel. It's also anti-allergic.

  • Carbon-Polymer - we wanted to build the lightest VIITA Watch. Carbon-Polymer is super-light and scratch-resistant.

  • Sapphire Crystal - Ever scratched the glass of a watch? Not with Sapphire Crystal, which you can only scratch with a diamond

  • Limited Edition - 1 of 1.894

  • 100 meters (10 ATM) water-resistant - Perfect for swimming, showering or snorkeling.

  • Up to 10 days battery time - You want to charge your smartwatch every day? No? With VIITA Carbon you don't have to!

 

Why do we include an option for cloud-free?

When talking to our customers we found out that a lot of them don't want their data anywhere else, but on their phone. 


Which Smartwatch features do we integrate?

Health Features

  • Dehydration: When you feel exhausted although you slept enough you might not be drinking enough water. VIITA tells you how much water your body has lost during the day.
  • Sleep Tracking: If you are not so sure if you sleep well you should definitely find out. Everyone deserves a good night's sleep.
  • Stress & Regeneration Tracking: Find out how stressful different situations are in your life and take countermeasures.
  • Steps & Calories Tracking: Tells you how many steps you walked and how many calories you burned


Sport Features:

  • Built-in GPS: Do you really want to take your phone with you when going for a run? With built-in GPS you don't have to.

  • Training Recommendations: You don't know which training your body is able to process best? With HRV-based training recommendations you don't have to worry - your VIITA tells you.
  • Challenge Mode: You want to become faster? With our Challenge Mode, you can challenge your best time on a given track.
  • 19 different activities: running, cycling, cross-trainer, nordic walking on a treadmill, running on a treadmill, stepper, running challenge, walking, hiking, mountain climbing, nordic walking, cycling challenge, rowing, cross-country skating, inline skating, mountain biking, ski tour, cross-country skiing, racing, rowing on an ergometer, cycling on an ergometer, MySets.

 

More features

Notifications: Your VIITA Carbon supports notifications from incoming calls, texts, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, E-Mail, Skype, calender, Snapchat, Twitter, Slack, WeChat, Tinder, QQ, Alipay, Weibo & Tantan.

 

Smart Alarm: VIITA analyzes your sleep and wakes you at the perfect time within a 30 minute window. 

Find my Phone: If you can't find your phone press the "Find my Phone" button on your VIITA and it rings instantly (please note that you have to be in Bluetooth range in order to work).

 


What do past buyers say?

★★★★★

„Have the first version of this watch and its excellent.“

David W. – October, 21st 2019
 

★★★★★

„I’m more than satisfied with my VIITA TITAN! „

Thomas S. – October, 8th 2019
 

★★★★★

„Great watch with great quality. Easy to use „

Mehrzad R. – January, 23rd 2020
 

★★★★★

„Got my viita today and was able to pair it up w my phone pretty quickly. The watch itself feels sturdy. The watch face is clean and easy to read even in bright outdoors. The software could be smoother, but the hardware is fantastic. Love the high quality materials and classic look. Looking forward to what the future updates will bring on the software side. Next I want to see the ECG strap you guys are working on.“

Armin B. – January, 8th 2020
 

★★★★★

„Hey, I got my VIITA today. Very nice looking on my wrist. Such a great job!“

Shinobu S. – October, 27th 2019
 

★★★★★

„I love this watch! I have had several „smart“ activity-based watches in the past and love the functionality and ease of use of this watch. They constantly update the firmware for continued improvements which is great! I will be using this watch for a long time and it has become a vital part of my training process.“

Jon H. – January, 23rd 2020

 


 

Some videos we shot with a smartphone:

 
 
 

Some screenshots from our app:

Dashboard - overview of your data.

 

Activity tracking - with map overview, pulse and elevation chart & your most important data.

 

Steps overview for each day.

 


Steps detail screen for each hour.

 

Sleep tracking overview.

 

Choose the design of your VIITA Carbon.

 

 

What about stretch goals?

We're offering new stretch goals at:

20,000€

50,000€

100,000€

We'll show you what it is shortly before we reach the individual amount ;-)

Shipping

All VIITA Carbon will be shipped from Austria. If you live outside the European Union, you might have to pay taxes or duties when receiving the watch.

Risks and challenges

We are aware of the complexity of this project. But with our many years of experience in wearable technologies and four successful smartwatch collections, we are sure that we can deliver a finished product. And that without any major delays.

Our technologies are tried and tested. We have reliable suppliers with the best quality. We have tested prototypes for the last 7 months and are now ready for series production. All certificates and legal matters have been obtained. A timely production is thus nothing in the way.

Again and again, unforeseen complications can occur. If this happens, we will keep you updated during and after the campaign.

As part of this Indiegogo project, you will take an active part in the finalization of our user experience by providing your insights - from design adjustments to your emphasis on app features - and we will be listening to your feedback and integrating it into the VIITA App whenever possible.
story_txt:
Premium cloud-free SmartwatchTitanium, Carbon-Polymer & a Sapphire Crystal Touchscreen make the VIITA Carbon only 64g light, durable, robust, anti-allergic, and skin-friendly.You can choose if a backup of your data should also be stored in the cloud or if it should remain on your Smartphone only. The choice is yours!
Dehydration Tracking
Sleep Tracking
Up to 10 days of battery life
Steps & Calories Tracking
Built-in GPS
Notifications
Stress & Regeneration Tracking
Personalized Training Recommendations 
Why is it Premium:
Titanium - it's 42% lighter and much harder than stainless steel. It's also anti-allergic.
Carbon-Polymer - we wanted to build the lightest VIITA Watch. Carbon-Polymer is super-light and scratch-resistant.
Sapphire Crystal - Ever scratched the glass of a watch? Not with Sapphire Crystal, which you can only scratch with a diamond
Limited Edition - 1 of 1.894
100 meters (10 ATM) water-resistant - Perfect for swimming, showering or snorkeling.

Up to 10 days battery time - You want to charge your smartwatch every day? No? With VIITA Carbon you don't have to!
 Why do we include an option for cloud-free?When talking to our customers we found out that a lot of them don't want their data anywhere else, but on their phone. 
Which Smartwatch features do we integrate?Health Features

Dehydration: When you feel exhausted although you slept enough you might not be drinking enough water. VIITA tells you how much water your body has lost during the day.

Sleep Tracking: If you are not so sure if you sleep well you should definitely find out. Everyone deserves a good night's sleep.

Stress & Regeneration Tracking: Find out how stressful different situations are in your life and take countermeasures.

Steps & Calories Tracking: Tells you how many steps you walked and how many calories you burned

Sport Features:Built-in GPS: Do you really want to take your phone with you when going for a run? With built-in GPS you don't have to.

Training Recommendations: You don't know which training your body is able to process best? With HRV-based training recommendations you don't have to worry - your VIITA tells you.

Challenge Mode: You want to become faster? With our Challenge Mode, you can challenge your best time on a given track.

19 different activities: running, cycling, cross-trainer, nordic walking on a treadmill, running on a treadmill, stepper, running challenge, walking, hiking, mountain climbing, nordic walking, cycling challenge, rowing, cross-country skating, inline skating, mountain biking, ski tour, cross-country skiing, racing, rowing on an ergometer, cycling on an ergometer, MySets.

story:
What is Unbeatable Concepts?

Bobby Sommer - President/Managing Member Unbeatable Concepts

With a background in sales and marketing, and years of experience in the embroidering and printing of apparel, my original concept for Unbeatable was for Mixed Martial Arts. I admired the strength, persistence and determination these fighters had to get to the top of their game, and what being "unbeatable" would mean to them. Over the past few years, I have had the pleasure of meeting more and more people who have overcome greater odds by defeating cancer, some who are still fighting, and some who have yet to start the fight or may just be supporting someone who is. I believe that the spirit of these individuals truly embody what being unbeatable is all about. 

So with that in mind, the sole mission of Unbeatable Concepts is to inspire that feeling in people around the world and give back to the causes that inspire that feeling in us. A dollar from every unbeatable apparel item sold will be donated to the corresponding cause of the awareness ribbon you choose. When you order your unbeatable apparel you will be able to specify what cause your ribbon represents.

Unbeatable Concepts has a full line of apparel for men and women, from adult to youth, all the way to infant. Featured apparel will include hats, t-shirts, fleece, shorts and even bathing suits.

Our hope is that with the contributions from our proceeds to various charities and research facilities we will effectively end the battle with cancer. So let's get it started!

Where will your contributions go?

Unbeatable Concepts chose indiegogo as a platform to acknowledge and inform millions of survivors and their supporters, and to enlist the help of those who care and give. Your contributions will be rewarded with different "perks" having the "unbeatable" logo on them, including stickers and apparel. Keep in mind that the greatest part of any perk is knowing that you helped start a movement, an affirmation of belief. A select few contributors will be able to pay tribute to the person who inspired their contribution in a very special manner. (See the "Tribute" perk)

Our goal of $25,000 will help us get started in many ways, including our first wave of donation apparel and the formation of a mobile team to distribute it to children's hospitals and sponsorship events.

If we do not meet our campaign goal, all is not lost. We will just have to do things on a smaller scale. However, let's surpass our intended goal and take smiles and inspiration to even more people than we thought possible!

Above and Beyond

Unbeatable Concepts is just getting started locally, but we anticipate great growth and global expansion in 2014.

We are working locally to establish a blueprint for annual sponsorship events including walks, bike-a-thons, concerts and other original fundraising activities. Moving forward, our website won't just be a place to purchase apparel. It will be a home for inspiration stories, updates on Unbeatable Concepts' contributions to charity, a place to suggest lesser known causes, and a fundraising calendar so you can know in advance what's happening each month. 

It's all about creating a caring movement

 When you do good...you feel good!! We believe everyone wants to be a part of something positive. If now is not a good time to contribute $$, then help be a part of the movement. Help us spread the message in your social media circles. Tell someone who you know cares and will in turn, tell someone they know. Print out the file attachment and post it in the business you own or work at. This campaign is relatively short, so lets make it count! Thank you in advance for all your help.
