story:
Short Summary

Get Latest Fashion Updates by just a few clicks: Courtesy – a new initiative by I’m a Shopaholic


http://www.imashopaholic.ca/ is a popular online store and blog that covers celebrity fashion. You can find celebrity clothing and accessories at this amazing online store. You can also read about all the latest happenings in the fashion world by reading their regularly updates fashion blog. I’m shopaholic is for those people who are very serious about making a fashion statement every day. Their blog is very popular among the people and the number of buyers of this website is also growing at a rapid pace. But I’m a shopaholic believes in surprising its followers and customers at every new interval by launching a new initiative that helps people to stay connected with the fashion world.

One of such new initiatives is a plan to create a long running YouTube series that would update people on the latest fashion. You must be wondering that there are already a number of YouTube series available in this regard. You should also be thinking that what’s so different about the one to be launched by I’m a Shopaholic? If yes then do have a look at the following:

             

  • Long Lasting: As said before the initiative of Shopaholic would run for a long period of time. The producers of this series are planning to continue it for a number of years. As they have a large number of clientele and followers, the producers are sure that it would be a huge success. They are expecting that every fan of beyonce and jay z songs would be pleased to know about the fashion ideas of these celebs every time the video is shared and so the video series would keep on going.

  • Celebrities: The best part about this initiative is that it would include a number of celebrities. These celebrities include but are not limited to Beyonce, Rihanna, Jayz, Kim Kardashian and Jennifer Lopez. It would also include several pro-sports stars and other fashion celebrities. Imagine viewing just a few minute video of your favorite celeb talk about the latest fashion trend they are following or rather setting. So you may not have to watch every minute of rihanna songs to get an idea about the fashion trend she is following.

  • Easy Availability: As this video series would include a number of celebrity interviews and fashion updates, all you need to do is to click a few times and get all the latest fashion updates straight from the celebrities. This way you would be saved from the hassle of browsing the news daily to know about the latest fashion trends. You may also give up your habit of watching beyonce songs just to get an idea of the fashion statement she is following.

  • Coverage of Fashion Week: This video series would include coverage of fashion week from all over the world. You would get to know latest happenings of the fashion weeks without browsing for the news portals. This would allow you to keep a hang of the fashion trends from all over the world. You would also learn about the celebrity gossip from this reliable source.
  • Originality: Another cool thing about these videos would be 100% original. As we all know most of the blogs use borrowed images and content. So if you are fed up of all the copy pasted fashion blogs, then you should definitely try out this amazing video series. If you also wish to remember the fashion ideas of celebs like beyonce like you did with beyonce songs lyrics then do try watching this video series.
  • High quality: If you’ve purchased a product from I’am a shopaholic before and if you are a follower of their blog then you would know that they follow quality in everything. So you can expect the videos to be of the best quality too. The quality would be at par with the quality of beyonces songs uploaded on YouTube. 

What’s the goal of this Initiative?

The key goal of this initiative is to make people aware of the latest fashion trends from all over the world by just a few clicks. The aim is also to help people stay updated on the fashion updates of their favorite celebrities. What’s better than to listen to beyonce Christmas songs while wearing the similar outfit she wore while shooting the song? Another long term goal of this initiative is to raise 1 Million. 

When will this initiative go off the ground?

Well the entire team of Shopaholic is committed to launch this amazing video series as soon as they can. Some of the talks regarding the initial interviews are already on their way. So you can expect the project to be off the ground within a few months time.

Who’s supporting this initiative?

The president and CEO of I’am a shopaholic – Korey Miller is the key person supporting this initiative. He is supposed to have a hand in approaching celebs like Chris Brown and Rihanna
to get their agreement to join the initiative. So if you are a huge fan of rihannas songs, you can know her fashion ideas first hand. He was one of a few selected promoters of the world. He has regularly seen attending the promo parties with celebs like Lebron James, Drake, Trey Songs, Fabulous and several others. He has been acknowledged as the Youth Entrepreneur in the year 2008. This acknowledgement was given by the City of Toronto. He is also supporting other key initiatives like empowering 600 women to enter politics by the year 2026. He has also been nominated among the top 50 inventors of 2014. He has also initiated a boys and girls club where he motivates youth to achieve their dreams and goals in life. So he is a well known face among the celebrity news that you follow over the internet.

What can the fans expect?

So if you are planning to sign up for viewing this video series as soon as it is launched then you are taking the right decision. You can not only get the opportunity to follow all the fashion updates but you can have access to it within a few minutes. All the real fashion freaks out there can just download the videos as soon as they are updated. You would be saved from the hassle of browsing through many latest celebrity news channels to get an update on their fashion ideas. You can also share it among your social circle to help everyone stay on top of the hottest happenings of the fashion world. You can also download these videos at the same time when you are in the process of finishing your favorite beyonce songs download in order to save your time.

            

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, Please share this page with your friends on social media twitter, facebook, instagram or vine. Together we can change the world.

You can also download these videos at the same time when you are in the process of finishing your favorite beyonce songs download in order to save your time.

Even if you can't donate, Please share this page with your friends on social media twitter, facebook, instagram or vine. Together we can change the world.

story:
Three colors: Midnight black, Lipstick pink and Snow white.

Blanket Size 22"-13"

                  


Matching harness collection:

For pet with chest sizes 11"- 32"


                 

              

                

As a dedicated and compassionate advocate of animal welfare, Juls created the slogan, “Buy a bag, save a life”. Any 501(c)(3) that sells a ZuGoPet bag will get 100% of the profits. Also, we will designate no less than $1 of each product purchased to saving the lives of shelter animals. When launched, every bag purchased will help an animal in need. 


    

                                  

                                    

We have been working with our trusted partner in China for manufacturing. They take great pride in their craftsmanship and have sourced high quality vegan friendly material.This product has undergone rigorous safety and quality testing to ensure the best performance and convenience of the bag.

Why do we need funding?

In order to green light our first production, our manufacturing partner requires a minimum order that will cost $100,000. With your support we will be able to produce the highest quality multifunctional pet bag available. Our mission, to keep you safe while you drive,  your pet comfortable, safe and secure, while providing convenience, fashion and for you to feel confident about your pet bag on any occasion.

Juls grew up around animals on her grandma’s ranch in Salinas, California. After moving to Southern California to pursue her higher education, she settled in Los Angeles where she founded several successful businesses that embraced a broad holistic healthcare philosophy.

In 2011, she founded Awake and Living, a non- profit blog about healthy living and self-awareness. She continues to volunteer and support many charitable organizations. 

Russell, Los Angeles age 7, real age unknown,  probably 9, was pulled out of a kill shelter in Orange County. While returning a Blockbuster movie, Juls found Russell at a rescue "popup" event in front of a D.O.G. Pet Boutique on La Cienega . She saw a depressed, frightened, undernourished dog who looked like his soul was broken and was on his last leg of life. 

   

Juls fell for him instantly and signed the adoption papers. They both nurtured each others souls with love, gratitude and lots of lessons on patience. With time, a lot of patience and putting their heads together, ZuGoPet was created. 

                The truth is, they really rescued each other .


Many of you know, small pets tend to get motion sickness and anxiety in the car. Juls Bindi started to develop ZuGoPet products in 2009 when she began traveling with her dog, Russell. Like many small dogs, Russell was suffering from severe travel anxiety, which made air travel or even short trips in the car a stressful experience. After an extensive search, Juls found there were no products on the market to alleviate his travel anxiety. Juls subsequently began the mission to create innovative pet products that show signs of significantly declining pet and peoples anxiety, by providing a comfortable and secure atmosphere while they travel together, at the same time increase safely and convenience in one airplane-compliant but high fashion product. 

In 2012, after four years of dedicated research, safety tests, design and prototype development, ZuGoPet was launched with their first pet bag product. 

ZuGoPet is dedicated to continue developing innovative products to help pets and your needs in the future. Help us bring convenience to your home or where ever you go. 


FAQ

What are the bag dimensions? The dimensions are 10" wide x 16" long. 

What is the maximum pet weight? Maximum weight is 15 pounds. As stated above please be aware of your pets measurements. 

What is the maximum pet size? Be sure your pet is smaller than the bag so your furry friend will fit! Please measure your pet's length, from the nose to the behind (tail not included). They should not be longer than 14" so you can enclose them comfortably. 

What colors are available? Currently we have 3 colors, black (Midnight collection), pink (Lipstick collection), and white (Snow collection). 

Do you ship internationally? We do ship internationally. Extra shipping costs will be applied depending on where you live in the world.

What is the "Buy a bag, save a life" program? This program is set up to help rescues save shelter animals from being euthanized. ZuGoPet will donate no less than $1 of each product sold to affiliated charities. The charities in the program must see that all donations from ZuGoPet go directly to helping an animal in need. Visit www.zugopet.com to see the affiliated non-profits. 

How much does the bag weigh?  The bag weighs 2 pounds. 

How does this bag help with motion sickness and anxiety? This bag is like a mini dog cave. Some dogs simply feel more secure in confined surroundings. It also has the same effect as a hammock. No bottom support, conforms around your pets body to give a feeling of being cradled, hugged or held.

How do you clean the bag? Soap and water. The interior is made of an easy to clean water proof canvas material.
story_txt:
Three colors: Midnight black, Lipstick pink and Snow white.Blanket Size 22"-13"                  Matching harness collection:For pet with chest sizes 11"- 32"                               


                
As a dedicated and compassionate advocate of animal welfare, Juls created the slogan, “Buy a bag, save a life”. Any 501(c)(3) that sells a ZuGoPet bag will get 100% of the profits. Also, we will designate no less than $1 of each product purchased to saving the lives of shelter animals. When launched, every bag purchased will help an animal in need. 
    





















                                  


                                    






We have been working with our trusted partner in China for manufacturing. They take great pride in their craftsmanship and have sourced high quality vegan friendly material.This product has undergone rigorous safety and quality testing to ensure the best performance and convenience of the bag.
Why do we need funding?
In order to green light our first production, our manufacturing partner requires a minimum order that will cost $100,000. With your support we will be able to produce the highest quality multifunctional pet bag available. Our mission, to keep you safe while you drive,  your pet comfortable, safe and secure, while providing convenience, fashion and for you to feel confident about your pet bag on any occasion.










Juls grew up around animals on her grandma’s
ranch in Salinas, California. After moving to
Southern California to pursue her higher education,
she settled in Los Angeles where she founded several
successful businesses that embraced a broad holistic
healthcare philosophy.



In 2011, she founded Awake and Living, a non-
profit blog about healthy living and self-awareness.
She continues to volunteer and support many
charitable organizations. 





Russell, Los Angeles age 7, real age unknown,  probably 9, was pulled out of a kill shelter in Orange County. While returning a Blockbuster movie, Juls found Russell at a rescue "popup" event in front of a D.O.G. Pet Boutique on La Cienega . She saw a depressed, frightened, undernourished dog who looked like his soul was broken and was on his last leg of life. 

   
Juls fell for him instantly and signed the adoption papers. They both nurtured each others souls with love, gratitude and lots of lessons on patience. With time, a lot of patience and putting their heads together, ZuGoPet was created. 


                The truth is, they really rescued each other .






Many of you know, small pets tend to get motion sickness and anxiety in the car. Juls Bindi started to develop ZuGoPet products in 2009 when she began traveling with her dog, Russell. Like many small dogs, Russell was suffering from severe travel anxiety, which made air travel or even short trips in the car a stressful experience. After an extensive search, Juls found there were no products on the market to alleviate his travel anxiety. Juls subsequently began the mission to create innovative pet products that show signs of significantly declining pet and peoples anxiety, by providing a comfortable and secure atmosphere while they travel together, at the same time increase safely and convenience in one airplane-compliant but high fashion product. 
In 2012, after four years of dedicated research, safety tests, design and prototype development, ZuGoPet was launched with their first pet bag product. 
ZuGoPet is dedicated to continue developing innovative products to help pets and your needs in the future. Help us bring convenience to your home or where ever you go. 
FAQ






What are the bag dimensions? The dimensions are 10" wide x 16" long. 
What is the maximum pet weight? Maximum weight is 15 pounds. As stated above please be aware of your pets measurements. 

What is the maximum pet size? Be sure your pet is smaller than the bag so your furry friend will fit! Please measure your pet's length, from the nose to the behind (tail not included). They should not be longer than 14" so you can enclose them comfortably. 

What colors are available? Currently we have 3 colors, black (Midnight collection), pink (Lipstick collection), and white (Snow collection). 
Do you ship internationally? We do ship internationally. Extra shipping costs will be applied depending on where you live in the world.
What is the "Buy a bag, save a life" program? This program is set up to help rescues save shelter animals from being euthanized. ZuGoPet will donate no less than $1 of each product sold to affiliated charities. The charities in the program must see that all donations from ZuGoPet go directly to helping an animal in need. Visit www.zugopet.com to see the affiliated non-profits. 
How much does the bag weigh?  The bag weighs 2 pounds. 
How does this bag help with motion sickness and anxiety? This bag is like a mini dog cave. Some dogs simply feel more secure in confined surroundings. It also has the same effect as a hammock. No bottom support, conforms around your pets body to give a feeling of being cradled, hugged or held.
How do you clean the bag? Soap and water. The interior is made of an easy to clean water proof canvas material.

story:
I should be able to keep my pant and self-esteem up!

My name is Dawn Michelle Russell. I recently graduated university with a communications degree. I recognized an obstacle in my confidence as a professional woman. I can’t keep my pants up. I’m a curvy woman and so when I shop for pants, nothing seems to fit right for very long. I end up losing my pants and when I ‘fix’ it with a belt I end up with an unsightly muffin-top. I created this new product so that I have the confidence in any situation that I won’t have to grab my waistband and reef it up over my butt or to hide my exposed belly.

This product allows curvy women everywhere the opportunity to wear pants, tights, pantyhose or exercise gear without the fear of our dignity being lost along with our pants.

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking for $10,000 to finish development and then produce 2500 complete Grande Garter Collection sets. These sets will be used for samples for possible large scale production or licensing of the product. This overall cost will include my time and travel to present this product. I will also include complete kits as perks for my funders.

The impact

As a woman, a lot hinges on what we wear and how we are wearing it. I know we can be our own worst enemy but what is more important is how we feel about ourselves when we are out. If we feel confident at work or out in our community, the decisions we make will be different than if we feel like our butts are hanging out of our pants. We also spend way too much and waste clothes when we don’t think they fit right or won’t stay up. This will help women who are pregnant or women who are in transition and are losing weight but don’t have the money to get a whole new wardrobe.

The difficulty this project has is getting the word out to women that they have options for solving some of their most difficult fashion challenges. As a communications specialist I know I can target the right clients and producers for this product. Also, as a curvy woman, I know and fully understand the hardship of keeping up my self-esteem and dignity at the same time. The other challenge I will have is finding a production facility to keep the price down for the first set of 2500. I have a large social network and so this may be easily overcome after the launch.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools for mentions on Twitter!

story:
Anybody who has ever used a smartphone or worn glasses knows that our fingers leave greasy smudges every time we touch a screen or lens.  A Genius Tee allows users to bring their gadgets and lenses back to crystal clear definition anywhere they go with just a few swipes. 


Most people just use the bottom of their shirt to clean their phone or glasses, but that just pushes the grease around.  With our three designs, you can have access to professional quality microfiber cleaning cloths anywhere and anytime. 


All designs are patent pending.

The Genius Patch is a large triangle of microfiber that provides a striking look to the traditional T-shirt.  Large enough to clean an iPad in just a few swipes, the Genius Patch is a great option for cleaning anything from glasses to camera lenses.

Whether you're texting a friend or flying a drone, a Genius Patch T-shirt can help keep your screen smudge free and keep you looking good at the same time.

The Genius Patch can be ordered on either the left or right side of the shirt.

A microfiber T-Shirt pocket with a sewn in microfiber flap that can be extended for use on glasses and the folded in to look like a pocket square when not in use.  

A dapper accessory for your favorite pair of sunglasses, the Genius Pocket will let you see the world in fantastic clarity.

Use the outside of the pocket for your phone, and the inside flap for your glasses. 

A small strip of microfiber, sewn at the top and bottom but loose in the middle, the Genius Loop is designed to to allow users  to clean their phone screen as it is put in to the pants pocket.   Equally great for glasses, the Loop can be easily pulled out to wrap around a lens.

This discrete design is great for the person who wants the convenience of microfiber on their shirt but doesn't want to call attention to it.  Available with the loop on either the right or left side of the shirt. 

 

Microfiber is the most efficient cleaning cloth on the market.  It is made with incredibly small fibers that are tightly woven together so as to create a large surface area. This allows microfiber to absorb greater amounts of contaminants such as grease and dirt from a phone screen or lens.  


Genius Tees are made with the only the highest quality nylon microfiber that is specifically designed for cleaning grease off of glass surfaces.  Our microfiber is incredibly durable, has a silky feel, and is the same kind used by professional photographers.

Our T-shirts are soft to the touch, have a relaxed style, and look great loose or fitted.  They are available in both men's and women's styles and made with a Tri-blend of 50% Polyester, 25% Rayon, and 25% Cotton. 

Genius Tees are machine washable, however, to ensure the longest life of the microfiber cloth, it is recommended to wash with minimal detergent and machine dry on low heat.



$15,000 is what we need to get out our first designs, however we have a lot more ideas for how to grow the product and if our goals are surpassed we'd be excited to give them to you.  

Look forward to more T-shirt color options, pattern designs for the pocket, and a long sleeve shirt with the cuffs made of microfiber.

Have a favorite Genius Tee design?  Donate and get it by December 2015.

Genius Tee was created by Luke Knezevic after a friend accidentally drooled on his phone and he had nothing with him to clean it up.   After throwing out that phone, he began researching ways to have a microfiber cloth with him at all times.  A couple dozen designs and prototypes later, Genius Tee was born.  

What will the money be used for?

We currently have the designs, patents, copyrights, logo, suppliers and marketing strategies.  Now we just need the funds to place bulk orders of fabric and microfiber.  Immediately after we receive funding, the orders will be placed and production will begin so that we can get you your Genius Tee as quickly as possible. 

Why invest in Genius Tee?

The number of electronic devices in our daily lives is increasing rapidly and our fingers are covered in grease.  Genius Tee is working hard to provide you with a number of different grease fighting options.  Will you be prepared for the greaspocolypse? I hope so.  So please come join us in the T-shirt revolution and support Genius Tee!

story:
A pair of shorts to change our world 

          

PoPbeachclub is seeking to raise funds to manufacture the first batch of a new design of shorts .


Popbeachclub is a social enterprise founded by Akintunde Disu. The aim is to impact on the planet for good.

We have created a lifestyle following on social media and are about to move to the next stage, scaling the business. 
On the beach we found our calling,We are surrounded by clever and bright Kids,who are innocent to the challenges life will throw in their paths due to a lack of a basic education, and swamped by the plastic deposited twice a day by the tides. This ruins their environment and is stealing their livelihood by killing the fish in the oceans .
We decided to make a change, to develop a sustainable model which did not rely on charity or government ,3 years ago we started making limited-edition African wax print shorts these are waterproofed using an artisanal method we formulated ourselves. A fixed amount from this goes to funding our efforts to improve the lives of the children by supporting literacy through primary education  


But this process is hard to scale, and doesn't address the issue of plastic pollution which is hard to ignore. Never the less we had a great deal of success. In our first year we built a classroom; a simple structure that doubled the intake of the school so that all the kids in the surrounding environment could now attend classes.

The morale of the teachers was greatly improved by this, the parents were excited and the school became a point of pride in the community. In the second year we updated the furniture.

 

  Basic education should be within the reach of everyone, by 2025 there shall be 1 ton of plastic to 3 tons of fish in the oceans .

Our project when successfully funded creates a platform to address the problems of plastic proliferation killing the oceans and the low literacy rates coming out of Africa

     

We would also be raising the consciousness of consumers globally for the need to demand the worlds major clothing manufacturers use recycled polyester.

We are :-

Education is part of the basic human rights agreed on by the United Nations charter we as human beings most come together to help solve the appalling rate of child literacy in Africa 

Swimming trunks are part of everyone’s wardrobe. By using recycled plastic bottles we are able to emotionally and physically remind you, in a beautiful way, of the challenges our planet and the less fortunate kids on it face, and the power that everyone has to help.

We have created sturdy and sophisticated clothing items. With your help we will be able to impact literacy rates, reduce landfill waste, reduce ocean pollution and increase youth employment, in some of the most beautiful and desperate areas. 

A pair of shorts could save our world 

Please contribute generously 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds £18700 will be used to specifically order the fabric required produce the first batch of the new shorts , to put in place the systems required to scale and cover the costs associated with this campaign 

Our perks include

  • The shorts themselves which would make you look good and feel good on the beach this summer 
  • Our limited edition current African wax print cotton shorts/ totes which have been made water resistant by our own secret method 
  • Pieces from our SS2017 collection 
  • Prints from my series L4AYERCAKE a visual narrative on the layers that make up the throne of Lagos our host city 
  • Special trips /stays at our beach club located on the beautiful Island of Ilashe where you can observe our work first hand 

If we fail reach our goal through this platform you would still have contributed to us reaching our goal using funds available from our regular business selling wax print cotton shorts and running a beach club 

The Impact

By helping us reach our goal you would have helped to create a brand which is 

  • Dedicated to impacting on the standards and quality of primary education in Africa we believe if kids are empowered with literacy they shall break free of the poverty circle using the current and future technology through a phone to access the web to leap frog the obstacles to secondary education they face today 
  • Able to instantly impact on the standard, quality and access to primary education for approximately 1000 children within our pilot region 
  • Would have recycled approximately 60000  to produce the yarn to weave the cloth to make the minimum order 10,000 metres of fabric we are ordering from the mills 

And this is just the start to find out more follow us on 

  • https://www.instagram.com/popbeachclub/
  • https://www.facebook.com/PoPbeachclub-400522349...
  • https://popbeachcommunity.wordpress.com
  • https://twitter.com/PoPbeachclub
  • https://popbeachclub.com

Risks & Challenges

In the event of our chosen suppliers being unable to meet our requirements we have back up suppliers in Asia and in the USA which we will proceed with.

With the current political situation around the world creating a global company has its unique risks we shall be carrying out fulfilment from Asia to surmount import restrictions for this project.

In the event that we face huge demand we have back up suppliers and manufacturers to help us scale. we have carried out a critical path analysis and are prepared.

We have worked in the fashion business in manufacturing and in project management and are comfortable of our abilities to face the challenges and scale them 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Please help us help those who can't help themselves through no fault of theirs by spreading the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you

story:
NOTE: Option for Name Engraving - Sold Out!

Limited Founder's Edition - (80/500) Timepieces Available

-

 

 


Design Journey
 



January 2015

Inspired from the human life, the designers in Melbourne are busy drawing. The case of the new watch is first created on a computer monitor, or sometimes the old fashioned way - in a sketchbook.


A watchmakers desk

August 2015

The movement is selected. Models are built in collaboration with specialist dial and case makers; generally speaking, there is often quite a period of back and forth between them. When everything is just right, functions properly and is pleasing to the eye; a prototype is made.
 

January 2016

We're entering the second year since the whole process began; the movement is assembled - and ticks for the first time. Watchmakers now say "it's alive."

For anyone who wants to know the exact details; Each year from this point on, the watch will tick 100 million times and tock 100 million times. The mechanical oscillation of the watch is 4 hertz; or to be precise 691,200 times a day. So the first tick is a big moment that we like to celebrate a little.


So How Are We Able To Sell A
Swiss Luxury Watch At A Great Price?

 

Well. Basically. By being honest, not greedy and selling a product for a value of what it is actually worth rather than the perceived worth.

Brands, middle men, brokers, and retailers regularly mark-up luxury watches up to 1000%, severely inflating the true cost of a luxury timepiece. We started CABARO to create a new way to buy a Swiss luxury watch. 
 

Directly To You
 

Thanks to our manufacturing partnerships and direct to consumer approach, we skip the industry’s middle men markups (wholesalers, brokers, and distributors) and pass these savings to you.
 


 


 

Limited To Our First 100 Backers

We are excited about the new CABARO series, and it opens with our Numbered Founders Edition timepieces limited to our first 100 backers.

As founders, we want to give you something a little personal - Your personal name engraved on the caseback.
 

 

 

Good Deeds
 



When you give away something for free, like clothes or shoes, you’re providing a bandage. The deeper causes of poverty will continue to remain unaddressed. These communities are made poor because they lack the infrastructure to create wealth. As a giver, it’s easier to connect to a person than to an abstract action.

With CABARO, we decided we didn’t want to just provide a bandage. We wanted to provide something that can offer a real platform for wealth creation and progress: education. To do this, we’re collaborating with regional nonprofits.With every timepiece sold, we educate and empower a poverty-stricken child in developing countries. We allocate a set budget for every watch that is purchased, which is transferred to the partnering non-profit cooperatives at the end of the month.
 

Would You Do Us
The Honour?
 

We'd be delighted if you said YES!

Then we guess it is news that you sit down before you hear. So lets sit down and summarise all about the CABARO timepieces.
 


 

100% Satisfaction Guarantee


We take every precaution to ensure our watches are manufactured to the highest standard of quality. However we also strive to be pragmatic as there can be unexpected issues that can 'disrupt expectation'. But we at CABARO will definitely not be using any excuse to forgo quality. If you feel that the watch didn't meet your expectations in any way, simply contact us and we will send you a 100% refund.
 

The Two Swiss Made
Calibers
 

1. Sellita DW260-1 (Automatic)



Thanks to highly efficient, cutting edge technologies and the strictest quality controls, the Swiss Made Sellita motor beating at 28,800 beats per hour at a frequency of 4Hz has been produced with huge repeat accuracy.

Each movement has 31 jewels at its heart: The mainsprings power surrounded by a series of intricate gears power the watch for up to 38 hours.  Simply stirring soup, posting on Instagram, watering flowers or playing the piano will wind up the complex movement.

 

2. Ronda Slimtech 1069 (Quartz)

For those who would love a 7mm watch, we have introduced timepieces powered by a quartz movement. At only 2.8 millimetres in height, movement is significantly thinner than our Automatic versions. 

Like the motor ticking at their heart, the timepieces powered by it are never boastful, but rather show a sophisticated understatement.
 

 

Typically Switzerland
 



All mechanics aside, each movement in the first edition series is also a piece of the finest craftsmanship “Made in Switzerland.”  The renowned characteristics of traditional watchmaking from this country can be found in these highly modern CABARO watches, which beautifully combine the best of today and with the finest from yesterday.

 

The CABARO Watch
Strap
 

Our leather straps are made of full grain vegetable-tanned leather sourced from Italy.
story_txt:
NOTE: Option for Name Engraving - Sold Out!Limited Founder's Edition - (80/500) Timepieces Available-  
Design Journey January 2015Inspired from the human life, the designers in Melbourne are busy drawing. The case of the new watch is first created on a computer monitor, or sometimes the old fashioned way - in a sketchbook.A watchmakers deskAugust 2015The movement is selected. Models are built in collaboration with specialist dial and case makers; generally speaking, there is often quite a period of back and forth between them. When everything is just right, functions properly and is pleasing to the eye; a prototype is made. January 2016We're entering the second year since the whole process began; the movement is assembled - and ticks for the first time. Watchmakers now say "it's alive."For anyone who wants to know the exact details; Each year from this point on, the watch will tick 100 million times and tock 100 million times. The mechanical oscillation of the watch is 4 hertz; or to be precise 691,200 times a day. So the first tick is a big moment that we like to celebrate a little.
So How Are We Able To Sell ASwiss Luxury Watch At A Great Price? Well. Basically. By being honest, not greedy and selling a product for a value of what it is actually worth rather than the perceived worth.Brands, middle men, brokers, and retailers regularly mark-up luxury watches up to 1000%, severely inflating the true cost of a luxury timepiece. We started CABARO to create a new way to buy a Swiss luxury watch.  Directly To You Thanks to our manufacturing partnerships and direct to consumer approach, we skip the industry’s middle men markups (wholesalers, brokers, and distributors) and pass these savings to you.   Limited To Our First 100 BackersWe are excited about the new CABARO series, and it opens with our Numbered Founders Edition timepieces limited to our first 100 backers.As founders, we want to give you something a little personal - Your personal name engraved on the caseback.   Good Deeds When you give away something for free, like clothes or shoes, you’re providing a bandage. The deeper causes of poverty will continue to remain unaddressed. These communities are made poor because they lack the infrastructure to create wealth. As a giver, it’s easier to connect to a person than to an abstract action.With CABARO, we decided we didn’t want to just provide a bandage. We wanted to provide something that can offer a real platform for wealth creation and progress: education. To do this, we’re collaborating with regional nonprofits.With every timepiece sold, we educate and empower a poverty-stricken child in developing countries. We allocate a set budget for every watch that is purchased, which is transferred to the partnering non-profit cooperatives at the end of the month. Would You Do UsThe Honour? We'd be delighted if you said YES!Then we guess it is news that you sit down before you hear. So lets sit down and summarise all about the CABARO timepieces.  100% Satisfaction GuaranteeWe take every precaution to ensure our watches are manufactured to the highest standard of quality. Sellita DW260-1 (Automatic)Thanks to highly efficient, cutting edge technologies and the strictest quality controls, the Swiss Made Sellita motor beating at 28,800 beats per hour at a frequency of 4Hz has been produced with huge repeat accuracy.Each movement has 31 jewels at its heart: The mainsprings power surrounded by a series of intricate gears power the watch for up to 38 hours.  Simply stirring soup, posting on Instagram, watering flowers or playing the piano will wind up the complex movement. 2. Ronda Slimtech 1069 (Quartz)For those who would love a 7mm watch, we have introduced timepieces powered by a quartz movement. At only 2.8 millimetres in height, movement is significantly thinner than our Automatic versions. Like the motor ticking at their heart, the timepieces powered by it are never boastful, but rather show a sophisticated understatement.  Typically Switzerland All mechanics aside, each movement in the first edition series is also a piece of the finest craftsmanship “Made in Switzerland.”  The renowned characteristics of traditional watchmaking from this country can be found in these highly modern CABARO watches, which beautifully combine the best of today and with the finest from yesterday. The CABARO WatchStrap Our leather straps are made of full grain vegetable-tanned leather sourced from Italy.

story:
Cosmic Unicornz and MALLGOTHTRASH

Meet Melissa and Britteny- We have been artists for our entire lives. We both broke into the fashion scene, crossed paths, and joined forces. Melissa's festival fashion line Cosmic Unicornz features playful illustrated shirt designs, holographic skirts, and fun accessories. Britteny's line MALLGOTHTRASH creates clothing and accessories for fashion rebels, and embraces the true mall goth lifestyle with edgy graphics and colorful designs. We have recently teamed up to take on TOUR LIFE and share our creations together with the United States.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make this tour possible, we need funding for:

  • T-shirt Production
  • Fabric
  • Embroidery Production
  • Sewing Notions
  • Tour Bus Fees
  • Display Gear
  • Other merchandise production expenses 

Photo below shows holographic fabric, jumper production, our sewing machines, and patch production!

WHAT YOU GET-

Donations of $25 will receive a variety fun pack - (patches, pins, stickers!)

Donations of $50 will receive our exclusive tour tshirt! Design revealed soon!

Donations of $100 or more will receive our exclusive tour sweatshirt! Design revealed soon!

 

The Impact

If all of this is funded, we will be able to bring an incredible experience to all who visit our booth! Our clothing lines are meant to bring joy to those who want to be unique. We love everyone and encourage individuality!

Risks & Challenges

Our tour is from June 18th to August 10th. This is 9 WEEKS that we will be away from friends and family. We will be selling our designs full time. In order for this to be successful, we need LOTS OF INVENTORY! This is where your donations are needed most.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in volunteering your time to help us create inventory, send us a message on social media :) @cosmic_unicornz and @mallgothtrash

 

SEE YOU ON THE ROAD

story:
6-20 Update - Project Funding Successful! New Goal!

The Lil Boo Doll campaign is a success, thanks to you!  We are going to raise the bar to $5,000!!!  The new project goal is to fund the offical Lil Boo Mascot for Elementary School functions and other events!  With your support we can make that possible. Be sure to check out the amazing perks we have listed including all the photos of Lil Boo in the Gallery!! Pass the word along to family and friends, through social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter and G+.

Thank you again for supporting the Daddy Bookins brand!

Peas Out!
~Daddy Bookins (Cameron)

The Daddy Bookins Story

Daddy Bookins is my pen name.  It came about back in 2006 when my son was born and we nicknamed him, Lil Boo.  Quite appropriate wouldn't you think?  It has been six amazing years learning and living life through the trials and tribulations of raising an infant to toddler to now kinder!  Being a former 'Daddy Blogger' (as cliche as it may sound these days) I wanted to write a children's book about my son and his real life experiences.  In doing so, I released Outside with Lil Boo - an outside rhyming adventure from A to Z.  Two years later, the sequel in the series was released, At the Zoo with Lil Boo - a charming learning adventure at the zoo with his friends.  It's now 2012 and we have come a long way:

  • Officially picked up by a Traditional Publisher - Inkwell Productions in Scottsdale, Arizona - with both titles being re-published on January 14, 2012.
  • In the running for eight (8) children's literature awards between both titles so far this year.
  • Two (2) Five Star Reviews from Readers Favorite, one for each title.
  • At the Zoo with Lil Boo reached #29 on the best sellers list on Amazon for its category - Children's Books, Animals, Zoos.

Now we want to take it a step further and bring Lil Boo off of the pages and into the hands of your child!  We have teamed up with the Owner of TG Bears to bring you the Official Lil Boo Doll.

What We Need From You/Your Contribution

You will be able to secure your own unique, handmade 10" Lil Boo Doll through pledging.  The funds raised throughout this campaign will go towards creating the prototype and final Lil Boo Doll that will be made available for all to purchase.  We have listed an array of perks and we hope you will take advantage of them while supporting us in bringing Lil Boo to life!

Lil Boo Doll Specs

  • 10" Tall
  • Interchangeable T-shirt (extra t-shirt options will be available at a later date).
  • Made in the USA exclusively by TG Bears.

This would also be a great way to gear up for your next Boo at the Zoo visit!  How fitting would it be to take a copy of At the Zoo with Lil Boo along with your new favorite buddy, Lil Boo on your next Zoo trip?!

Additional Ways to Assist

Please share our campaign with friends via Facebook, Twitter, Google, Word of Mouth any which way possible.  Yes, we are looking to make some noise with this in as short of time as possible.  We have the technology and the motivation.  Be one of the first to surprise your son or daughter with a unique, handmade Lil Boo Doll!

Peas Out!
~Cameron Davison
aka Daddy Bookins
www.daddybookins.com
www.twitter.com/daddybookins
www.facebook.com/daddybookins
Welcome to the YOB Years! Where all you need is a BIG Hug!

story:
My Story

Hello IndieGoGo supporters!  Thanks for taking the time to review my project.  With your help I would love to make this idea a reality and turn the TECH*NĒCK into a must have accessory.

In this universe of Smartphone’s and computer tablets, the new 6th generation iPod Nano has honestly become my favorite piece of high-tech gadgetry.  

When I first got my iPod Nano I thought it was great, but I could only put it in my pocket when I was listening to music while running or working out.  This got a little awkward when I wanted to access it.  Since it was so small I knew it would be better if I could wear it around my neck.  But after searching for accessories I didn’t see anything that I thought was sturdy enough for my needs.  So, being a tool designer for 20+ years, I decided to design and make my own.  I wanted myself and others to be able to wear and access their device as easily, comfortably, and with as much pride as they would a piece of their favorite jewelry.  And thus was born the TECH*NĒCK.  I love mine and wear it all the time.

(Note: It's spelled Tech*Neek in the title because the site wouldn't allow me to put in the "e" with the long vowel symbol above it.)

 

The Impact

 

The TECH*NĒCK will allow people to wear their 6th generation iPod Nano as a fashionable necklace.  It makes it easy to listen to, and access your device while you work or play.


What The Money Will Be Used For

 

The money raised will be used to pay for the manufacturing, packaging, shipping, and advertising necessary to introduce this great product to you and the world.  It will also be used to launch a website where people can purchase the TECH*NĒCK.  

 

I was blessed to find a manufacturer who is interested in cultivating a long term business relationship, so if the project is fully or partially funded I know I’ll have a reliable source that I can trust to produce a quality product on time and at a fair price.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

A friend of mine once told me; “You can’t sell a secret.” Meaning, if no one knows about your product, how can you expect anyone to support it. 

So please, spread the word to your family, friends, and neighbors – because nothing travels faster, nor is there a greater advertising tool than “word of mouth.”

I hope you’re inspired and excited by this product - and choose to support this project.  You'll be supporting a fun and functional product that I'm sure you and many others will enjoy.

I cannot THANK YOU enough IndieGoGo supporters!

 

Notes:
1. Each TECH*NĒCK necklace kit comes with a 4mm rubber necklace in one of two sizes: Small (18 inches long), or Large (26 inches long). If you should choose to receive one, please specify your size – otherwise you will be sent the Small.
2. The 6th generation iPod Nano is not included.
3. iPod Nano, Apple logo and Apple are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Rob McLeod and I am a disc sports competitor living in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. This will be my second WFDF World Overall Flying Disc Championships. In 2001, I finished 4th overall (3rd in Self Caught Flight and 4th in Distance). In addition, I also have:

  • 9 World Records including 2 Guinness World Records
  • 3 World Championships
  • 1 Quadruped national title

Frisbee is my passion, my fire, my life. I live and breathe frisbee. I have met some of the most inspiring people of my life through frisbee and I hope to pass those experiences onto my friends, family and fans.

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to fund the following expenses:

  • Flight from Calgary to Stockholm ~ $1,400
  • Hotel for 10 nights ~ $950
  • Food for 10 days ~ $500
  • Registration: $175

If you are one of my funders, you will receive the following perks:

  • If you donate $5, I will mention you on my website and in the credits of a thank you video.
  • If you are one of the first 50 to donate $10, you will receive a signed Rob McLeod media card, an Innova mini disc and a handwritten note.
  • If you are one of the first 25 to donate $40, in addition to receiving a signed Rob McLeod media card, an Innova mini disc and a handwritten note, you will also receive an Ultimate Rob Discraft Ultrastar disc.
  • If you are one of the first 5 to donate $75, in addition to receiving a signed Rob McLeod media card, an Innova mini disc, a handwritten note and an Ultimate Rob Discraft Ultrastar, you will get to request a custom instructional video from Rob.
  • If you are the first one to donate $150, in addition to receiving a signed Rob McLeod media card, an Innova mini disc, a handwritten note, an Ultimate Rob Discraft Ultrastar, and a custom instructional video from Rob, you will receive a brand new Bongo Board from Fitter First. 

If I don't reach my entire goal, I will have to look at alternative means of funding to make up the difference so every bit helps!

The Impact

Having the opportunity to compete at the World Overall Championships  is a huge goal of mine for several reasons:

  • I will be the only Canadian competing at the World Overall
  • I will be able to share my experiences with my friends, family and fans and do my best to inspire others to follow their passion
  • The chance to visit Europe for the first time and to have the opportunity to share that with my friends and family

I feel that disc sports are the most accessible sports and although I realized they're not for everyone, I at least want everyone to know what they are and to see what they're all and make up their own mind if it's something they want to get into. Disc sports are an ageless game. There is a disc sport for every age and you can fit any disc sport into any stage of life.

Disc sports combines man's greatest tool, his hand, with his greatest dream, to fly.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone will be able to help fund my campaign so I ask that you help me out by doing one of the following:

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indigogo share tools to let others know about my campaign.
  • Leave a comment for me or send me an email to rob@ultimaterob.com.

From the bottom of my heart, thank you.
All the best,
Rob McLeod

story:
The RULER has finally come full circle

The Ring Ruler addresses one of the most elemental structures in the physical world– the circle. Up until now, the primary tool for creating circles is the needle compass, which pivots on a sharp, centered point. While this method has remained practically unchanged for hundreds of years, we believe there is a better way. We think the solution lies in a more natural, circular gesture. Why not use a circle to create or measure a circle? Using this method of an expandable/contractable measuring ring, we are now able to provide metrics that have never before been possible in a single tool– namely DIAMETER, ARC LENGTH/CIRCUMFERENCE and even DEGREES. 

The tactile feel of sizing the Ring Ruler by hand, snapping into place, and tracing the pencil along its curved profile is not only faster and far more satisfying, but it also allows for a much greater degree of control with respect to line consistency. That's because we've managed to keep the writing instrument where it belongs– in your hand.

π (Pi)

The principle behind the concept of the Ring Ruler is based on the very essence of π (pi). Many people know pi as the infinitely long number that starts 3.14159... but it is simply the direct relationship between circumference and diameter. More specifically, it is the arc length of a single increment of diameter, be it inches or centimeters. This property is uniquely illustrated with this tool in that the first unit of diameter in either scale equals 3.14 (pi) –hence, pi is literally baked into the Ring Ruler– allowing for the exclusive set of metrics it provides.

 

Well-rounded Tool

Whether you're an artist, designer, architect, engineer, teacher, woodworker, quilter, craftsman or student –or you're just taking a geometry class– the Ring Ruler might prove to be a handy little tool to have in your arsenal. Useful for anything ranging from technical drafting to pattern-making to bowl decorating, it is also easily used with pencil, pen or marker.

 

Circular Logic

We believe drawing circles should be easy; and learning about circles should be fun. The level of simplicity with which the Ring Ruler is handled and used opens some exciting possibilities with students and children of all ages. Teachers who may have been reluctant to hand out pointy compasses to young children can now encourage kids to actually play with these flexible, circular rulers. As much as we all love digital applications, there is a visceral stimulation with physical, hands-on instruction that creates stronger connections and invariably leads to greater understanding of fundamental concepts.

To a Degree...

In addition to creating perfect circles on the fly, the Ring Ruler also measures circles and 3D objects like cylinders, spheres and cones. In fact, it is really the first and only tool for actually measuring circles and arcs that does not involve calculation. 

We've also recently added the ability to measure a full 360º, making the Ring Ruler the ultimate protractor! In order to accurately measure degrees, we must use a fixed diameter, to create a quadrant system– much like a clock. The markings indicate the snap-in point and the baseline is essentially formed at the 3:00 and 9:00 positions.

IMPRINT OF METRICS (US Standard version)

The Prototypes

The prototyping process is often the most extensive in the development of a tool such as this one– sometimes taking years and consuming exorbitant sums of money. We were lucky to have nailed the final design early on, with just some slight fine-tuning along the way to improve the circularity and overall strength of the ruler. 

Prototype to Production Evolution:
 

Production

We have been working on the design + prototyping of the Ring Ruler for about a year now. It has been in concurrent production with our first product, the Versa Ruler. We entered production of the Ring Ruler just over 3 months ago and have already completed the molds. The funding we receive will go directly toward finished parts and packaging of the Ring Ruler. Both US standard and metric scale versions are being made. We expect to have this product ready to ship by mid-December.

Perks

We tried to create some interesting combinations of perks for our backers. At $10, you are essentially pre-ordering a Ring Ruler– and also joining us through this last stretch of bringing this product to the market. We also added our first product, the shape-making Versa Ruler, to our list of perks. We hope you like them.

 

About Us

We are lifelong friends who come from the seemingly different worlds of biomedical engineering and media design. A little over 2 years ago, a chance conversation about linear motion mechanisms led to some tinkering, and the idea for our shape-shifting tools was born. Once the concepts and designs were nailed, we began working feverishly to make these tools a reality and formed Koala Tools to commercialize our endeavor.

The Circle is Complete

We are extremely excited to bring this product to the world. What started as a kind of 4D puzzle to us has resulted in something that we are remarkably proud of. We would like to express our sincere thanks to everyone who decides to support this project and help us to ignite a ruling revolution!
story_txt:
The RULER has finally come full circle
The Ring Ruler addresses one of the most elemental structures in the physical world– the circle. Up until now, the primary tool for creating circles is the needle compass, which pivots on a sharp, centered point. While this method has remained practically unchanged for hundreds of years, we believe there is a better way. We think the solution lies in a more natural, circular gesture. Why not use a circle to create or measure a circle? Using this method of an expandable/contractable measuring ring, we are now able to provide metrics that have never before been possible in a single tool– namely DIAMETER, ARC LENGTH/CIRCUMFERENCE and even DEGREES. 

The tactile feel of sizing the Ring Ruler by hand, snapping into place, and tracing the pencil along its curved profile is not only faster and far more satisfying, but it also allows for a much greater degree of control with respect to line consistency. That's because we've managed to keep the writing instrument where it belongs– in your hand.
π (Pi)
The principle behind the concept of the Ring Ruler is based on the very essence of π (pi). Many people know pi as the infinitely long number that starts 3.14159... but it is simply the direct relationship between circumference and diameter. More specifically, it is the arc length of a single increment of diameter, be it inches or centimeters. This property is uniquely illustrated with this tool in that the first unit of diameter in either scale equals 3.14 (pi) –hence, pi is literally baked into the Ring Ruler– allowing for the exclusive set of metrics it provides.
 

Well-rounded Tool
Whether you're an artist, designer, architect, engineer, teacher, woodworker, quilter, craftsman or student –or you're just taking a geometry class– the Ring Ruler might prove to be a handy little tool to have in your arsenal. Useful for anything ranging from technical drafting to pattern-making to bowl decorating, it is also easily used with pencil, pen or marker.

 
Circular Logic
We believe drawing circles should be easy; and learning about circles should be fun. The level of simplicity with which the Ring Ruler is handled and used opens some exciting possibilities with students and children of all ages. Teachers who may have been reluctant to hand out pointy compasses to young children can now encourage kids to actually play with these flexible, circular rulers. As much as we all love digital applications, there is a visceral stimulation with physical, hands-on instruction that creates stronger connections and invariably leads to greater understanding of fundamental concepts.
To a Degree...
In addition to creating perfect circles on the fly, the Ring Ruler also measures circles and 3D objects like cylinders, spheres and cones. In fact, it is really the first and only tool for actually measuring circles and arcs that does not involve calculation. 
We've also recently added the ability to measure a full 360º, making the Ring Ruler the ultimate protractor! In order to accurately measure degrees, we must use a fixed diameter, to create a quadrant system– much like a clock. The markings indicate the snap-in point and the baseline is essentially formed at the 3:00 and 9:00 positions.
IMPRINT OF METRICS (US Standard version)

The Prototypes

We were lucky to have nailed the final design early on, with just some slight fine-tuning along the way to improve the circularity and overall strength of the ruler.

Production

We entered production of the Ring Ruler just over 3 months ago and have already completed the molds. The funding we receive will go directly toward finished parts and packaging of the Ring Ruler. Both US standard and metric scale versions are being made. We expect to have this product ready to ship by mid-December.
Perks
We tried to create some interesting combinations of perks for our backers. At $10, you are essentially pre-ordering a Ring Ruler– and also joining us through this last stretch of bringing this product to the market. We also added our first product, the shape-making Versa Ruler, to our list of perks. We hope you like them.

We are lifelong friends who come from the seemingly different worlds of biomedical engineering and media design. A little over 2 years ago, a chance conversation about linear motion mechanisms led to some tinkering, and the idea for our shape-shifting tools was born. The Circle is Complete
We are extremely excited to bring this product to the world. What started as a kind of 4D puzzle to us has resulted in something that we are remarkably proud of. We would like to express our sincere thanks to everyone who decides to support this project and help us to ignite a ruling revolution!

story:
Be. The Power.

YOU ARE THE POWER.

IT'S IN YOU.

IT'S IN US.

I've always been drawn to social movements. The power that shows up. When people stand up for something. And how that power grows when one becomes two, three, four, etc. Or actually, when many become one. The energy of a crowd. Whether it's a filled stadium at a football or baseball game, a concert, an accident, or a protest. The energy creates an experience that transcends the mundane. It allows us to be reminded of our essential nature and our connection with each other. 

Citizen Jane is about playing with that electricity and oneness. I wanted to channel it to the individual, sparked up and infilitrating society with the power of self knowledge. We are each agents, citizens. It's a bold underground movement, in this case, the subconscious. You don't have to say anything, just be. Allow your soul to breathe. Aware. Present. Here. Others will feel it. 

The past few months, I kept seeing B's everywhere, most noteably in dollars--the letters printed on the front side of single bills kept coming to me in B's and E's. BE. I took it as a sign to just let go for a second. Just sit in who I am. Sit, stand, just let go and feel myself. It's the solo experience of the crowd energy, the microcosm of the macrocosm. 

The Save Your Soul Collection is so much about moving through society with that energy of feeling who you are and wearing words and symbols that "elbow poke" other people. Clothing is a language all of its own. We speak to others so powerfully, playfully, creatively, with the colors and shapes and brands that drape our bodies. It's such a lively dialogue and much reflective of our inward state. By wearing the Citizen Jane Save Your Soul tshirts, tanks, and hoodies, you're a part of the movement. Playing the game. And lifting and shifting the weight of society to be a lighter one, which encourages creativity, innovation, community, and ultimately, a better world for all. Consciousness.

 

Contribute + Be a Catalyst

I'm asking for $5,000, which is all going into production. The more t-shirts I can make, the more people can wear them. I'm asking for your energy to combine with mine and create a momentum that I could not accomplish on my own. It's what this collection is all about. The words and the brand name have always elicted a good energy when I tell others about it. To trigger inspiration, adventure, play, self worth, and the beautiful spiritual core of who we each are. To know our true and essential nature. That really brings me alive and that's what I want others to feel. 

By contributing, you'll get to wear this sweet*ss gear. Again, you don't have to say anything but I imagine many conversations and communions with others will be sparked. It's my intention that you'll feel light, happy, and playful. Engaging life.

 

START NOW. PLAY WITH ALCHEMY. SWIRL THE ENERGIES OF THIS CAMPAIGN WITH OTHERS. FEEL THE POWER. OF SHARING. CARRYING. BEING.

story:
THE IDEA

Efflora = Effloresce (to bloom or blossom) + Flora (The plant community)

The Idea for Efflora Jewelry Studio was born nearly 4 years ago during a landscape construction installation I was working on in New York.  The concept  appeared before my eyes as I was preparing a hole in the ground to plant a Daylily flower at my customers' residence.  I began wondering if there was any type of jewelry made to attach real flowers, on the market.  After much research, I soon realized there was not.  My mind became flooded with designs for this concept, and took several years to work out the kinks.  The past 12 months I have dedicated to metalsmithing and refining my years of imagining.  The concept finally works, and here we are today.  I just need your passion, enthusiasm and support to help get this project off the ground and out to the public.  The feedback has already been overwhelmingly positive, and I hope you agree.  The possibility for uses of this product is incredible, and actually reaches beyond jewelry.  As you read on, you will see the plans Im developing for future applications if the funding reaches certain goals.  New ideas are always welcomed If you have thought of something that I have not already.  Thanks for taking the time to visit Efflora Jewelry Studio!  

HOW IT'S UNIQUE

Efflora Jewelry Studio is the worlds first jewelry designed to have live flowers securely attached to them, through a unique and proprietary connection type.  This connection already has the patent process underway.  It solves all of the problems of a historical attempt at this concept.  In the 18th Century, affluent women, at times, wore a type of brooch, which simply placed a live flower into a small vase-like container filled with water.  In addition to needing to have the stem attached to stay put (which was rather bulky), these products were unsucessful in many other ways.  Since the flower was only held in by gravity, the flower could be blown out by wind, or fall out if you bent over... along with all of the water spilling on you and the ground. 

Efflora uses a stainless steel double pin connection that pierces the underside (receptacle) of the flower and holds it firmly in place.  The stem is not needed for it to be attached and kept alive, which is better aesthetically and less cumbersome.  A natural sea sponge is seated behind the pins in a stainless steel dome.  The sponge, when moistened, absorbs and retains water which is carried through to the flower gradually throughout the day.  In my trials, this has increased the flowers freshness 5 to 20 times longer than if it was cut under the blossom and left without water (each plant varies).  Usually the sponge need only be moistened once a day, unless temperatures are extreme and humidity is very low.  

This connection forms the body of the jewelry and is used rather universally on my products thus far.  This makes a cohesive and unified jewelry line that is true to its design, and adheres to the basic principal of 'Form Follows Function'.  

Adding to the beautiful spherical form of the Efflora connection, is an accessory development called 'Drops'.  Drops take the opportunity of using the upright pins, which hold the flower on, to hang beautiful and interchangeable adornments.  Drops provide a dual function of beauty and versatility.  The same pair of earrings could be worn with different flowers and Drops to fit nearly any occasion, style or wardrobe.  I have introduced 4 Drop accessories available now, but will be adding more once Kickstarter is funded.  

BENEFITS 

Efflora will allow a woman to walk outside and pick a flower from wherever she may find it; a park, a garden, a planter etc. and attach it to herself immediately.  This opens the doors to not only a new avenue for accessorizing, but will expand the horizons on the types of flowers that would be used for decoration.  Some of the most beautiful flowers in the world are routinely overlooked as possibilities for use.  They may be found sitting in a meadow, alongside a stream, or blossoming on small trees and shrubs throughout the season.  As the designs evolve I hope to include a boutonniere for men in weddings as well.    

Side Note for thought:

Efflora does not believe in the term "weed", which has a negative and pesky connotation.  Plants actively considered to be "weeds" are most often native plants that grow best at the locations and environments which they are found.  They are usually rapid growers, temperature hardy, require no maintenance or watering, and are found in abundance.  Through my experience in the plant world, I have seen some so-called "weeds" with the most beautiful flowers imaginable.  They are usually smaller in scale, and generally go unnoticed amongst our daily routines.  I see these plants all around us as perfect opportunities for decoration.  **Efflora hopes to make an impact on the world by broadening the spectrum of flora than can be used for beautification beyond the 35-50 flowers normally found at all florists.    

MATERIALS & ENVIRONMENT

Almost all of the jewelry materials are made out of 316L surgical stainless steel. The exception is the headband which is made from bronze wire, though the flower connectors are still all stainless steel on it.  The highest quality steel is used since it is hypo-allergenic, corrosion resistant, and super strong!  It also happens to be beautiful, especially when heated with a flame.. it turns a vivid antique golden color with some hints of purple.  Jewelry can come in either a silver finish or this antique gold finish.  I try to keep as many materials as natural  and high-quality as possible.  Most gemstones are real, if not they are glass, and my sponges are natural Grass Sponges harvested and purchased from a local shop off of the coast of the Gulf of Mexico.  They are highly durable, absorbent, and pretty.  

Having a lengthy background in landscape architecture and horticulture, the issue of Environment was has always been a passion of mine.  I am LEED certified (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design), and so try to remain as 'Green', sustainable, and environmentally responsible as possible.  You can feel confident that there is no harming the environment from supporting Efflora products.  Quite on the contrary, Efflora aims to bring about a new appreciation for nature and plants by utilizing the beauty that mother nature affords us each season.  Picking flowers to adorn your body, encourages the minimization of industrial global impacts created through traditional manufacturing.  It will not harm the plant either, if picked properly.  My sponge supplier is also responsible and harvests correctly, which actually helps the sponge population multiply and thrive.  Each sponge grows back quickly, and after cut, is squeezed to release its spores back into the ocean for rapid population growth.          

FUNDING GOALS

$11,000 is the bare minimum to bring this project to life.  The $ will be used to buy expensive equipment that is imperative to the manufacturing process.  It will also be used to build a professional website and buy the materials needed to produce the first line of jewelry.  If funding exceeds the minimum, there are carefully planned uses for the additional capital.  The plan below explains what the additional capital would be used for.  

11K- Project minimum goal- $ goes towards larger needed tools, website development, & materials for the Efflora Jewelry pieces to be produced.

25K- Efflora can bring new jewelry pieces to the line, including; hair bands, rings, necklaces, bracelets, and have the stainless steel discs manufactured.

50K- Jewelry parts manufacturing within the USA can be achieved at this point, expanding the reach to a much larger market base.  

100K- Opens us to the manufacturing of artificial flowers that will be designed to attach to the Efflora double-pin connection.  (This will be perfect for the winter, or when fresh flowers are not available).  A secondary line of gold, silver, and gemstones can be pursued & new products such as a Dog Collar collection, and a redesigned safety line for infants and toddlers.
