story:
At ROAV, we pair vintage style with state of the art technology. Our patent pending system of micro screwless hinges enable the first truly pocketable folding shades.

 

ROAV sunglasse s are constructed from scratch-resistant ion-plated stainless steel. Our patent pending system of micro screwless spring hinges require zero maintenance and won't loosen over time. The flat folding design eliminates pressure on the hinges when the glasses are folded, so you can feel comfortable putting them in your back pocket or purse.

Spring hinges and individually adjustable temples ensure a stable and tailored fit on most face shapes and sizes. Weighing in at under 20 grams, ROAV sunglasses will remain comfortable all day long.

We selected premium nylon lenses for their lightness and flexibility. The addition of a polarizing filter ensures maximum reduction of glare. All our lenses provide UV and IR protection and are coated to resist reflections, fingerprints, and scratches.

 

Protective yet minimal, our handmade pouch is constructed from 100% vegetable tanned leather. 

Unlike a standard eyewear screw hinge that is glued, soldered, or riveted to the frame, our unique screwless hinges are actually press formed into the sheet metal frame itself. This ultra minimal construction enables a design that is incredibly small and durable. The hinges also have an inherent springiness, so they won't come loose over time and prevent the glasses from folding or unfolding unintentionally.

ROAV folding frames, FF for short, inject modern practicality into iconic eyewear frame styles. All 3 shapes are unisex and were crafted to provide a comfortable and great looking fit on a wide range of face shapes and sizes.

FF Round

FF Round - Matte Black Frame with G15 Lenses

FF Round - Matte Black Frame with Grapefruit Mirror Lens

FF Round - Brushed Gold Frame with Brown Lenses

FF Round - Brushed Gold Frame with Gold Mirror Lenses

FF Aviator

FF Aviator - Matte Black Frame with G15 Lenses

FF Aviator - Brushed Silver Frame with Blue Mirror Lenses

FF Square

FF Square - Matte Black Frame with Graphite Flash Lenses

FF Square - Brushed Gold Frame with Green Lenses

 

We are offering 3 frame shapes, with two colorway options for each shape. You can find these in the Styles and Colorways section above. For each frame that you order, you will also receive a leather pouch and microfiber cloth.  

For the single pair rewards, we separated the rewards by frame shape. You will be able to choose which color option you prefer on a survey that we will email you after you pledge

For the multiple pair rewards, you will be able to select your desired color option AND frame shape on the survey

We understand that eyewear fit is personal, so if you don't love your glasses for whatever reason, send them back for a full refund or exchange for a different style at no additional cost.

United States: Free

Canada, UK, EU, Australia, New Zealand, Japan: $7

Rest of the World: $15

If you've made it this far down the page, then it's time you know the truth. Edwin ROAV didn't die in that plane crash... Also, his actual name is Frank and he's a part-time actor that I hired. The true story may be a little less glamorous, but if you're interested, check out the video below!
story_txt:
At ROAV, we pair vintage style with state of the art technology. Our patent pending system of micro screwless hinges enable the first truly pocketable folding shades.
 

ROAV sunglasses clock in at mere 8.5 mm when folded. Folding Wayfarers are nearly four times as thick, and nowhere near thin enough to pocket. The difference is in our design approach. Our competitors simply modify existing frames to create foldability. ROAV isn't burdened by heritage and doesn't use any stock components. We design our eyewear from the ground up to be both beautiful and truly pocketable. ROAV sunglasse s are constructed from scratch-resistant ion-plated stainless steel. Our patent pending system of micro screwless spring hinges require zero maintenance and won't loosen over time. The flat folding design eliminates pressure on the hinges when the glasses are folded, so you can feel comfortable putting them in your back pocket or purse.Spring hinges and individually adjustable temples ensure a stable and tailored fit on most face shapes and sizes. Weighing in at under 20 grams, ROAV sunglasses will remain comfortable all day long.We selected premium nylon lenses for their lightness and flexibility. The addition of a polarizing filter ensures maximum reduction of glare. All our lenses provide UV and IR protection and are coated to resist reflections, fingerprints, and scratches. Protective yet minimal, our handmade pouch is constructed from 100% vegetable tanned leather. 
 Unlike a standard eyewear screw hinge that is glued, soldered, or riveted to the frame, our unique screwless hinges are actually press formed into the sheet metal frame itself. This ultra minimal construction enables a design that is incredibly small and durable. The hinges also have an inherent springiness, so they won't come loose over time and prevent the glasses from folding or unfolding unintentionally.ROAV folding frames, FF for short, inject modern practicality into iconic eyewear frame styles. All 3 shapes are unisex and were crafted to provide a comfortable and great looking fit on a wide range of face shapes and sizes.FF RoundFF Round - Matte Black Frame with G15 LensesFF Round - Matte Black Frame with Grapefruit Mirror LensFF Round - Brushed Gold Frame with Brown LensesFF Round - Brushed Gold Frame with Gold Mirror LensesFF AviatorFF Aviator - Matte Black Frame with G15 LensesFF Aviator - Brushed Silver Frame with Blue Mirror LensesFF SquareFF Square - Matte Black Frame with Graphite Flash LensesFF Square - Brushed Gold Frame with Green Lenses 
 Printable Style Guide

Click on the image below for a style comparison if you wish to print and cut-out the frame styles. The image is sized to printer on a letter size (8.5 inch x 11 inch ) sheet. Please note these line drawings accurately represent size, but due to the lack of nose pads, they do not accurately represent fit. We are offering 3 frame shapes, with two colorway options for each shape. You can find these in the Styles and Colorways section above. For each frame that you order, you will also receive a leather pouch and microfiber cloth.  For the single pair rewards, we separated the rewards by frame shape. You will be able to choose which color option you prefer on a survey that we will email you after you pledgeFor the multiple pair rewards, you will be able to select your desired color option AND frame shape on the survey
 

 We understand that eyewear fit is personal, so if you don't love your glasses for whatever reason, send them back for a full refund or exchange for a different style at no additional cost.United States: FreeCanada, UK, EU, Australia, New Zealand, Japan: $7Rest of the World: $15If you've made it this far down the page, then it's time you know the truth. Edwin ROAV didn't die in that plane crash... Also, his actual name is Frank and he's a part-time actor that I hired. The true story may be a little less glamorous, but if you're interested, check out the video below!

story:
Hi there. I really don't have much in the way of things to say to help sell myself, so here it is, plain and simple. No longwinded explaination. Just the facts on why I need your help.

I am freelance artist and full time single dad stuck in a work, eat, sleep cycle trying to pay the bills. Getting my artwork out into the general public and making a living off of it is something I really want to acheive. I was published in New York in an ebook last year and I really want to get more eyes on my work.

At the moment I make a little here and there doing custom portraits and other artwork for Things I Doodle ( https://www.facebook.com/ThingsIDoodle ) and Kutie and the Geek ( https://www.facebook.com/KutieandTheGeek ).

But I really want to start something I can build on and hopefully, in the future, make a career out of. In helping me you are helping me fulfil a dream of mine. I have selected the lowest amount of funding I was allowed.

If I can get all £500 it means all 3 designs can go to print straight away. The majority of the money will go into the printing itself with the remainder being used for packaging, etc.

Please share this with your friends so it can reach other like minded individuals.

story:
PRE-ORDER the freestyle Canyoning Wetsuit before March 12th 2017!

ORDER now and SAVE HUGE!

​Save up to 40% of the future retail price when you order ten!

Pre-order today and get Early Bird Prices!

The freestyle canyoning wetsuit with special features designed for canyoneers that are willing to take canyoning to the next level. It's perfect to jump, slide, climb and run around or to just hike and swim through the canyons a lot easier. It's stylish and incredibly comfortable and will immediately become your favorite wetsuit. 

Developed, tested and highly recommended from Warren Verboom 

 

Check out the 9 Unique Features

  • No zippers at all! So no zips will break or leak water.
  • 5/3 Superstretch neoprene! Perfect combination to keep you warm and super flexible.

  • Glued & blind stitched seams! Makes sure no water gets in.
  • Super rubber band seal on the inside! Prevents water penetration by a hard impact.
  • Fused cut is not only well made, no it also restricts water coming in!

  • Durable & flexible knee pads! Provides two different layers which are both very flexible.
  • Warm soft thermal lining! Keeps you nice and warm.

  • Protection padding at joints, back & shinbone! Gives you the same protection as a 6mm respectively 8mm suit.
  • Draining holes at the ankles! Ensures that no water stays inside.

 

Size Chart

The numbers of the wetsuit sizes are limited for the first bulk delivery in April 2017. The second bulk delivery will be available in August 2017! So don't delay, first come first served!

 

About deap

We are the first one and only pure freestyle canyoning brand named "deap". Founded in 2012 by Warren Verboom. He's been a passionate canyoneer for 13 years. Warren, a former sponsored adidas athlete, was working as a canyoning guide when he assembled the "deap" freestyle canyoning team. Made up of all different athletes from all walks of life. In the meantime his team have produced four canyoning films, which are famous for their unique style. The freestyle canyoning!

 

 

The "freestyle canyoning wetsuit" is not only a promotion to sell the best wetsuit for canyoning. No it's far more the development of a pure canyoning brand. With our love for canyoning it seems necessary to us to create such a brand. Even though this market is still very small.

With your support this campaign will help us to become a pure canyoning brand that is willing to revamp and push the sport forward.

Order your freestyle wetsuit through Indiegogo and you can take advantage of Early Bird Pricing, and receiving your product way before they become available to the public. Your wetsuit will ship in April of 2017.

If you like what we do and you would like to support us, but wild horses couldn’t drag you in a canyon, then please check our various products and kick-ass perks!

 

Perks

​

 

Risk & Challenges

Since there is no brand that will take the risk to focus only on canyoning products we decided to do so. Our project is important for everyone out there that loves canyoning and wants to have the best products possible for our sport. Help us and we will develop custom-built and stylish canyoning products you deserve.

Remarkably often we get asked if there is a big enough request in the sport of canyoning. We are aware of not being the best known sport out there but we are unique and special!

 

Where are we now?

  

If you can't help us financially you still can help us meaningfully, by just please spreading the word. Like, share or leave a comment on any social media platform!

 

Share this campaign through Indiegogo!

story:
Who are we?  A Philadelphia, PA based fashion accessories company established by Marsha Sickles 5 years ago. Our goal is to obtain the necessary funding to create our 2016 fashion accessories line for men and women. We also need funding to purchase the supplies needed for our contribution to Philly S.P.E.A.K and Days for Girls, two charity organization that are making a huge impact on the lives of people in need. 


Your contribution will help us produce our fashion accessories and obtain the supplies needed to make our contributions to people in need.


We believe in paying it forward and we do this by making hygiene kits for girls through the world in connection with Days for Girls. 

L. G. GUMBO also volunteers with Philly S.P.E.A.K.  in their annual "Blanket Drive for the Homeless and the less Fortunate".  We've been involved with this organization since 2012. Some of the ways that we've contributed is by making blankets that were distributed, purchased and gave out socks, served food, distributed clothing and simply gave a hug or listening ear to folks in need at this event. 





Please get the word out and share this campaign with others. Use the Indiegogo share tool. Help us as we help others. Your support is greatly appreciated.
